Summary: It's a small nice hotel right on the 5 freeway.  It's loud on the west side of the building because of the 5 freeway.   The windows do block out the freeway noise!   But it works for us!  We've been there twice now!   The staff does a great job.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room, breakfast and the staff were great.  The staff were courteous, friendly and professional.  The maid service was excellent.  The manager Zack and Herman was so helpful and professional.  Herman will be missed for sure but congratulations on your retirement.
Manager Response: Hello BestMomma0072,  Thank you so much for doing a post stay review. We are so happy that Zak and Herman were able to give you that great Hamptonality experience. We hope to see you back in the near future.  -Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: The stay was an avoidable disaster.
Summary: This stay was a disaster.    I booked a one- night stay as a sort of "staycation" after the holidays. The heating system in my room wasn't working.  It was at 64 degrees, when the outside temperature was in the mid 50's.  It was not acceptable to be that cold in the room.   The front desk showed no interest in following up. The front desk person should have reassigned the room when I reported the problem. However, he did nothing but told me to see if the system had reset after I had reported it, gone out for a bit, and then came back.  He was supposed to check on the problem while I was out.   When I asked if the heat was working, his response was: "We'll see when you go up to the room" The lack of customer care was disappointing - so much so that I left  - forfeiting my
Manager Response: none

Summary: My son got married in San Clemente, weddings by Wedgewood.  It was a beautiful stay at the Hampton in and Suites.  Each of the attendants were very helpful, knowledgeable and were able to help me with anything my husband and I needed. They were patient, understanding and that added to the enjoyment of our stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not the type of Hilton product we were expecting. Rooms were nice & clean but no room service unless you ask for it. We were very disappointed to return to a messy room after being out all day. Hotel staff weren’t too concerned. I don’t think the price is worth what you get in exchange.
Manager Response: Hi Maryhelenr2015, Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! It delights us to hear you enjoyed the cleanliness of our suites. We love hearing what we got right, and what we need to improve upon to provide a better stay in the future. We apologize for not communicating Hilton's new housekeeping standard properly and can assure you this has been addressed with the appropriate team members. Moving forward, all Hilton Hotels offer daily housekeeping services available upon request the night prior to servicing; this is to ensure any guests wishing to maintain social distancing are able to do so at their discretion. We thank you for bringing this to our attention, as well as for leaving this helpful review. We look forward to replacing this experience with more positive memories in the future.   Sincerely, Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: worst Hilton hotel I've ever seen!
Summary: This hotel is OLD and unmainted.   IThe rooms haven't been touched in 30 years.  The photos do NOT represent the rooms you receive.  The location is terrible.   I would never stay at this filthy, old hotel again.
Manager Response: Hi Susan, Thank you for taking the time to leave us your honest feedback. It is our goal to ensure each of our guests has the best stay possible while staying with us, and we're deeply saddened to hear we didn't hit that mark. We sincerely apologize that our property didn't live up to the expectations we set. We hope you give us the opportunity to replace this negative experience with more positive memories in the future. Thank you again for taking the time to leave us your review.

Summary Heading: Find another hotel in the area.
Summary: No wifi. Room service did not replenish  coffee or cups and did not remove used paper coffee cups. No drinking glasses in the room. Airconditioner sounds like a helicopter landing in the room. Sofa and chair extemely uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Hi JackbH156XP, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We love to hear what we got right, and what we can do better in the future. We sincerely apologize for not properly stocking the suite during your stay, and will discuss this with our team members to avoid this in the future. We do apologize for the wifi issues you experienced during your stay and are happy to announce that our wifi is back up and running again. We are also currently in the process of servicing our AC units now that the temperatures have cooled. Our team hopes you give us the opportunity to replace this experience with more positive memories in the future. Thank you again for leaving your helpful feedback.

Summary: Okay, to start with the lobby/reception area is in the underground parking garage, not a good place to start.  The rooms are dark, dated, and the furniture stained, the windows dirty.  It is also hard on the highway with a lot of highway noise,   I would most definitely look elsewhere.  I often stay at Hampton Inns while traveling as I feel they are dependably clean, well run hotels.  This one was a disappointment
Manager Response: none

Summary: Customer service is lacking in some of your employees. Colin, specifically, the front desk person should NOR be speaking to guests. When I called the front desk from my room asking for more pillows and blankets. Why? Because there were 4 people in the room, and the sofa bed is not the most comfortable. Colin answers the phone and said in an unfriendly tone: "Let me see what I can do.". That is not the way to talk to a customer. I asked him: "What do you mean?". He said: "Some of the guests may have already taken all of the blankets and pillows." Well, this is a hotel. I was under the assumption that hotels have extra pillows and blankets. Anyway, what a stupid way to answer! He could have said: "No problem. I will have someone deliver those to you right away." The nice gentleman
Manager Response: Hi EdnaDF,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us both a rating and review about your recent stay with us. As a business, we greatly appreciate the feedback of all our guests and will always make sure to share it with our team to ensure we continue maintain our high level of Hilton standards. We're really sorry to hear to your stay did not meet your expectations. Our team located at the hotel is trained to understand all of our guests needs and provide only great and quality service. I am sorry to know this was not the case during your stay. As it currently our summer season here in San Clemente, our front desk agents are at times busy assisting our other guest check-in or with other requests.  Although they are trained to provide you with the needed information that will be useful to know during your stay, at times that all the information might be verbally mentioned, which is why our guests are provided with welcome cards that are handed during check-in that do provide the same information; that same information is also posted around the lobby/room. I have spoken to our team members and can ensure that a situation as previously mentioned will not be repeated. We sincerely do apologize for any inconvenience this might have caused you and hope you would consider giving us another opportunity in the future. Best regards.

Summary: While I normally don't write reviews for my stays at hotels, I was very satisfied with my room, interactions with the staff, and overall stay. The check-in desk clerk was very nice, polite, and informative when it came to making sure all my questions were answered and recommended some popular places to visit during stay. The housekeeping staff were exceptionally nice and did a great job when attending to my room. The view is great and the beach is walking distnance which is amazing. I've seen people complain about highway noise, however, my room was facing the highway side and it was fairly quiet, the walls reduce the sound so it's hard to hear what's outside. I would say the overall hospitality here is great and I'm looking forward to coming back soon!
Manager Response: Hello Ryan S.,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a kind and generous review about your recent stay with us! We greatly appreciate any feedback that are guest are able to provide us with as we will be sure to share it with the rest of our team. Overall, we're really excited to hear that your stay went fantastic and without a hitch. Also that you really enjoyed the location of our hotel along with the amenities that are provided to our guest. San Clemente is a beautiful city with so many fun and local things to do, so it's great that you got to experience all of it! As for you positive comments, i'll definitely be sure to share them with our front desk and housekeeping team as i'm sure they'll be happy to hear them! We seriously and graciously hope you consider stopping by San Clemente again and choosing to stay with us! Have a fantastic week & safe travels! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: The staff was incredible and exprememly accommodating.The rooms were clean. I have teenagers so the closed doors between the livingroom and bedroom was nice. The breakfast was amazing. Eggs,patotoes, sausage, oatmeal, cereal, waffles, juice, coffee, bagels and toast. The staff kept it hot and stocked. The pool and jacuzi were very nice and clean. We had a room next to the freeway but didnt hear a thing.
Manager Response: Hi evensonmegan3,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at the Hampton Inn for your most recent trip. We really appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear that you really enjoyed your stay. Our complimentary breakfast is one of best around San Clemente, so we're happy to know that all of the options we have were fantastic and tasty. The layout of our rooms ensures that our guests feel comfortable while getting much needed privacy. We really hope that you choose to stay with us again if you return to San Clemente! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: Freeway noise and minor toilet problem
Summary: We stay at a lot of Hampton Inns. This one is a nice building with nice rooms and a good breakfast. A housekeeper was professionally excellent in letting me into my room when I forgot my key, only after matching the last name I gave her with the front desk, thankfully.   The big problem for me was freeway noise from I-5. I'm posting a photo from the balcony of my suite. It really kept me awake for a few hours, though my wife had a great sleep. If I stayed here again I'd get a room on the east side of the hotel and not on the south or north end.  A minor problem is that the toilet sometimes didn't get the job done. Solid wastes were, ahem, left in the bowl after flushing. And then the tank was filling so slowly that re-flushing didn't work unless one waited for a few minutes.
Manager Response: Hello Everjoyful,   Thank you for being a loyal Hampton by Hilton Guest! We appreciate you staying and are happy to hear you enjoyed our large rooms, full-hot breakfast and fun and professional staff. We appreciate you taking time to leave feedback about your stay and certainly recommend booking a room with 2 double beds and calling to request a golf-course view to potentially avoid the freeway in the future. We hope to see you again next time you visit San Clemente :)  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary: Property was close to our son and North gate of Camp Pendleton. Loved being so close to public beach with great walking trails! Hotel is great only item is carpet seems old but otherwise everything was great!
Manager Response: Hi esgriffith,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review based upon the recent stay you has with us. We're really excited to hear that your stay went great and that you were able to experience our famous hamptonality! Our location near the North Gate of Camp Pendleton makes us the perfect destination to be able to see your loved ones. We hope you appreciate our hospitality as well as the hospitality of San Clemente! Please be sure to stop by again soon! Best wishes to you and your family! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: This hotel is only a few blocks (3 minute walk) to the wedgewood wedding venue and golf course which made it super easy to attend my sisters wedding. The rooms were clean, service outstanding and breakfast yy
Manager Response: Hi lalaj950,  Congratulations on your sister's wedding! We're happy to hear that everything went great and that staying at the Hampton Inn made your event all the more better. We really appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review based upon your recent stay with us. We hope that you were able to experience our famous Hamptonality as well as our famous Hampton breakfast! Please do consider choosing to stay with us again if you are ever back in San Clemente! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: We had as such a great time last weekend, I want to thank the staff for creating such a great expierence. Rooms are huge and have TWO large tvs! I wasn't forced to watch football with the hubby. The hotel is older but is very charming and as mentioned the staff are outstanding. You can tell they really care here! We will be back in June :)
Manager Response: Hi G3129FSsarahp,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay with us. We're really focus on providing each guest with a wonderful and fantastic stay, all while experiencing our famous Hamptonality! We are happy to hear that you really enjoyed your stay as well as everything the hotel had to offer either from fantastic breakfast to it's hardworking staff. We greatly appreciate your feedback and will be sure to share it with our team. We can't wait to see you again soon! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: My daughters and I stayed here as a wedding (primary guest hotel) test run. She is getting married within walking distance, so before recommending we want to experience it ourselves. The proximity was great and the staff was friendly. The exterior is nice, but the rooms were very outdated. They seemed clean, but not overly impressive.
Manager Response: Hello Beachenit2022,  Congratulations to your daughters for her upcoming wedding! Thank you for staying with and taking the time to leave a review. We are sad to hear your visit wasn't as great it could be as we strive for a 5/5 experience and clearly fell short.  We will be sharing your feedback with the team as we continue to improve the overall experience in the future. We hope your daughters big day is a memorable one for all :)  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Highly recommend.
Summary: You’ll have great access to everything. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Great Pacific view. We loved our stay. Quick access to the interstate and to downtown. Rent a bike and go explore. You’ll have a great time.
Manager Response: Hi dcsom7,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay with us. We graciously appreciate any form of feedback and will surely be sure to share it with our team as well as with the appropriate department. Overall, we're really happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay as well as everything the hotel has to offer. San Clemente is a beautiful city and we're glad you were able to experience it all by choosing to stay with us. We hope that you consider staying with us again in the future! Take care! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: Spent 3 nights at the Hampton. Room was huge!!! We enjoyed every aspect of our stay, great location, great helpful staff, clean,and our room had a balcony which we loved. The hotel is closely located to plenty of conveniences, liquor stores, gas stations and restaurants
Manager Response: Hi Philneecha,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay with us here at the Hampton Inn. We sincerely appreciate any feedback provided to us as we always want to find ways to improve our guest experience. Rest assured, that the feedback you provided us with be shared with the appropriate team and department. We're super happy and excited to hear that your really enjoyed your stay with us as well as all the wonderful venues and locations that San Clemente has to offer! We really hope that you were able to experience our fantastic Hamptonality during your stay and will definitely consider choosing to stay with us again in the future! Take care and have a fantastic day! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: Location was perfect, the staff were very friendly, parking was great. Also anytime we ran into anyone from the cleaning staff they were always extremely helpful and friendly. You could tell they were smiling under their masks.
Manager Response: Hi Irpngns4lf,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay with us. We really appreciate any feedback as we always want to find positive ways to improve our guest experience. We're super excited to hear that your stay went fantastic and that you enjoyed the hospitality our team had to offer. Our goal is to ensure that every guest experiences our Hamptonality and feels like they're at their home away from home. We definitely appreciate your kind words and hope you consider choosing to stay with us again in the future! :)

Summary: Great location and service.  Room was spacious and had everything we needed. I would definitely recommend to others. The beach was very close by and there were many restaurants and cafés close by to choose from.
Manager Response: Hi kgarcia12021,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We really appreciate any feedback provided to us by our guest. We're ecstatic to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and really enjoyed the location of the hotel. San Clemente is a small   yet beautiful city that has a lot to offer. So we're glad to hear that you managed to do a lot while you stayed with us. It really helps that we're just a short drive from a lot of delicious restaurants and beautiful views. Overall we're happy you had a fantastic time and were able to experience our Hamptonality in person. We hope to see you again soon if you stop by San Clemente again!  - Hampton Inn & Suites, San Clemente Team

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is less than five minutes from the beach and restaurants. The staff were amazing. Housekeeping did an amazing job. The room is super clean and fresh sheets. Thank you Jackie and the rest of the staff!!
Manager Response: Hi Crux24,  First of all, I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us a post-stay review about your most recent stay with us. We sincerely appreciate any feedback you are able to provide us with and will be sure to share it with our team. Overall, we're extremely glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. San Clemente is a beautiful city and a wonderful place to be around. I'm happy to hear the hotel provided a wonderful centralized point for you to be able to experience everything. We really hope to choose to stay with us again soon & I'll be sure to share your high praise with Jackie as well!   - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: This hotel is a hidden treasure! My friends & I stayed here during one of their busiest weekends, apparently due to some festive. But the staff handled everything so well & helped us with any issues we had! The rooms were really spacious too compared to other hotels. It was definitely worth the price. Will definitely come again soon
Manager Response: Hi alexanderpickles,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your recent stay with us as we really do appreciate your feedback. We're ecstatic to hear you had a fantastic time with us during the Ohana Fest week as I know it can get pretty busy and hectic. But overall, we're glad to know that you enjoyed your stay and were able to experience our hamptonality first hand. Hope to see you again soon!   - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: Our Favorite spot to stay in San Clemente as a family! This hotel has ever you need- spacious rooms, delicious breakfast, pool/spa, and excellent service & value! On the Main Street in San Clemente as well so just minutes from everything
Manager Response: Hi Shurricesalazar,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your most recent stay. We're glad to hear that you really enjoyed staying with and interacting with not just our team members but also our beautiful city! We strive to make every stay a relaxing/great one and hope that you were able to experience our hamptonality first hand! We hope you will choose to stay with us again if your ever back in San Clemente!  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: The hotel is right next to the freeway.  Staff was polite but not very accommodating considering I’m a Diamond member, but I’m sure they had their reasons for no early or late check outs. Food was bland and just ok.  Rooms very clean and room was quiet since we were on the opposite side of the freeway.
Manager Response: Hi Greg,  Thank you for staying with us and taking a moment to leave a review. We certainly appreciate you being a diamond member and apologize we were unable to accommodate a early check-in/late check-out as those are based upon availability and we simply didn't have anything available during such a busy period. We hope you otherwise enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again next time!  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary: The gals and I were intown for the Ohana Fest weekend at Doheny Beach. We had a terrific time at the festival and staying at the Hampton. The rooms were suites so we had plenty of space to relax and have a few drinks before getting a ride to the festival. Breakfast was a godesend in the morning! Ubers can be hard to find in the area so just be aware of that. Staff was great and everything was clean. We will be staying again next year! See you then!!
Manager Response: Hi JuliaR8999,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a post stay review! We're excited to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and were able to experience our Hamptonality first hand especially during the busy weekend of Ohana Fest! We pride ourselves on making your stay as smooth and easy as possible so that you can enjoy your day! We're excited to hear your coming back and can't wait to see you again! :)  - Hampton Inn & Suites, San Clemente Team

Summary: Had a wonderful visit recently. It was our first trip since most the restrictions lifted. Room was big and clean. Breakfast was very yummy considering I heard a lot of places are only offering a to go bag. They had chicken and waffles! I was surprised to see they had 2 large TVs in the room, it was great for the kiddos. The hotel is dated but rooms were updated, I find most places by the beach are this way.
Manager Response: Hi Gogoangel334,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your most recent stay with us. We appreciate the compliments and feedback you left for us. I am also glad to hear you were able to experience our hamptonality first hand. We hope you consider staying with us again if you're ever in San Clemente! :)  - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: We visited San Clemente for a family wedding and stayed at the Hampton. It was very nice! Rooms were big clean and comfy. We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and found service to be excellent. In a town of mostly run down motels this place was a gem. We spent most the time at the beach or eating.
Manager Response: Hi techy9844,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your recent stay. We are glad to hear you enjoyed everything and were able to experience our Hamptonality first hand. Providing a wonderful and comfortable stay along with great service is something we definitely pride ourselves on. We hope we get to see you again soon if you ever stop by San Clemente! :)   - Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: Hotel is very over priced for what you get
Summary: The hotel is very old and needs to be updated.  The bathroom shower didn’t seem clean but I think it was because it’s old.  The beds are uncomfortable and hard.  The carpet is dirty. Definitely wouldn’t stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Kc8098,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review for us. We apologize and are very sorry that your stay with us wasn't so great. We definably strive to provide the best service and hamptonality each and every time, although it looks like we might have missed the mark during your stay. We appreciate the feedback you have provided and will be sure to share it with the appropriate team. We hope to see you again in the future so we can show you how great we can really be.  - The Hampton San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable and really big rooms.
Summary: Biggest rooms I have stayed in at that price point. We stayed for a wedding and all our rooms were very large. Beds were comfy and even had a pull out couch in a separate room!  Pool is small and so is jacuzzi but minor since it is fairly close to the ocean.
Manager Response: Hello Sellasdeb,  Thank you for taking the time in doing a review. We are so elated that you have enjoyed your stay here with us. We truly hope you the next time you are in town that you will choose to comeback and stay with us again.  -Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: The best deal for the best room in San Clemente/Dana Point area.
Summary: I have spent a lot of hotel time in this area.  I would never stay at my usual place (Hilton Doheny Beach) after they lost my reservation and we found this hotel an hour later with exactly what my sister and I wanted — a suite with living room and two beds.  The Hampton Inn and Suites is quieter because it’s in South San Clemente and $100/night cheaper.  It has covered parking with no fee,  no resort or hospitality fee,  perfectly designed rooms without a single flaw anywhere, free hot breakfast buffet.  Just a perfect place!
Manager Response: Hello Lynn,  We are so happy that you have enjoyed your stay here with us. We are glad that we are able to accommodate you. We hope this amazing experience that you have had here with us will have you come back and stay with us next time you are in town.  -Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: I would’ve preferred the gym to have more weights in it. And it would’ve been nice to have had more than one elevator. But otherwise the breakfast was good, the hotel was clean, and the staff was polite.And the location is very good.
Manager Response: Hello Marchomas2444,  Thank you so much for doing a review. We value and appreciate you for taking the time in doing so. We definitely take your concern to the appropriate department. We hope you do comeback so we can serve with our amazing Hamptonality experience.  -Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: This Hotel was just amazing. Amy was so nice and she made all of our accommodation to ensure we have a great stay. She needs a raise. The breakfast was delicious, I travel a lot and know most places are doing grab and go due to covid but here the food was hot and fresh. There were several places to sit in as well for breakfast. Housekeeping staff was amazing. My room was clean and I felt very safe. Coodles to them. Overall I had an amazing experience here.
Manager Response: Hello Manniej2021,  Thank you for taking the time to do a survey. We ae so happy that you enjoyed our amazing Hamptonality experience. Amy is a very valued employee here and we know she will giver her best to ensure that her guest are beyond happy. We look forward to having you here again with us.   -Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: I took my grandson on his first trip and so glad we stayed at this Hampton Inn. The Team made our visit so memorable. Shout out to the Housekeeping Team for a CLEAN beyond clean room. And the Front Desk Team, WOW. It doesn’t get any better than this. Stay at this property. You’ll be glad you did.  Super shout out to Robbie at the FD!!!! Thank you so much for your kindness!!! You all rock!
Manager Response: Hello Passport49086963431,  We are so happy that we were able to give our amazing Hamptonality experience and you enjoyed it. We honestly do mean it when we say " Making you happy makes us happy". Robbie is a raising star here at Hampton Inn and we loved that you were able to see his shine from check in to check out. Thank you so much for taking the time to do a review for us we sincerely appreciate it. We look forward to hosting you here again next time you are in town.  Best, Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary: The facility could use some updating.  For the price I would hope for something a little nicer.  Great view of the ocean on one side of the hallway on the third floor.  Great restaurants nearby.  Antoines Cafe is amazing for brunch.
Manager Response: Hello Carlkerby2021,  Thank you for taking the time in doing a review. We truly appreciate your feedback and will bring up what you have brought to our attention to the appropriate department. Thank you again and we hope you have a wonderful day.  -Hampton Inn San Clemente

Summary: My sister and I loved visiting San Clemente and we also loved our suite room 313. We had an ocean view over the freeway. Herman was a very nice man, the ladies that worked breakfast were great too. Loved the quiet time at the pool too.
Manager Response: Hello Rlnielsen2021,  Thank you so much for taking the time to do a survey. We truly appreciate the rating you have given us. We strive to give all our guest the best experience possibly. We are so happy that you felt it. Herman is a treasure here we are so happy he was able to help in making your experience even more enjoyable.  We look forward to hosting you and your sister again in the near future.   -Hampton Inn San Clemente

Summary: Great view of the ocean - the entire room felt clean. Great air conditioning and breakfast  Use the Hilton app and the digikey, checkin and checkout features are so easy.  I like that they cleanliness stickers placed over areas cleaned
Manager Response: Hello Dennislemieux,  We are so happy you have had a great stay. We strive to make sure all of our guest experience our amazing Hamptonality experience. We are so glad you felt it and enjoyed. We can't wait to have you back next time you are in town.  -Hampton San Clemente Team

Summary: We had a wonderful stay. The room price was very reasonable and the room was well appointed. The beds were comfortable. We had lots of space and lots of little conveniences like bedside plugs for phones and in room coffee. The included breakfast is very nice with lots of delicious options.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  I would definitely recommend this location if you need a place to stay in San Clemente.
Manager Response: Hello 588susik,  We are so pleased to hear you had a wonderful and enjoyed our recently upgraded bedside furniture (we know in this digital world you can't have enough plugs!). Thanks for taking a moment to leave us a great review, we really appreciate you staying and hope to see you next again soon :)  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary: Great little hotel near everything you need. Its a little older but because of that I feel the rooms are bigger than normal. The staff was always on point and we found the place to be clean. My wife and I were celebrating our anniversary and it was the perfect first getaway in a long while.
Manager Response: Hello llstronger,  Thank you for staying with us. Looks like you had a great stay and we are super happy you chose to celebrate your anniversary with us ! Thank you for the great feedback and allowing us to be a part of your big moment. We look forward to seeing you again soon :)  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary: We were in town visiting friends and family and love staying at this Hampton. Rooms are large and well maintained. Service was great and we enjoyed some relaxation by the pool. The staff here is super friendly and very accommodating. We would recommend this place to any of our family members.
Manager Response: Thank you SherryO88989 for the amazing review you left for us! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to having you stay with us again soon.   Thank you,  Hampton Inn team

Summary: Whatever you do don't stay on the freeway side of the hotel.  Windows are not soundproof at all and you will hear the freeway all night.  We tried to run the a/c to drown out the sound of the freeway but the a/c is so old and noisy it was awful.  One of the worst night sleep I've had in a long time.  The fan in the bathroom also made a loud screeching sound when you turned the light on.  The carpet was coming up at the seem.  Hotel was not making sure all guests had their masks on when entering the lobby and using the elevators.  I was pretty shocked about it all.  It was really the most run down Hampton Inn I've ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at our hotel. We are sorry to hear that your stay did not go as planned. We strive to deliver an amazing Hamptonality experience for all our guests and we evidently let you down. Thank you for providing us feedback regarding the issues you experienced. We will certainly be addressing the feedback with the appropriate teams. We hope to see you again in the future so we can show just how great we can be.  Thank you,  Hampton Inn team

Summary: We spent to celwbrate our daughters 9th birthday away from home.  What a pleasant surpise to enter the lobby with a sign that acknowledged her day.  Then We entered the room to a really cute bag of goodies and a card signed by all the staff. Made her feel so special. Only downside was we couldn't get the tv to work in one fo the rooms but definitely not a deal breaker. Thank you so much for the special weekend.
Manager Response: Hi Dralbneve,  We are so excited you chose to celebrate your daughters 9th birthday with us! We are glad you enjoyed the surprise and goodie bag. Making our guests feel like they are home away from home is one of our top goals. Our apologies about the TV, we hope you were able to connect with the Front desk to help you get it online during your stay. We certainly loved hosting you all and hope we get to see you again real soon :)  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary Heading: Friendly and helpful staff, bad experience
Summary: We stayed here to visit friends and family. Location is close enough to everything if driving but not so much of walking. Our room and whole floor reeked of marijuana the entire stay, and the cleanliness in the room was lacking. Brown spots on the ceiling gave me an uneasy feeling when going to sleep and when I tried to iron, a whole bunch of black stuff sprayed all over my white shirt right before having to go to dinner. On top of that we didn’t get housekeeping service even once, and the bed was very firm and uncomfortable.  The pros: staff is very friendly and helpful and breakfast is on point.
Manager Response: Hello P3952QOjosephp,  Thank you for staying with us and taking a moment to write a review. We sincerely apologize your stay wasn't as great as it should have been. We certainly understand how other guests’ habits in their rooms can have an effect on the comfort of your stay. We will be sharing your feedback with the appropriate team regarding the issues you encountered. Housekeeping service is provided upon request when scheduled the night before per current Hilton COVID standards as noted in the welcome letter and window clings in the room. We certainly apologize if you did schedule this and it was missed and will be addressing this with the team as well. Again, we apologize your stay wasn't great and will use this feedback to continue to make improvements. We thank you for your valuable time and hope you have a great week! Safe travels :)  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary Heading: A great stay in a beautiful location!
Summary: Our stay was very comfortable and we loved the proximity to multiple beaches, stores, and activities. We were a 15 minute walk to San Clemente State Beach, a 15 minute drive to Dana Harbor, and an hour drive to San Diego (to the USS Midway). Traffic on I-5 was easy and we had such a great time. Costco and Wal-Mart were both about 10-15 minutes away, as well as the San Clemente Outlet Mall. We also had plenty to eat with the hot grab and go breakfast each morning.
Manager Response: Hi isaacsonadam6!  Thank you so much for staying with us and taking the time to leave us a review on Tripadvisor. We are super happy to hear you had a great stay. We love being in the center of everything and are glad you found that convenient too. We hope to see you again next time you next time you visit Southern California :)  Best,  The Hampton SC Team

Summary Heading: An outdated and uncared for hotel
Summary: I'll keep this concise. My family and I traveled to SoCal for spring break and chose this hotel. Here is what we experienced:  1) A clearly old and outdated property/room. Paint on the ceiling was badly done, and there were cracks between walls and ceilings. 2) Bathroom: Shower head was very old and low which will be an issue for anyone over 5'8". Also the water pressure was bad. 3) Balcony had no lighting available, which is a problem at night time. 4) There was a cockroach near the bed!!  Would we come back here? No. There are better and newer hotels available bit further away in similar price range.
Manager Response: Hello Nick,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us. We are saddened to hear that you did not enjoy your stay and sincerely apologize that your spring break was not the spectacular success like it was meant to be. We strive to deliver an amazing Hamptonality experience for all our guests and we evidently let you down. Thank you for providing us feedback regarding the issues you experienced. We will certainly be addressing the feedback with the appropriate teams. We hope to see you again in the future so we can show just how great we can be :) Best,  The Hampton SC Team

Summary: We had an amazing time at the Hampton Inn at San Clemente! This is where we stayed for 4 nights along with some of our wedding party who stayed 2 and 3 nights. This was conveniently located right across the venue/golf course... and I’m so glad we chose this place! The free breakfast in the morning had an assortment of eggs, bacon, waffles, bagels, muffins, fruit, sometimes French toast! My husband and I entered our large room overlooking the golf course, and we received the sweetest welcome note! Staying at the Hampton Inn definitely helped curb my wedding jitters and our rooms were clean (which is super important during this Pandemic). There were touchless hand sanitizers everywhere and we received the best care from Zak and Nyshon and they checked on us regularly to make sure
Manager Response: Hello 688Kristeni,  We are so elated that we were able to aid in making your wedding a success. Our staff members here strives to give all of our guest the best Hamptonality experience possible. We are so happy that you and your family were able to receive it. We look forward to have you stay with us again in your  future stay here in San Clemente.   -Hampton Inn San Clemente

Summary: I usually really like this hotel, but our room this time smelled like old urine, not cool. I'm not sure if it's because of covid, maybe they don't do a full cleansing of the room after guests leave. But it smelled like someone peed on the floor near the desk area, it was the strongest in that area.
Manager Response: Hi G8027NRrachelc,  We are so sorry to hear your stay wasn't great and you encountered during your visit. We absolutely complete a full clean and sanitization of all rooms between check-out and check-ins as cleanliness is one of our top priorities. We hope you were able to raise any issues you had with the Front Desk during your stay and that they were able to take care of it for you. Thank you for bringing this information to our attention we appreciate it and will be addressing appropriately.   Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary: This two night stay was a gift for my brother-in-law and his wife. They truly enjoyed their stay and shared that the room was clean & comfortable, the property is not far from the pier and is near great restaurants. Safe Covid practices are in place, the staff was friendly and they felt welcomed at check in. One of the managers, Nyshon, assisted me with necessary paperwork to gift the stay to our family. Because of this, check in and check out went smoothly. My husband and I stay here ever year for our anniversary and and expected nothing less than a rave review of their time here. We look forward to our return visit... hoping sooner than later. :)
Manager Response: Hello Yvette, we are so elated we were abled assist with the Valentine/Birthday gift to your in laws. We look forward to your stay with us.

Summary: My girlfriend and I usually arrive at this great location around 7-8PM, and Hermann is always there to greet us! He goes above and beyond when it comes to accommodations and hospitality. HSKP does a great job as well!
Manager Response: Hi Eak1997,  Thank you so much for staying with us and taking  a moment to leave a great review. We are so happy to hear Herman provided you with an exceptional Hampton experience (we think he's pretty awesome too!). We will be sure to pass along your props to Herman and the Housekeepers. We look forward to hosting you again next time!  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary: From check in to breakfast and checkout this hotel has it. Friendly staff, very clean, and great breakfast. I travel a lot because of work and the breakfast in most hotels are just average but at this Hampton it was great. I will be returning back.
Manager Response: Hi MannieN90,  Thank you so much for leaving a great review. We are happy to see you had a great time  from beginning to end. Times are a little rough and look a little different than before and we certainly strive to give you the greatest experience possible. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Everyone was helpful at front desk. Break was okay but better before pandemic. Would stay again. Will be back to Hampton inn or other Hilton properties after the pandemic is over. Swimming pool was nice for kids.  Social distancing was followed strictly which was nice.
Manager Response: Dear jgee887404,  We thank you for your review on your visit although we are sorry to hear that the recent Irvine fires are what brought you down to us in October. We're happy to hear that our team took care of you and made you comfortable during our time. We certainly miss the hot, made to order waffles that Hampton was so famous for too! Our team is certainly working diligently to offer the best experience they can and we hope to do so with our elevated breakfast options with a hot item dished up daily. Still not a bad way to start the day!  We hope you will get the opportunity to visit us for a leisure visit next time. Think of us again the next time you are down in San Clemente. Take care and stay safe!  Best, Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay under not so ideal conditions
Summary: The Hampton Inn did a nice job in protecting its guests from the COVID-19 fallout.  The room was spacious and the garage parking very convenient.  The one downside is the stairway does not extend to the lower floor.  Other than that small inconvenience, the stay was enjoyable and the staff very accommodating.
Manager Response: Good evening, Mr. T!  Thank you so very much for staying with us in San Clemente recently. We're so very happy to hear that the two of you had a pleasant visit and you felt like sharing! Our team is doing all that they can to make guests feel safe and comfortable and yet like things haven't changed. Our dedication to providing great guest experiences certainly hasn't! We hope you will think of us again the next time you travel down to Southern California. We'll be happy to see you again!  Warmest regards, Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente Team

Summary: We visit this hotel three to four times a year. It's like my second home. I love the staff! It's not the most luxurious of the Hilton chain but it's an amazing location with convenient access and really helpful people.
Manager Response: Hi D2061LTbobbyc,  We are thrilled to hear you had a great time and appreciate the great review! We look forward to continuing to be your home away from home and look forward to welcoming you back real soon!  Best, The Hampton SC Team

Summary: Wonderful friendly and helpful  staff, extremely clean rooms. Easy access to beaches and shopping. Strict adherence to COVID -19 guidelines and they managed a decent breakfast given the constraints. Great value for the price. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mema805  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review of your recent visit with us. We are beyond thrilled that you enjoyed your visit; especially during these different times. Hopefully you were able to spend lots of time at the beach and shopping. It has been such amazing beach weather. Thank you again Mema805 for the wonderful review and we hope that you come back and stay with us again!

Summary: Last year, my husband and I spent our honeymoon in San Clemente last year at this hotel and returned for a five night stay for our one year anniversary. The property was completely booked due to holiday weekend, so there was a slight delay in checking in to our room. Amy and Herman were great. Even behind their masks, you could tell they smiled as they quickly but efficiently checked in guests. They were apologetic for the check in delay, but able to accommodate our request for a balcony and presented us bottles of wine and apple cider to celebrate our anniversary. Because of the pandemic, we handled the upkeep of the room for our stay. However, the housekeeping staff was friendly in getting any extra towels or toiletries we needed. The room was clean and so was the pool and
Manager Response: Dear 194yvette,  We're so happy to see reviews such as yours; we all certainly crave any return to days past and what a great way to relive a beautiful memory! Thank you for choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente for these happy occasions. It will be nice to know that we'll get to celebrate with you for many more years to come! We appreciate your special recognition of our team who continues to give it their all and make each guest experience the best they can. We truly appreciate your time in leaving this review and sharing your experience with us all. We're here for you and certainly look forward to seeing you next year, although you can always come back and visit again sooner :p  Take care and stay safe. Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente Team

Summary: We had a great time. Check in was so fast and easy. Herman and Amy were really nice and informative. We only stayed one night but were very happy with the service and how nice everybody was. Even the French Toast sticks were really good.
Manager Response: Greetings, nathansY6314MF!  We can't thank you enough for staying with us in San Clemente for your recent getaway. It's great to hear some particular members of our team took extra good care of you two; we'll definitely pass your kudos along. Besides a great night's sleep (hopefully you got that as well in Hilton beds), a tasty breakfast is the next important way to start the day!  We hope you will think of us here at Hampton Inn & Suites next time you are looking for a bit of R&R. We'll be here for you! ;) Best regards, Gabby, Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Great Hotel - Wonderful Staff - Love Our Time Here
Summary: My friend and I has the most wonderful experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente. They are very strict on wearing masks and keeping social distancing, which I appreciated. The room was really nice, we had a suite, the beds and bedding were super comfortable.  Best sleep for my back and neck that I have had for a long time.  The staff was wonderful, caring, calm and polite.  We were very grateful for a simple breakfast of cereals, fruit burritos etc. After a couple of days they implemented hot food, simple with eggs and bacon.  the staff said they wanted to do a little extra for guests. It has been hard for everyone at this time of Covid 19 Virus. I appreciate all those who work in hotels to provide service the best they can.  Before our trip we did alot of research
Manager Response: Good morning, Nirupsedona! Reviews like this make our hospitality spirits soar any time, but even more so during these turbulent and ever-changing times. We opened up from a 3-month closure back in late June and we have been working diligently on getting "back to normal". We're happy to hear that you two got to enjoy some of the additions to our complimentary breakfast during your visit. After all, a great night's rest and a yummy breakfast are the best way to start vacation!  We truly appreciate the detailed review of our property and the surrounding South County area. What better way to share with our future guests then through someone who has experienced San Clemente; you! Thank you for recognizing our team who has put so much energy in to welcoming our guests back and making them feel like they are still at home here at Hampton. We definitely could not pull it all off without them! We certainly look forward to seeing you ladies once more then next time you visit San Clemente. We'll be here for you next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: Gabby (manager?) is super personable and friendly, and we just felt like she knew us.  Some employees did not have masks fully on and did not distance.  Hotel location is good - we were on the golf course side.  It is away from downtown, but walkable to restaurants and surf shops.  However, we were by the ice machine which we could hear all the time.  The AC turning on & off was very loud (clunky).  Nice that they had 2 breakfast options, but we only made it to grab & go at 6am, since we were surfing.  It would be nice if the 2nd breakfast were open until 11am.
Manager Response: Good evening, Mrs. W.!  Thanks so much for selecting the Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente for your recent getaway. We appreciate all of your feedback and will definitely follow up with our team to ensure they are following the current guidelines for the hotel properly. We're sorry to hear that particular room did not meet all that you were looking for in a restful stay. Our team is on hand 24/7 to make sure everything is right with your stay so please feel free to reach out any time during (or even before) your stay so we can get you the right room. We hope you two will join us again the next time the waves are calling your name; we'd love to host you again next time!  Best regards, Gabby, Hampton Inn & Suites SC Team

Summary: My Delta flights, Hampton by Hilton accommodations, Jeep rental by Enterprise, and service personnel for the entire adventure were beyond excellent. Despite heightened Covid restrictions, I was treated with exceptional kindness, greeted warmly through masks, and constantly checked with to make sure my needs were being met and exceeded.
Manager Response: K5061TDambera,  Sounds like you got the whole package deal! We're happy to hear that all aspects of your travel were top-notch. Despite some of the changes brought on by the pandemic situation, our commitment to providing the very best for our guests has never changed! It was our pleasure to host you during your visit; after all, that's what we're here for! We hope this experience will make your decision easy for the next time you are visiting San Clemente. We'll be here for you next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Hampton Inn & Suites SC

Summary: We stayed 4 days and spent most of the time surfing.  The rooms are amazing.  Beds and pillows are super comfortable. Rooms had balconies. Staff was nice. Parking is convenient.  Breakfast was grab and go cereal and snacks due to Covid. Convenient location with lots of stuff nearby. Pool area is very small. We will check here first when we're in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings, Greg!  We are so happy to hear that your whole family enjoyed their weekend visit with us. What better way to start a sunny day at the beach than with a great night's sleep and breakfast in the morning. We've been working hard to add items to breakfast  that will fill our guests' hunger but also keep in conjunction with local health regulations. We appreciate your understanding while we navigate this unfamiliar territory.  Thank you so much for considering making the Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente your go-to spot for your next visit. We certainly look forward to seeing you all again when you hit the beach.  Take care until next time! Gabby, HISSC Team

Summary: From the moment I checked in this old man was being very rude, but what REALLY got to me was when my husband and I order Uber eats and the guy left our stuff in the front and the old man named Herman I believe called my room and told husband “I think there’s food here for you, come get or I’m gonna throw it away” like wtf, and to top it off when my husband got down there he asked why he said he was going to throw it away and the old man says “well a dark man with a accent brought it and I didn’t trust him” like OMG WTFFFF! When we checked out we told the woman in the front (who was super sweet) her name was Amy and she helped a lot, it turns out the people in front of us in line had an issues with him too...
Manager Response: Dear Iris,  Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback regarding your visit with us this past weekend. First and foremost, I apologize  for the uncomfortable situation you and your husband were put in to during your stay. The behavior described is not the normal standard here nor is it tolerated. We will be speaking to the parties involved to address and correct the conduct. While it may be difficult, we appreciate your time in recounting the situation as we always endeavor to be better. Thank you for recognizing Amy’s efforts to send you and your husband off on a positive note. Please know you can always reach out to myself or the general manager so we can be sure to take care of you two should you choose to give us another chance.   Thank you again for your time. We hope to host you again and offer you the more genuine and true Hampton experience.  Warm regards, Gabby, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed the proximity to the beach as well as the nearby food selections. Easy fwy access and pleasant staff. Plenty of parking available, either in the structure or in the parking lot. Even though it is in the shadow of the fwy, the hotel still had a decent view of the ocean from it's balcony.
Manager Response: Greetings, V4520QFroyb  Thank you so much for enjoying your visit here in San Clemente with us. We really appreciate your time in sharing your experience with us all! It's so important, especially in times such as these, to enjoy your time away and have some fun. We are thrilled to hear our hotel provided the right combination of location and access to make your trip a little more convenient. Please think of us again the next time the beaches of San Clemente and the sun call out to you. We'll be here for your next visit!  Best regards, Gabby, Hampton Inn & Suites SC

Summary: Booked two double queen rooms here. Some of my family got a room facing the golf course and said they had a balcony and it was quiet and wonderful. We had a room facing the road. It was loud, no balcony, and the bed wasn't comfortable. And I usually am ok in any kind of bed. Family in the other room didn't have any issues with the bed, so recommend asking for a room facing the golf course. The room was large and had a nice sitting area. The Covid breakfast was take-away only: yogurt, string cheese, and prepackaged pastries like blueberry muffins you could bring to your room.
Manager Response: Good morning, Runawayturle,  Thank you for choosing and spending the weekend with us in San Clemente. Our rooms either look over to the ocean or face the San Clemente Municipal Golf Course with a variety of balcony set ups. We apologize that you didn't get a room with quite the set up you were looking for. For your next visit, we invite you to give us a call prior to arrival so we can try and best accommodate you in a room that fits your wants and needs! Since reopening, we have added more items to our breakfast to create a variety for our guests to begin their day. We hope you and your family will join us again on your next visit to the beach!  Best regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn SC Team

Summary: We decided to book this hotel. Breakfasts grab and go with stale muffins. They take advantage of COVID-19 for not serving hot normal breakfast, there’s no reason for them not to do it. They offered us microwaveable hot something.  Pool also closed. Our friends the ones stay down the road from this hotel, their pools are open. This hotel didn't  tell us about breakfast and pool not until a day before check in. Stinky room!  Very disappointed!
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Lidya Thank you for selecting the Hampton Inn San Clemente during your recent getaway weekend. We hope you got to enjoy the sunny weather and the local beaches that attract so many people each weekend. We apologize that your experience fell short of your expectations. We recently reopened our hotel to guests after a three month closure. As we have begun operations, we have done our very best to implement procedures and amendments to our amenities to keep both our guests and team safe. At this current time, we are not able to safely social-distance our pool and have had to make the difficult decision to remain closed for now. We are following all brand-approved guidelines for our housekeeping and breakfast services to enhance our guests’ comfort and enjoyment as best as possible. We appreciate any feedback we can utilize to enhance our unique Hampton Inn experience. We hope you will give us another chance to make a better impression when our hotel and the rest of the area settle in to a more pleasant “normal”.   Stay safe and best regards, Gabby, Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: awesome location, great hotel with spacious rooms, loved it. Gabby at the front desk was awesome and had us checked in within minutes. Even with Corona provided a good breakfast. minutes to the beach by foot or golf. plenty to do all around this hidden gem. thanks Hampton!!! Def coming back next time, yewww!!
Manager Response: Hello, whiskeytalls!  Thanks so much for the awesome review; it really made our day! After a three month closure and recent reopening, we are doing all we can to welcome our guests back to a safe and fun environment. We are so happy you all had an enjoyable visit with us. Thank you also for the personal mention! I think I can speak for the team when I say we are so thrilled to be providing great experiences to our guests during this time. We certainly look forward to seeing you on your next visit out to San Clemente. We'll be here for you!  Warm regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn SC Team

Summary: Staff was friendly. Room was nice. I could tell the room was recently remodeled. My wife stepped on a broken screw or tack that was in the carpet. Hotel sits right on the I-5. Not sure if I can give a fair review due to Covid-19 putting a buzz-kill on our stay. Also, the alley/street behind the hotel is used by run-down rv’ers/beach bums to sleep at night.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, 375cboard  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us here in San Clemente. We are glad you and your family enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms but ouch! We are sorry to hear that screw went unnoticed by our team and we'll certainly make adjustments to keep a sharp eye out for any remaining remnants of our remodel. We are following hotel as well as local guidelines to keep our guests and team safe during these uncertain times. Hopefully you were able to enjoy the beautiful weather and local beaches during your visit.   Please keep us in mind next time you are visiting San Clemente and as things become more stable around the area. We will look forward to improving upon your last visit. Excellent service and great night stays are what we are all about!  Stay safe and we look forward to seeing you next time. Best regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn SC Team

Summary: The hotel couldn't have been nicer, friendlier, or more helpful as we planned and carried out our daughter's wedding nearby.  I think half the hotel was there for our wedding!  The staff really accommodated our guests.  Thank you!
Manager Response: alindsey63, hello!  Your kind words touch our hearts and we are so grateful! It is the best thing to hear now more then ever. No matter what is happening in the world, our team is here to make our guests feel welcome and like they are at home. We are so happy we were able to deliver that and help you all celebrate this momentous occasion! Keep the happy memories coming and please visit us again in San Clemente when you all are ready to visit next time, no matter the reason. We'll be here to welcome you back again.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: The staff made our stay amazing!
Summary: This hotel was clean, conveniently located, and the staff was top notch. Check in was a breeze and the gal at the front desk was accommodating and very friendly. We were able to check in early without any haste. Once checked in they called up to make sure our room was ok, never had that before. Our room was clean, spacious and full of light, it was perfect fo our family of four. We came during spring break, right when the coronavirus became scary, the staff was very accommodating on keeping us up to date with new cleaning procedures and taking extra steps to keep everyone safe and germ free. Oh... free cookies at 5pm and the breakfast is free and pretty dang good. 10/10 would recommend and we will be coming back.
Manager Response: Good morning, Heatherdeyoung23!  Your fantastic review is certainly a bright spot in our day. We truly appreciate your time in sharing your stay with us all.  We are happy to hear you and your family were still able to enjoy some time away and that our Hampton Inn location was just the perfect fit for you all. Our all-suites style rooms are perfect for families traveling together; everyone can enjoy a little peace and quiet!  We are certainly doing the very best to keep both our team and our guests happy and healthy during these uncertain times. At the moment, we are taking certain precautions and additional measures to prevent the possible spread of germs. This means reducing or eliminating certain foods in our complimentary breakfast as well as our free evening cookies. We are certainly looking forward to returning to normal operations in the near future! We hope you will choose to stay with us again during that time.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn Team

Summary: Great location, stayed here to visit someone on Pendleton north. Lots to do close by, and all of the staff were above and beyond courteous. Room was clean, and comfy, and just the right amount of white noise from the highway.
Manager Response: Good morning, sonyaz934!  Thank you so much for writing this review; it made us smile on this rainy day! Your feedback is greatly appreciated. There are plenty of options here in San Clemente and we are thrilled to hear that our Hampton Inn location was the best fit for you during your visit.   Our spot near the 5 freeway does not get too crowded. There's just enough noise to lull you to sleep at night! For those that are a little more sensitive to outside noises, we do have rooms facing the San Clemente Municipal Golf Course that can be quieter. Our front desk team always tries to find the perfect fit for every guest!  We hope you will join us again, sonyaz934, the next time you are in the area. Our cozy beds, tasty breakfast, and fantastic team will be here for you again next trip!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: Great and comfortable rooms and excellent service
Summary: I stayed at the Hampton inn for a week for business  Such great and wonderful service, nice daily breakfast. Rooms are clean and spacious, lots of parking spaces available. Both day and night staff are very helpful, internet service though was a hit spotty at times but aside from that wonderful place
Manager Response: Good morning, bahaamouriss  We cannot thank you enough for such a glowing review! We so very much reading about our job well done. There are many places to stay here in San Clemente but we are so pleased you found your home away from home with us at the Hampton Inn. Our suite-style rooms, complimentary breakfast, business center, wi-fi access, free parking, and much, much more, make a great stay, no matter how long. Our team and comfortable property will be here to welcome you again next time you are in town!  Warmest regards, Gabby Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn

Summary: Realize if you want quiet you need to book a room in the back side of the hotel.  The ocean view rooms were touted as a great thing.  The only problem is that there is an Interstate between you and the view.  So you a great view of that as well, and all the noise.
Manager Response: Greetings,  cweikel2020  Thank you so much for your time in leaving us your feedback from your recent visit with us in San Clemente. We hope you enjoyed your time with us and found our suites to be comfortable and cozy. Of course, being only about one and a half miles from the beach, you might want to spend all your time lounging out in the sun and sand!  We are sorry to hear that the I-5 freeway interfered a bit with enjoying the ocean view from your room. As you said yourself, there are additional options that may be better suited for those who are more sensitive to traffic noises. Fortunately, those rooms on the opposite side of the hotel face the lovely and lush San Clemente Municipal Golf Course! We hope these two different options can provide all of our guests with a beautiful view of the area, no matter where their room is located!  We do hope you will give us another opportunity next time you are visiting the area. Our friendly team will be here to take care of you and ensure you have the best room for your needs.  Best regards, Gabby Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn San Clemente

Summary: We stayed in a two queen suite, the room had a nice separate living room  with sofa, chair, tv, fridge, sink, microwave. Super clean, except for the windows which were smudgy all over. Beds were ok, not super comfy.  Breakfast good, Wi-Fi , 2-3 bars. Rooms on the back of the hotel all have balconies overlooking a golf  course, and are quieter. You can open the sliding door to get fresh air. Some of the front rooms have ocean views, but the Windows are sealed to keep out the freeway noise.(You are RIGHT on the I5) A couple of front rooms on each end appear to have balconies, not sure if those doors open. Small pool and hot tub. Short drive to dining, beaches of pier. Nice overall stay.
Manager Response: Good evening, 307kayk!  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave this Trip Advisor review regarding your recent visit with us in San Clemente. We greatly enjoy reading our guest's feedback as it provides us an opportunity to revel in what we do right and perhaps adjust some things that may need tweaking. Every review is a chance to make our guest's experience even better!  You are correct; we do have rooms facing both the San Clemente Municipal golf course as well as the ocean. The rooms on the golf course side do all have balconies while there are a handful of rooms on the ocean side that do not. However, the remaining rooms on the ocean side that do feature a balcony all have sliding doors so you can catch some of that fresh sea breeze! While we may be located near the major 5 freeway, San Clemente is a quiet, beach community and we do not have quite as much of that famous Southern California traffic in our area!  Thank you once again for such a kind and thorough review of your visit! We surely appreciate you sharing this with not just the hotel staff, but also all those who look to Trip Advisor. We hope you and your family will join us again the next time you find yourself in the area. The Hampton Inn San Clemente will be here for you next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Hampton Inn San Clemente Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful rooms for a hotel just one problem that needs to be addressed
Summary: This is the third trip and the longest 29 days to be exact. Beautiful rooms front of house is great but, there is one major problem that seriously needs to be addressed your housekeeping staff needs to be retrained or taught what the standards of hospitality is to include manners like when someone asked you if you could please stop talking so loud right out in front of their door that means stop and move it down the hall.  I was working six days a week about 14 hours a day and Sundays was my only day of rest every single Sunday 4 in a row at 0645-1130 there were 3 to 4 housekeepers that would stand right outside my door and all around us we would have the quiet please tags on. Now you would think basic hospitality and commonsense would tell you you probably shouldn’t be standing
Manager Response: Dear Cbeck239,  Good morning, and thank you very much for taking the time to leave us a review of your stay. We welcome all feedback, both positive and critical, as this allows us to better ourselves for you, our guest. Our team takes great pride in helping all of our guests feel comfortable and welcome during their time with us, and I am so very sorry that we missed the mark with your stay. While our team is one of the friendliest and caring teams around, I am very sorry that you felt unheard. We will certainly look into this matter and ensure that we are all aware of noise levels during the more quiet times of the morning.  Again, we thank you for your business, and for taking the time to give us feedback from your stay. We do hope that  you will give us another try when you are back in the area, as we would love another opportunity to "wow" you with our support and care.  Sincerest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: Super clean room, comfy beds, very friendly and helpful. It really is a great place to stay. Breakfast is better than the usual hotel breakfast and since I traveled alone with my kids, I really appreciate that we felt safe. We stayed there before and will stay there again. Highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you 378monikan for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review on our hotel. We are so glad to hear that you and your kids had a great time with us. Hopefully you were able to explore some of beautiful San Clemente while you were here. Thank you again 378monikan and see you next time.

Summary: The place was great but on my days off the house keeping staff would stand out in front of my room and talk loud as hell! Don’t think they will just let u sleep on the weekends even with your sign on the door.   But over all I thought it was good to go
Manager Response: Thank you chriseI4080SI for leaving us a kind review on our hotel. We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Enjoy the rest of your weekend and we will see you next time your in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn San Clemente - Very Nice Stay
Summary: This was a very convenient Hampton Inn, as our event was up the road in Dana Point. The staff here is outstanding. Thank you Andrew and everyone else!  There was a noise issue with a water pipe feeding one of the hotel A/C systems, so we moved to the adjoining room. Everything was quiet and comfortable. The beach was a short walk away; it was nice to take an evening stroll down there.  The hotel was right off an exit for I-5, very convenient.   We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Good Morning Dennis E We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay with us and that we were super close to the event you were going too! I am sorry to hear that there was a noise issue with the first room that you stayed in, but I am so glad to hear that Andrew was here to help you out and get you in another room.  Well Thank you again and we will see you again soon!  Amy Gonzalez

Summary: The place was very clean, quiet, and conveniently located right off the highway. The staff was very friendly and the hotel is fairly small. I would definitely stay there again when traveling for work.
Manager Response: Thank you  FrequentWorkTravelR for the review on our hotel. We are so glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay here with us and that you were able to meet some of friendly staff here at the hotel. We hope to see you next time your back in the area for work.   Thanks again,  Amy Gonzalez

Summary: I had a very pleasant stay.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating! The warm cookies every day at 5:15 was the icing on the cake! Definitely recommend others to stay. Walking distance to alot of restaurants and super markets.
Manager Response: Thank you yeseniam362 we are thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. There are definelty some amazing restaurants located in our downtown area of San Clemente. Hopefully you were able to check out Fisherman's restaurant on the pier. It has such an amazing view of the ocean and for dessert the warm cookies that we offer at the hotel.   Thanks again and we hope to see you your next stop back in San Clemente! Amy Gonzalez

Summary Heading: I love the San Clemente Hampton Inn!
Summary: I have stayed at this property every month for the past 1.5 years.  The staff is the best and the property is always spotless.  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the San Clemente area.
Manager Response: Dear Stacey2023,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire Hampton Family team, we would like to take a moment to extend to you a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a lovely and kind review. We are beyond thrilled to hear your kind words, and please know that you are considered a part of our family. We love to see you and your husband come through our doors, and it's been such a joy to get to know you these past 1.5 years! Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your kindness and kind words, and we look forward to continuing to being your home away from home! We'll see you soon, and until then, I hope that you have an absolutely wonderful week!  Kindest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This hotel is the best given the price. It is located close to the beach. The front desk welcome is really excellent.  All the accommodations are very good and the house cleaning service is also very good as well .
Manager Response: Thank you deb0rahpr0sser for the excellent review on our hotel. We are so glad that you got to meet some of our wonderful staff here at the Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us and we hope to see you back on your next trip in San Clemente.   Thank you,  Amy

Summary: One of the nicest places I’ve stayed at!...Beautiful room, great location, awesome breakfast, great customer service, great price. I couldn’t ask for anything more.  I will definitely be coming back!    Robert
Manager Response: Robert, from all of the staff here at Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente thank you for the wonderful review that you wrote on our hotel. We are glad to hear that you had a great time with us. We do hope that you come back and stay with us again next time you are in the area.  Thanks again,  Amy

Summary Heading: Great choice for a hotel in San Clemente
Summary: The Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente is a solid choice for a hotel.  The rooms are nice and spacious with either views of the ocean to the west or the golf course to the east.  There is limited covered parking but plenty of parking overall.   There is a good variety of breakfast items from fresh waffles you make yourself, yogurt, smoothies, fresh fruit, cereal, juice, and hot foods including oatmeal with toppings, eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes.  The breakfast area seating is limited, but it goes all the way till 10am if you want to sleep in a little.  The gentleman checking us in was very helpful and had some great suggestions for dinner.  Location is close to beach access and restaurants.  It's easily accessible just off the highway.  There is a convenience store/liquor
Manager Response: Thank you R2300YUvincentc for this wonderful review on our hotel. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our spacious suites and enjoyed the views. Hope fully you had a chance to enjoy the sunset while you were here.  We are super close to the beach, downtown area and many great restaurants. So it does put us in a great spot for all the fun things to do in town.  Well thank you R2300YUvincentc for your AMAZING review on our hotel and we hope to see you again next time your back in the area.

Summary: Perfect stay in San Clemente.  Extremely spacious room with separate living room, ocean view, fantastic breakfast including eggs and cinnamon waffles, fruit smoothies.  Clean pool area with heated pool and large hot tub.  Arrived at 2p and room was ready and left late to take a last swim and that was accommodated as well!
Manager Response: Sandy L, thank you for leaving us such a wonderful review. We are so pleased to hear that you had a perfect stay here with us in beautiful San Clemente. I am glad to here that you enjoyed our nice hot breakfast that we have her at the hotel. A nice cold smoothie is a great way to start off the day. Thank you again and we hope that you will come back and visit us again soon!  Amy Gonzalez  Front Desk Agent

Summary: The staff was friendly, room was sparkling, breakfast was amazing! They put extra touches into everything from the pretty folded towels, and homemade breakfast smoothies. Best breakfast I have EVER had at a hotel stay. Great location. Close to the beach and food.
Manager Response: Dear Kelep2019,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a gracious review. We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time here with us, and we are so happy that you enjoyed your room and our tasty breakfast! We are all big breakfast people over here, and we are so glad that you were able to enjoy ours before embarking on your day. We hope that your time here in San Clemente was beyond enjoyable, and we hope to be able to welcome you back, the next time that you are in the area. Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente
