Summary: It was a nice stay in a very comfortable room. The staff was very friendly. The room was ready upon our arrival, breakfast was very good, and the weather was perfect.   The hotel is conveniently located near everything
Manager Response: Hello there clovisbhervol,  Thank you for leaving us such a wonderful review on our hotel located here in beautiful San Clemente. We are happy to here that you enjoyed your stay and that you enjoyed our hot complimentary breakfast.  The weather has been amazing lately. It has been very nice having some nice sunny days here. It is a good time to hang out at the beach.   Once again thank you for staying with us and we can't wait for you to come back and stay with us again.   Amy Gonzalez Front Desk Agent

Summary: Respectful pleasant staff.  Very clean.  Quiet. Beautiful room with comfortable mattress .  Only drawback was out timing to the breakfast room. Too small and crowed. Had to go out to breakfast as we were on a schedule
Manager Response: Dear Jet723834,  Good morning, and thank you very much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review. We are so glad to hear that we were able to help make your stay comfortable and convenient, during your time here in San Clemente. We do love our spacious and clean suites! We apologize for any trouble found during our breakfast offering, and we do hope that you will give us another try whenever you are back in the area.  Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great location, friendly front desk, warm cookies, pretty sunset. The parking was a little tight. They had very Clean rooms. could hear some traffic in the early morning. Good breakfast! Enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Good Morning Cherie B, Thank you for leaving us such a wonderful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us here in beautiful San Clemente. We are right in the middle of San Clemente so it does put us in a great spot, we are very close to the beach, downtown area and the San Clemente Outlets. Hopefully you had a chance to explore a bit while enjoying the beautiful sunset.  Once again Cherie B thank you for the great review, hope you enjoyed the holidays and we will see you soon.   Amy Gonzalez  Front Desk Agent

Summary: This hotel is sparkling clean and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  The staff is very friendly.  We received a complimentary bottle of wine and box of chocolates upon arrival.  I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Chapingringa,  Good morning, and Happy Anniversary! We are overjoyed that we were able to help celebrate such a special day with you and yours, and we wish you all the love and happiness in the world for years to come. Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are back in the area... Possibly the next anniversary!  Until then, take care, and have a very happy and safe New Years!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Excellent service. I called down to the front desk and asked for a fan because my boyfriend has trouble sleeping without one. He brought one up right away. All staff was very friendly and welcoming. Wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Good Morning ashleyrosej87 Thank you for the wonderful review on our hotel. We are so glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us in beautiful San Clemente. I am so glad to hear that we were able to bring your boyfriend up a fan to help him with his sleep. My husband cannot sleep without one neither. Well once again thank you Ashleyrosej87 for the great review.   Happy New Year! Amy Gonzalez Front Desk Agent

Summary: Great customer service from beginning to end ! I stayed here the night before my wedding and night of my wedding. They are very accommodating and helpful. I booked a hotel room block with Andrew and he was so efficient and nice
Manager Response: Malk587 Congratulations on your wedding! We are so glad to have gotten to share your special day with you. We hope that you have a wonderful honey moon and we do hope that you will come back and spend your anniversary with us!  Happy New Year! Amy Gonzalez  Front Desk Agent

Summary: Hampton inn staff was friendly and helpful with whatever we might have needed, always friendly, very helpful staff. San Clemente is the perfect location to get to both attractions in San Diego or Los Angeles, easy freeway access and good beach access as well, thank you again Hampton Inn staff
Manager Response: Dear jkahklenjr,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites, we would like to take a moment to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind review. We hope that you had a wonderful time while you were with us in San Clemente, and we hope that your visit was filled with laughter and many fantastic memories. We are so happy that we were able to help you feel at home, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again soon! Until then, take care, and have a great weekend!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Clean hotel and great staff. Right off the 5 and easy access to everything. Very satisfied from top to bottom. Breakfast was great as well with many choices. Beds a bit small but have pull out sofa too
Manager Response: benjaminmM9345DG we are so glad that you chose our hotel to stay at while you were here in San Clemente. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our amazing hot breakfast every morning it sure does make a great way to start off your day. Thank you for the wonderful review and we do hope to see you next time your back in the area.   Happy Holidays! Amy Gonzalez

Summary: Loved the room because it was clean, especially the beds and and bathrooms.  Really exceeded my expectations.  I say this because quite often there is something wrong with one of these two critical elements... but not this time, it was really, very good.
Manager Response: Hi christaylor98072 we are pleased to hear that you had an amazing stay here with us at our hotel. We do take pride in our hotel cleanliness so we are glad to hear that it exceeded your expectations. Well Mr. Taylor we hope that you enjoyed your stay here with us and we will see you next time your in town.   Happy Holidays! Amy

Summary: This hotel is outdated, but that's part of its charm because of the oversized rooms and old-fashioned hospitality. The front desk staff was very helpful anytime I needed anything, or just wanted to chat since I was there for a week. Walking distance (or a quick drive) to lots of restaurants,shops and beach views. Well stocked breakfast buffet and ample cleaning staff at all times.
Manager Response: jojodipaolo  we were so glad to have you staying us for a week! Hopefully you had a chance to get out and explore beautiful San Clemente. The San Clemente Outlets are beautiful during this time of year as well as the downtown area of San Clemente so hopefully you did get some time out to explore. It was great chatting with you while you were here and we hope to see you again!!  Happy Holidays! Amy Gonzalez

Summary: San Clemente Hampton Inn is the perfect meeting spot for my sisters and me.   The accommodations are safe, clean, comfortable and in a great location for our likes.  Fantastic staff who are always helpful and cheerful.
Manager Response: Thank you Kcarefree for your wonderful review on our hotel. I am so glad to hear that you and your sisters had a great time hear with us in beautiful San Clemente. Our location does put us in a great spot. Being close to the beaches, San Clemente Outlets and the downtown area gives you a few good options of things to do while you are here. It was great meeting all of you and we hope that if you are ever back in the area you will stay with us again!  Happy Holidays! Amy Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel and Excellent HOT Breakfast!
Summary: Love love love this Hotel. We have now stayed here twice and enjoyed it both times. I would highly recommend this Hotel to Families or anyone for that matter. Andrew at the front desk was very nice and made sure we had everything we needed.
Manager Response: Lindsay B, Thank you for leaving us such a wonderful review and we LOVE having you stay with us. I am so glad that Andrew was able to get you guys everything you needed during your stay and we hope you have plans to come back and visit us soon!  Happy Holidays from all of us! Amy Gonzalez

Summary: We had book trips this this hotel before. the staff is always friendly and accommodating. During this stay, it was my daughter's birthday. the staff gave her a gift bag of snacks and a card which really made her day. We really appreciate the staff going above and beyond...
Manager Response: Dear GrandTour44927457877,  Good day, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review! A very warm and Happy Birthday to your daughter as well; We are so glad that we were able to make such a special day that much more enjoyable! Our team loves to celebrate, and we hope that everything about your time in San Clemente was wonderful.  Please feel free to come back and visit us the next time you are in the area! Until then, take care, and have a very wonderful December.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Awesome staff. Not just nice. They worked to move things around so our stay was great. They let our son and his family check in early but only after asking the housekeeping staff to clean rooms faster so they could get in early. It was great after driving 9 hours each of the 2 previous days to get here.
Manager Response: Dear 387darbyb,  Good day, and thank you so much for leaving us such a fantastic review! We are over the moon to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so glad that we could help make an early check in happen- There's nothing quite like putting your feet up after a long drive and just resting. We hope that everything about your stay with us, and your time in San Clemente, was absolutely enjoyable; We look forward to welcoming you back the next time that you are in the area! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Clean pleasant, staff was very friendly. I would recommend this place always. Visited my son in the Marines, right by the base and easy to get to. The breakfast every morning was very helpful and got the day started.
Manager Response: Dear Joe101964,  Good day! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a moment to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leaving us such a kind review. We are so happy to hear that our location made visits with your son easy and enjoyable- We greatly thank him for his service! We hope that everything about your visit to San Clemente was absolutely wonderful and enjoyable, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week!  Kindest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Always stay here when visiting family, consistently great breakfast, nice clean suites, and if you can get an ocean view it's a great bonus! Right across the street from the beach, so great location. Staff always friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Hello there ColoradoAMC, we are so glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us while you were visiting your family here in beautiful San Clemente. We hope to see you again next time your in San Clemente. Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Great place for value and good location!
Summary: I just stayed here in a king suite.  Good bed and sitting room with lots of space and two TVs, frig, and microwave.  There is a small balcony with a full ocean view over the highway.  It is a great value for a nice hotel room.  They have coffee all day and night, with cookies in the evening.  The free breakfast is more than adequate with eggs, waffles, cereal, toast etc. etc.  No complaints, well maybe the shower was a little weak on water power.  You can’t have everything.   But you do get free covered parking too.
Manager Response: Dear Jessef656,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a moment to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind and well-thought review. We are so humbled and grateful that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable king suites- Having so many comforts of home in our rooms really does make a difference while traveling! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast as well, and we will certainly have our maintenance team take a look at the pressure in the shower-head of your room.  We hope that your time in San Clemente was everything that you hoped it would be, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Until then, take care, and have a fantastic week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We stayed at the San Clemente Hampton Inn for our Anniversary for a few days and were highly impressed by the staff and property!! We highly recommend this property when visiting San Clemente, California.
Manager Response: Dear Jolene L,  Good morning! First of all, we want to wish you a very big "Happy Anniversary!" We are so glad that we were able to celebrate such a wonderful occasion with you and yours! Reviews like this truly warm our hearts and make us so grateful to be in the hospitality industry... These are the moments that stay with us for years to come.  We hope that your anniversary was truly a beautiful day, and we hope that everything about San Clemente made your time with us that much more special. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future, perhaps for your next anniversary! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week, and a wonderful Holiday season.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower and Hampton Inn and Suites Team General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Great hospitality and extremely comfortable stay!
Summary: I stayed at the Hampton Inn San Clemente at the beginning of September for the duration of a 2 week business trip. I was very impressed with the cleanliness of the hotel, the quality, breadth of choice and tastiness of the complimentary breakfast, and the size of my room. The most wonderful part of my stay, though was the friendliness and hospitality displayed by the front desk crew. Andrew, Epi, and Amy were the staff who I interacted with most often. Each of them really made my stay special and made teh hotel feel like a home away from home.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca W,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a moment to say, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review. We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so happy that Andrew, Epi, and Amy were able to make your time with us that much more enjoyable. They are all dearly loved parts of our hotel family, and we are so happy to share your kind words with them. We hope that everything about your time in San Clemente was amazing, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Until then, take care, and have a great rest of  your week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: While not right on the beach, this facility is close to it.  It is also just a short drive to the pier and a little longer drive to Dana Point harbor.   Lots to see and do here.  Free breakfast is available and that makes the stay even nicer.
Manager Response: Dear C6044DAtomj,  Good afternoon! Our entire team would like to take a minute to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a great review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our tasty, complimentary breakfast before embarking on your day in San Clemente... We hope that you were able to take in all that there is to do in the area! Many of our team love the San Clemente Pier as well, and we are glad that you were able to be within short distance from that landmark, at our property.  We do hope that you will come back and visit us again; We would love to welcome you back! Until then, take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Rolaura was excellent and all of the staff were very nice. Room had all the amenities and bed very comfortable. Would stay here again. Ocean view with balcony was great. Close to beach and local shopping.
Manager Response: Dear Armenperez1968,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a moment to say, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind and wonderful review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and yes, Rolaura is absolutely wonderful and a true spirit of Hospitality. We will make sure that she receives your kind words! We hope that you were able to enjoy all that San Clemente has to offer during your stay- Fall is truly the best time of year around here! Please do feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are in the area again... We would love to welcome you Home! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower  General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel Top notch Customer service!
Summary: My husband and I have been coming to Hampton Inn Suites in San Clemente for years now. This is our favorite hotel! Everyone is so welcoming and the customer service team is truly amazing! We’re coming back soon! This hotel and staff is the best!  We celebrated our 30 year Anniversary and they had a card and goodie basket waiting for us in our room. So beyond thoughtful and everyone signed the card! My husband and I highly recommended this hotel! The breakfast is great with a lot of variety to fit everyone’s needs.  Thanks again for another great stay. Thanks especially to Cherie the Manager and Amy Gonzalez who went the extra mile to make us happy! See you soon!
Manager Response: Dear Elisa L,  Good morning! We were so thrilled to have you and your husband back Home with us- You're practically family at this point! The best part of our line of work is making lifelong connections with our guests, and there is nothing better than seeing a friendly and familiar face come through our doors.  Happy Anniversary! 30 years is a wonderful milestone, and we wish you another 30 years of love, happiness, and many wonderful times. As you know, we love to celebrate around here, and there is nothing better to celebrate than Love. We are so glad that we were able to help make such a special time that much more memorable!  All of our team looks forward to welcoming you and your husband back again soon. Please know that you are always part of our family here! Take care, have a wonderful week, and thank you again for all of your kindness!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower (and Team!) General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Rented a couple rooms here for my daughter's Sweet 1 birthday party. Had a fabulous time. Service was great. Front desk was very professional. Rooms had ocean view. Plus girls enjoyed hot tub downstairs. Rooms were clean and cozy. Thanks so much!
Manager Response: Dear Seaworthy911,  Good evening! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to wish your daughter a very happy birthday! We are so glad that we could help make such a memorable day that much more enjoyable. We love celebrations and occasions of all types, and we thank you for allowing us to be a part of your day! If you are ever back in the area for another birthday, or even just to get away and relax, please feel free to come on back. We'll be here, waiting to welcome you Home!  Until then, take care, and have a fantastic weekend.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I couldn’t be happier with our accommodations! The staff, room, breakfast, and amenities were awesome! We were so comfortable and well taken care of. I will definitely plan on returning and my children hope we come back again soon!
Manager Response: Dear Mom_of_four1234,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kindhearted review. We are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our suites and tasty breakfast as well! We hope that they were able to get you and your family off on a great start to your days here in San Clemente! Please feel free to come back and visit us again, whenever you are back in the area... We love to welcome our guests back home. Until then, take care, and have a great week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Very nice! Hotel staff excellent-room clean and spacious!  It does not have the cleaning or air freshener odors. Highly recommend!!! Great gym!!!! Breakfast good. Conveniently close to the highway and great restaurants  👍👍👍👍👍
Manager Response: Dear Thekmeister,  Good morning, and thank you so much for your amazing review! Our team is beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so happy to hear that you loved our gym! Our gym is really one of our favorite places on property, and we are so happy that it worked well for you. We hope that you were able to enjoy all that San Clemente has to offer while you were here, and we hope to be able to welcome you back in the future! Until then, take care, and have a fantastic week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: 2 nites stay to babysit while our kids attended a wedding.
Summary: This hotel provides a bedroom with a door that closes. It does NOT have any adjoining rooms as they had promised me when I called to make the reservations. However, the sound proofing is quite good and they did give us a room next to our children and grandchildren.   So we were able to watch the baseball game on mute without disturbing our very young and sleep averse grandchildren when mommy and daddy attended the wedding.
Manager Response: Dear MunkPaloAlto,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a great review! We are glad that you were able to enjoy your time with us, here in beautiful San Clemente. I apologize for any miscommunication regarding room layouts, but I am so glad to hear that we were able to get you right next to your family. We do always try to keep families as close as possible. We hope that you were able to enjoy our many tasty breakfast before your day started, and we hope that you were able to take in all that San Clemente has to offer at this point in the season.  We thank you again for your feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the future! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We traveled from out of state for our daughters wedding next door to the Hampton Suites. We picked this hotel because of the proximity to the venue. It turned out to be a great choice. Our room was luxurious and the staff was wonderful. This made our week less stressful and more relaxing.
Manager Response: Hello Lorrykraft, We're so glad that you stayed with us for your daughter's wedding!- we love being a part of your celebrations big or small. We like making it easy and comfortable for all of you from staff, to room, to breakfast. If you're heading this way again please stop in and visit with us- we're here for you. Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: From the text before I arrived to the welcome I received to the actual room it was a great stay and great customer service experience! I would definitely stay here again if in the area. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello Matt R, I can't tell you how good it is to hear how much you enjoyed your time here. We enjoy doing all within our power to assure a comfortable, pleasant visit each and every time starting with the text all the way through to talking with you again here on Trip Advisor- we're here for you! We would be honored to have you as our guest again any time you're back in the area. Thank you, Matt :). Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: A very last minute reservation, but very pleased I stayed here.  The staff was very friendly and the breakfast was delicious.  I liked that the room had a separate sitting room with a TV.  The hotel was very clean.
Manager Response: Good morning Machomas, We are also glad that you stayed with us. We like sharing comfortable stays for you, our honored guests, for whatever the occasion or plan. Our complimentary breakfast has been new and improved since June with the addition of fresh-made smoothies and the option of flavored pancakes with all of our classic breakfast, of course. I hope you got to try some of those new offerings. I'm happy to hear you like our 2-room suites too! - that's our standard ;). We hope you'll come by and stay with us again in the near future planned or unplanned. Take care till then. Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great friendly and helpful staff. Rooms very comfortable and large. Had ocean view and easy I5 access . good breakfast. We would recommend it to anyone. You want 200 words. Or I can't subm I ? Shame on you.
Manager Response: Hello Cclough625, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write us a review! I'm glad you only had to write 37 words btw, 200 would be a lot, I agree :). We are also very glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us from our team, to your room, to the complimentary breakfast. We hope you be able to come back and join us next time your in the area, we'd love to have you back. Thank you so much, have a great day! Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: The staff here are fantastic and very accommodating. The room was large and clean. Would highly recommend. Love the extra room, that shuts off from bedroom, for privacy and able to watch one of two TVs.
Manager Response: Dear lbfdmcghee,  Good afternoon, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such a warm and wonderful review! Our entire team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, especially for such a great occasion. Our comfy and spacious suites really are a great option to relax and unwind here in San Clemente! We hope that everything about your stay was fantastic, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again! Until then, take care, and have a lovely weekend!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The most friendly staff made my stay very pleasant. The room was clean with a great view of the ocean. Breakfast area was clean and plenty of choice. I will stay here again if I have to be in the area.
Manager Response: Dear RSKranenburg,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team, I would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review. We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so glad to hear that  you enjoyed the view of the ocean from your suite! We are truly blessed to be so close to the amazing California shore. Please feel free to come back and visit us again whenever you are back in the area... We would love to welcome you back Home! Until then, take care, and have a great week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The hotel was nicely furnished.   Very spacious and had good separation of space from the sitting area and bedroom.  Conveniently located close to the freeway and Calafia State Park (great beach access).  The breakfast had a variety of tasty items (try the delicious smoothies). We will definitely be returning in the future with the family.  The staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear 4Meza,  Good afternoon, and thank you so much for leaving us such a wonderful review! Our team was absolutely thrilled to read your feedback, and we are so glad that you enjoyed our delicious breakfast as well! We hope that you were able to soak up some sun at the beach and take in all that San Clemente has to offer... This has been a fantastic time of year! Thank you again for your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back Home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This is a good basic hotel located centrally for lots of excursions. The rooms were clean and comfortable and all the staff were very friendly and efficient. My only complaints are the lack of a recycling program, and the use of disposable dishes and cutlery in the breakfast area. I expect more environmental responsibility from a California hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 8765301,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so glad that we were able help you feel at home while you were here. We that you for your feedback on our breakfast-ware, as we are always looking for new ways to improve ourselves for our guests! We hope that your trip through San Clemente was a marvelous time, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again soon. Take care, and Happy October!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Great staff but hotel room needs updating
Summary: We often stay at Hampton Inn as they are usually nice sized decent rooms.  The staff here was particularly nice.  Andrew was helpful and friendly.    The room we were in, while a nice size, seemed to need some attention.   The furniture was scuffed, carpet near the bathroom was a bit ragged and the TV was small and quirky.  Breakfast was nice.
Manager Response: Dear Carol R,  Good afternoon, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review of your stay! We are so glad that we were able to help you feel at home while you were with us, and it sounds like Andrew was able to make your time that much more memorable. Thank you for giving us feedback about your room, as we love to better ourselves for our guests. It sounds like breakfast really hit the spot as well!  We hope to be able to welcome you back the next time you are in the area; we would love to see you again!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This was a very nice experience. I needed to adjust my reservation unexpectedly and Herman at the reservations desk went out of his way to accommodate the changes needed.   The staff is very friendly, rooms spacious and clean. Great customer service overall.  Fitness room has all the basic needs and complimentary breakfast is great.  The only thing I wish is that the pool area was a little better furnished and set up.  I will definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Liebermansees,  Good evening, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review! Our team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so glad that Herman was able to help you out. Herman is truly a gem on our team and always willing to go above and beyond for our guests.  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our fitness room, and thank you very much for the feedback of our pool area! We are always open to guests' suggestions and ideas, and we take all feedback very constructively! We hope that you will come back and visit us again whenever you are back in the area; We would love to welcome you back home. Until then, take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: I love the San Clemente Hampton!
Summary: The entire staff at the San Clemente Hampton Inn are the absolute best!  They always go above and beyond to make sure their guests are happy.  The property is clean and the location is great. HIGHLY recommend!
Manager Response: Hello Stacey, Thank you so much for staying with us and for your fabulous review! We love being here for you guys and providing a comfortable and relaxing stay whether you're here for business or just a lovely weekend at the beach :). We hope we'll see you guys again soon. Have a great day! Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager

Summary: I was worried about staying right off the I-5, but not to worry. This Hampton is central to everything, and very quiet at night, especially if you request a room on the golf course side. The staff is beyond accommodating and I had a great 6-night stay.
Manager Response: Dear NineRavens,  Good morning, and thank you very much for leaving us such a pleasant review. Our team is overjoyed that you enjoyed your stay with us, and it sounds like our location worked out well for your trip! The golf course side of our property offers some beautiful views, and yes, it is very peaceful. We hope that you will come back and visit us the next time you are in San Clemente... We would love to welcome you back!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: When visiting friends in San Clemente we always stay at Hampton Inn. Staff very professional, good rooms, clean, breakfast not great, but okay. So, I guess I need to have at least 200 characters in this review- why?
Manager Response: Dear Foodsniffer,  Good morning, and thank you so much for leaving us such an outstanding review. Our team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us here in San Clemente, and we hope that you were able to take in everything that our great city has to offer. Thank you for the kudos for our amazing team, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again soon! Until then, take care, and have a great rest of your week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Terrific property, with all the ammenities
Summary: Above and beyond anything else was the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff. We felt truly accommodated and taken care of by them, and they did it with a smile and offer for more! this was a terrific value for us. We had a block of rooms for a family wedding and it was great being able to breakfast together, we walked to the wedding it was so close. Terrific time, great property!
Manager Response: Hello Jenny, We're so honored to hear that we made such a happy occasion as a family wedding even more comfortable and enjoyable for you! We love being here for you guys and seeing you guys happy makes our day all the more rewarding. Thank you very much for giving us a review- we hope to see you again next time you're in the area! Andrew Sunderly, Assistant General Manager

Summary: One night stay for business . Check in was great, friendly. Room was very large, with a nice covered balcony overlooking a golf course. Easy in, easy out, good free breakfast. If you’re looking for modern this is not it, this is an older property with dated decor. But it’s exactly what I was looking for, the great service means 5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear G8890OE,  Good morning, and thank you very much for leaving us such a kind and thoughtful review! We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, while on business. We are so glad that you enjoyed the view of the San Clemente Municipal Golf Course; The sunrise views over the hills are absolutely stunning! We are also so happy that you enjoyed our tasty breakfast, and we hope that it got your day off on the right foot. Please feel free to come back and visit us again the next time you are in the area... We would love to welcome you back! Take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower  General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Would recommend this hotel! Great location easy to find. Rooms were nice. The breakfast was great and had healthy options. Every staff person greeted you and were very helpful! Would stay again. Great price for the area.
Manager Response: Dear Teon H,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review! Our entire team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so glad that you enjoyed our spacious suites and new breakfast items! We are very fond of our breakfast; It's a great way to start the day. We hope that you will come back and visit us again whenever you are back in the area, we would love to welcome you Home! Until then, take care and have a wonderful day!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This place was reasonably priced and had a very good free breakfast buffet and internet.  This property also had plenty of parking.  Our beds were very comfortable.  The only thing that was not comfortable was the pull out couch.  The mattress was pretty bad.  Our young children slept on it and even they mentioned it was not good.  But other than that, we loved it here and would definitely recommend staying here.  The location was good for us.  We Lyfted everywhere.  San Clemente is a nice town with the cool hip vibe.
Manager Response: Dear tippytoes329,  Good morning! We love your screen-name, another one of our favorites! Our entire team is beyond thrilled that you enjoyed your time here with us, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all of the sights and sounds that San Clemente has to offer during this time of year. Thank you for letting us know about your fold out sofa, we will have our Housekeeping team inspect the mattresses today. We hope that you will come back and visit us the next time you are in the area- We will be waiting to welcome you home!  Take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Smells like wet dog. Rooms are not up to normal Hampton standards. Very expensive compared to other hotel/motels in area. Expect way more from the Hampton products. Would recommend going elsewhere to save yourself some money.
Manager Response: Dear dkfutures,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review of your stay. We welcome and appreciate all guest feedback, as that allows us to better ourselves for our guests. We deeply apologize that you were not pleased with your stay, and we are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you would like to discuss this further, please feel free to reach out to me at cherieb@dknhotels.com. We hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area, and again, we thank you for your time.  Sincerest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: It is my pleasure to give the San Clemente Hampton Inn and Suites and 5 Star review. I was informed that our entire family was going to have lunch at the San Clemente Pier on Sunday, 9/1 to celebrate my birthday. Not wanting to drive home after celebrating, I looked for a place to spend the night in San Clemente. I lucked into two rooms at the Hampton Inn. After the lunch we checked into the hotel and was met with a lobby full of birthday wishes and congrats. Our rooms were extremely roomy and had birthday cake and wine on the table. We then proceeded to the pool area (overlooking the golf course). Our family swam for the next several hours (comfortable chairs with jacuzzi and very nice pool). There were at least three restaurants and a liquor store within a 5 minute walk.
Manager Response: Dear Coachhaygood,  Good morning, and another Very Happy Birthday wish from us to you! We are so glad that we were able to be a part of your special day, and our team is still talking about how much fun they had setting up your birthday decorations; It was truly an honor for us. We are thrilled to hear that you and your family had a great time with us, and while you were in the area, and we hope that your birthday was everything that you hoped it would be! We wish you all the joy and happiness, and we hope that this next year is your best yet! Please feel free to come back and visit us again!  Warmest regards and wishes,  Cherie Brower and Team General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: this place is the best, and the staff is EPIC!!! I always feel like family when checking in and entire stay! location is phenomenal and I dint want to start on the cookies lol, Thank YOU Hampton San Clemente!!! you are ALL the best.
Manager Response: Hi Whiskeytalls, We are touched by your words and appreciate how much you enjoyed your stay with us! We like being here for you as your home away from home and providing every bit of comfort and relaxation we can muster. We hope you'll come visit with us again in the near future, but until then: safe journeys to you :). Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: I enjoyed my stay so much. The suite I had was very comfortable and the free parking and breakfast added so much value to my trip. I choose this hotel  to be near to the beach and it was perfect and so relaxing. I will definitely be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon P,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a warm review. Our entire team is beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so glad that our comfortable suites made your stay that much better. We are so glad that you were able to relax, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all that San Clemente has to offer during the summer. Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are in the area again... We will be waiting to welcome you Home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The service was very good. I was staying there because my wedding venue was next door. They put up a sign in the lobby. It was very nice. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was good as well.
Manager Response: Dear Aaribgambill,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to say a warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such an excellent review. Congratulations on your special day! We are so honored to have been a part of it, and we hope that everything about your day was wonderful and full of lifelong memories.  We wish you and yours all the love and happiness in the world, and we hope to see you again on your anniversary!  Warmest and happiest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I booked a room here almost at random. I was surprised at how lovely the hotel and area are. Very clean and comfortable rooms and I would recommend this place to anyone. Very ADA friendly. I will be back.
Manager Response: Dear SereneEva,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review! Our team is thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so happy that we could be of service to you while you were in town. We hope that you enjoyed your stay in San Clemente, and we hope that you were able to take in all the beauty that our city has to offer. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon! Until then, take care and have a wonderful day.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This Hampton Inn is a great location in San Clemente,  close to the beach!! Wonderful staff, very friendly and helpful!! The room was big and spacious. Also the breakfast was very good, alot of choices available to eat!
Manager Response: Dear Reginasilos,  Good afternoon! Our entire team would like to say a big, warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such an outstanding review! We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us, and we are so glad that we could make your stay memorable. We are so happy that you enjoyed our new breakfast as well, the smoothies and the waffles are a great way to start the day! We hope that you enjoyed San Clemente in the summer, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again, whenever you are in the area. Until then, take care, and have an excellent rest of your week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: First time staying at this Hampton. Neat, clean and comfortable! Staff made the check quick & easy (had a late check in). At check out  friendly greeting, with a "Good Morning" and asked how my stay was. Would stay again.  Thank you
Manager Response: Dear NorthStar44433011122,  Good afternoon, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review. Our team is so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we hope that you were able to rest and relax during time your away, at our property. We do hope that you will come back and visit us again whenever you are back in the area... We would love to welcome you home again! Take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Our stay was very pleasant. We were there for a family wedding. We loved the additional sitting room. The breakfast room was great for family gathering at breakfast. We had a view of the ocean. Convenient to all wedding activities, walking distance. Great location for a wedding.
Manager Response: Dear Sightseer, We are glad that you stayed with us and took a moment to share your experience with the world. We are very happy to hear that every aspect of your visit here with us for the wedding met or exceeded your expectations. Weddings are a wonderful life event and we are so very fortunate to be able to share in those joys with you all and host friends and family that are able to come out and attend :). If you're in the area again in the future (wedding or not) we'd love to have you stay with us again. Have a great rest of the summer! ~Andrew Sunderly, Assistant General Manager

Summary: It was great to have a suite instead of the usual two queen beds. We watched TV in our room and our daughters watched TV in theirs.  Great location right between LA and San Diego so we saw plenty of both without a lot of drive time.  Lots of good places to eat nearby as well. Included breakfast was also very good which saves $45 every morning not having to go out. Would stay again. Wife was especially happy.
Manager Response: Dear SpringBreakMan,  Good afternoon! First of all, our team absolutely loves your username, how fun! We would like to say a big, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a fantastic review. We are beyond thrilled that our spacious two queen worked out so well for you and your family, and we love that you enjoyed our tasty breakfast as well! We hope that you were able to have a fantastic time, both in and around the San Clemente area, and we hope that you will come back and visit us again soon! Thank you so much again, and enjoy this beautiful weekend!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Hotel staff was friendly and helpful. Room was fine except for noisy air conditioning system. Talked to staff but nothing could be done because of the system’s design. Convenient location and not too noisy despite location very near the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Johnlaurak,  Good morning, and thank you very much for taking the time to leave us a review of your stay. Our entire team works hard to make sure all of our guests are happy and comfortable during their time with us, and we love to improve off of feedback. We are very happy to hear that our world-class customer service helped to make your stay enjoyable, but we are very sorry about your ac unit. We apologize for any trouble this caused you, and we do hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area... We would love another opportunity to make our property your Home Away From Home. Until then, take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.   Sincerest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: We have stayed here for the last four years. We relax at the beach by day and visit different dining at night. Hampton has never left us unhappy with service, breakfast, or friendly helpful staff. A must visit when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Summ1tee,  Good morning! We would like to take a minute to say a warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a kind review. Our entire team is beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so glad to hear that we have been able to make your stay memorable for four years in a row! We are absolutely honored. We hope that your time here in San Clemente, and with us, was everything that you hoped it would be, and we hope to be able to welcome you back on your next visit as well! Until then, take care, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Andrew welcomed us to the Hotel before we even arrived! Our stay was pleasant. Clean room. Location easy to get to. Self parking at no charge. Quiet sleeping. Centrally located. Will stay there again. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear Maps690341,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to say a big, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a wonderful review! We are beyond thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so glad that we were able to be a part of your family trip. We hope that you were able to enjoy all of the Summer fun in San Clemente during your stay, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again, soon! Have a wonderful weekend, and thank you again!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn for a family wedding close by. We have a lot of us staying there and they did everything possible to ensure early checkin for our event! Most comfortable and clean hotel I have stayed in, in a long time
Manager Response: Dear Maureen C,  Good afternoon! Our entire team would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind review. We are touched that you had such a fond stay with us, and we are thrilled that you were able to relax and enjoy your time in San Clemente. Thank you for letting us be a part of your special memories, and we hope to be of service again in the future! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Everything was awful. Our toilet was broken as soon as we checked in. We had to change rooms. In our second room, the bathroom sink was clogged and water was leaking from the pipes, all over the carpet. We had wet carpet the remainder of our stay. Internet was so terrible, I had to make my phone a hotspot. TV was broken, ants in the room, had to call the front desk to get housekeeping to service the room. AWFUL
Manager Response: Dear Holcomb2019, We are deeply saddened to hear that you did not enjoy your stay here with us. It is our want to provide the very best service to each and every one of our guests, especially when there is a problem we can help to resolve. I'm sorry that the efforts we made to resolve each issue you experienced fell short of your expectations, we do truly reach to address every insufficiency as soon as it arises. We are capable of so much more and would all welcome an opportunity to restore your faith and trust in us and have a new experience here far removed from the disposition of your last one. Sincerely, Andrew Sunderly, Assistant General Manager

Summary: As a family of six it can be tough to find a reasonably priced hotel that is also clean, friendly and accommodating... The Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente was all of the above. The rooms were perfect sized and clean, complimentary breakfast was a huge bonus and the staff was extremely helpful. We will definitely return the next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear CarmellaGoslar,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a second to say a big, "Thank you!" to you and your family for taking the time to leave us such a kind review. We are beyond thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are happy that we could help your family feel at home! We hope that you were able to enjoy all of the fun and beauty that San Clemente has to offer while you were here (and it sounds like our breakfast buffet was a great way to start the days!) Please feel free to come back the next time you are in the area... We will be waiting to welcome you Home! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This was our first stay here at this location and it was a beautiful ocean view from our room. Hotel was very clean and employees very helpful and cheerful. Breakfast was very good to excellent rating. We would stay here again, if in the area.
Manager Response: Hello iamconan1, We always love hearing from our guests- especially ones like yourself who had an amazing time with us! Thank you so much for staying with us and taking a moment to review us. We thoroughly enjoy making your stay special and comfortable in every way whether you're here for business of for a day at the beach. We hope you are indeed in the area again soon because we would love to have you stay with us again. Have a wonderful rest of your summer! ~Andrew Sunderly, Assistant General Manager, Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: We came for a wedding being held at the Wedgewood up the street. The suites were roomy clean and inviting. The breakfast bar was well stocked with more than enough yummy choices. And their Coffee was especially delicious. We found all the staff to be very engaging, friendly, helpful and accommodating. It was a very very pleasant stay. Thank you.
Manager Response: Hello 988carlo, We love being a part of your wedding celebrations!! The amount of positive energy is contagious all around :). I'm glad you liked both the comfort of your suite and the plethora of choices for breakfast- did you get to try our new smoothies and flavored waffles? While our team has some amazing people in it, it's you, our happy guests, who complete our family and make our day and our service worth it. So thank You!, and we hope to see you again in the future :). ~Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: We have been staying at this hotel for the past 8 years every time we visit California.  The rooms a large and you can get a great view of the ocean.  Amy is absolutely awesome!  She remembers us from the very first time we stayed here when our twins were toddlers.  The staff is super friendly and they go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable and your stay is just right.
Manager Response: Dear Crazycooklewis,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to send you a big, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review. We are beyond thrilled that you have been enjoying your stays with us (for the past 8 years!), and we are so glad that we were able to help you feel right at home. Amy is truly the heart of our wonderful team here at the property, and we will make sure that she receives your kind words as well.  Please feel free to come back whenever you are in San Clemente again... We'll be waiting to welcome you home! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful weekend.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Came in for a short business meeting. The staff was friendly and always smiling.Andrew at desk was helpful with a early check in.The room was great ,enjoyed seeing the golfers try to hit the hotel.The breakfast was cool with the waffle stations
Manager Response: Dear Rico944,  Good afternoon! Our entire team would like to send you a big, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a great review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our new waffle stations, and we hope that  you were able to try one of our new, fun flavors! They're a good way to start the day, and yes, the golfers are fun to watch. We are glad that the balls stay on the green! We will make sure that Andrew also receives your kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in town... We'll be waiting to welcome you back!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Clean and spacious with all you could need.  I wish I had been there long enough to experience the pool, eat breakfast and see what was nearby.  Pleasant staff.  This room was actually more than I needed for this particular trip and for that reason I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee, We always enjoy hearing back from our guests- thank you so much for sharing with us a window unto your experience here! We're happy to offer you, our guests, all the comforts of home away from home. We would love to invite you back for another stay, this time a little longer because, yes, there is much more that our hotel and the beautiful community of San Clemente with to offer you. Have a happy 4th of July weekend! Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: Hotel is located conveniently by the beach and to main expressway.  Overall the breakfast was very good, the staff were friendly.  I came with my family and we would most likely stay at this hotel again since it is between LA and San Diego.
Manager Response: Dear Andreas P,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to take a minute to say a big, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind and outstanding review. We are so glad to hear that we were able to help you feel at home while you were in San Clemente, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all of the wonderful summertime treats that San Clemente has to offer. Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are in the area again; We would love to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Rarely do I need a hotel room to do more than sleep.  However, we needed to prepare for a wedding in the evening.  Our 130pm early check-in was happily accommodated. They also understood that more  family would be using the room to prepare for the wedding, too.  They took down the car info for the second group, as well - they were warmly greeted when they joined us at the hotel.    Later, when we got back from the wedding at 1030pm, our request for extra towels was met very quickly.    The staff at the “free breakfast” were equally cheerful and helpful.    This was a great visit to a great property.
Manager Response: Dear Cmcoop,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review! Our entire team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us during such a joyous occasion. We love to help our guests feel right at home when they are with us, and we are so glad that we were able to make your stay with us one to remember! We hope that you had a wonderful time at the wedding, and we hope to be of service again whenever you are back in the area! We would love to welcome you back. Take care, and have a fantastic weekend!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I stayed here for a wedding that was located right across the street. short Uber Ride to bars and nightlife. Staff was so friendly and nice the entire time, which is rare. I was disappointed to see how old the building was given that we paid over $400 for two nights. The hallways smelt like dirty carpet. Inside the rooms were okay. Nothing special. Some updates would be nice or at least a lower price.
Manager Response: Dear Road24567446211,  Good afternoon, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us a review of your recent stay with us. Our entire team is thrilled to hear that we were able to make you feel welcome and at home during your stay with us, and we hope that everything was perfect with the wedding- We do love weddings here! We do run a number of online deals and packages, and we welcome you to please shop our rates again if you are ever back in the area- You might be interested in our whale-watching package! Rates do tend to be a bit lower outside of the summer months, and we hope to be of service again. Thank you again!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Had a great time. Staff is friendly and helpful. Hotel is clean and comfortable . Conveniently located in a beautiful area. Free parking and coin washer/dryer makes it easy. Really enjoyed our stay. Would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear MissouriTravellers,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to extend a very warm, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind and heartfelt review. We are absolutely thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so glad that we were able to help you feel at home while you were in San Clemente! We hope that you were able to enjoy all of the beautiful sights and sounds that the city has to offer, and we look forward to your return. Thank you again, and have a wonderful week!  Sunniest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We’ve stayed here every summer for the last five years. We keep coming back for the friendly staff, clean comfortable rooms, great breakfast and great location.  There are many other places we could choose to stay but we always come back here because we know that we’re gonna always have a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear JBturtle,  Good afternoon! Our team would like to thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review- We love your username as well! We are absolutely delighted to hear that we have been able to help you feel at home while you've stayed with us, and we are so deeply grateful for your patronage to our property- We love welcoming back familiar faces, as our guests quickly become like our family.  We hope that you enjoyed your time in San Clemente, and we look forward to being able to welcome you back soon! Until then, take care and have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: Although the value for your money is not great being that everything is overpriced and Southern California at least at the Hampton Inn you have a clean room convenient location and amazing amazing customer service! The complementary breakfast was very good I was pleasantly surprised that they had fruit and veggie smoothies along with a more traditional waffles, eggs etc. I highly recommend the front desk staff go above and beyond to make you comfortable especially Amy
Manager Response: Dear Navigate174427,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente, we would like to take a minute to say, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a heartfelt review. We love to go above and beyond for our guests, and we are so very happy that we were able to help make your stay a memorable one. You are actually the first guest to review our new smoothies, and we are so glad that you enjoyed them! They will be a breakfast staple at our property, and all Hampton properties, from here on out. We will also make sure that Amy gets news of your great review, as she is such a wonderful member of our hotel family. Please feel free to come back and visit us again, we would love to welcome you back home! Take care until then, and have a wonderful weekend.  Warmest regards,   Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great stay - early check-in was ready when we got in from Australia ... definitely appreciated after such a long flight! Very helpful staff and nothing was too difficult. Would definitely stay again in this Hilton property on another visit to San Clemente.
Manager Response: Dear Newbold12,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente, we would like to take a minute to say, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review. Our team is thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, all the way from Australia, and we hope that you had the best of times at the wedding! We would love to welcome you back if you are ever back in the area, and we hope that you have a wonderful start to a bright and sunny week.  Thank you again!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The first evening I arrived at this hotel it had been a long day of travelling and Herman went above and beyond making the check-in experience fun (first time I've ever used that as an adjective for checking into a hotel) and easy. It really was an excellent first impression that began an overall great weekend in San Clemente.
Manager Response: Dear nmates3,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a great review. Herman is one of our gems at the front desk, and we are so glad that he was able to help you feel welcome and at home. We will certainly make sure that your kind words reach his ears!  We do hope that you were able to enjoy all that San Clemente has to offer while you were with us, and we hope to be able to be of service whenever you are back in the area. Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Very comfortable bed. Room was clean and new. Basic kitchen amenities. Coffee in room is always good. I slept very well, maybe because I was able to open the door and get fresh air. Not a 5 star hotel, but great value.
Manager Response: Dear Mary W,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to take a moment to say a warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind review of your stay. We are so glad that you were able to have a peaceful and relaxing stay with us, and we hope that you were able to enjoy some of the beauty that San Clemente has to offer while you were here.  Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are back in the area... We would love to be of service again! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We stayed one night using my points. Room had 2 queens and sofa bed. Fit our group perfectly. Pool was heated and my kids loved it and the hot tub. Breakfast was great with two types of waffle batter and eggs. Missed not having a potato option but still great. Would stay again. Very close to state beach park.
Manager Response: Dear 552trevorh,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review! Our entire team is thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so glad that you and your family were able to enjoy our pool and hot tub! We had them both resurfaced just before Thanksgiving, and we are so happy that they have been a big hit these past few weeks. We hope that you will come back and visit us again whenever you are back in the area.. Our team would love to welcome you Home!  Take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: The Perfect Beach Suite Hotel for the entire family!
Summary: This hotel never disappointed. From check in to check out everything was perfect. We stayed as a wedding party, but was surprised at the size of the suites, excellent customer experience, and food. I would highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Denise R,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a minute to say a big, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review. We are so glad to have been of service to you and the wedding party that you were with, and we hope that everything about the day was absolutely wonderful. We are so glad that you enjoyed our spacious suites and tasty breakfast... We love to help our guests feel at home.  Thank you again, and we hope to be able to welcome you back if you are ever in the area.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: My son got married in San Clemente so needed a hotel for pre wedding prep. Rafael text me prior to stay to see if I needed anything. He rearranged the room for me, And got an early check in for pre wedding prep. Everyone was wonderful and had the best stay. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear llamaldonado,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a great review! We are so very glad to hear that we were able to take care of all your hotel arrangements prior to your arrival, and we will make sure to pass along your kind words to Rafael as well! We wish your son all the happiness in the world, and we hope that you will come back and visit us again in the future... An anniversary perhaps? Until then, take care and have a wonderful day!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The staff started offering assistance before we even checked in!  The room was great for a family and the location was great for the wedding we attended  and was close to local restaurants with a beach vibe.
Manager Response: Dear Angelan290,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review! Our entire hotel team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us for such a special occasion... We love to celebrate weddings and love to make such memorable occasions that much more enjoyable. We hope that you had an excellent time, and we are so glad that we could make your stay an outstanding one. If you are ever back in the area, we hope to be able to welcome you back once again! Take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I had a very pleasant stay in San Clemente in this comfortable location. The staff was very pleasant and helpful. The breakfast is a nice start for the day. I had a beautiful view from my suite that enhanced my visit...
Manager Response: Dear RagsCanyonCountry,  Good morning! First of all, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a sincere and kind review. We love to hear feedback from our guests' stays, and we are so glad that we were able to help make yours a truly enjoyable one. We are all breakfast people around here, and we love that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast buffet... You're right, it is a great way to start the day! We hope that you were also able to enjoy a sunset or two from the view in your room.  Please feel free to come back whenever you are in the San Clemente area again... Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you home.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I was greeted and welcomed via text a number of days ahead of my stay by Amy. She was very upbeat and asked if there was anything she could do to enhance my stay. My request was taken seriously and my room was perfect. Upon arrival my check-in was handled by Andrew who was equally amazing. The service I recieved from these two individuals was absolutely first rate...the accommodations and experience were flawless...My best Hampton Inn experience ever...by a mile!
Manager Response: Dear 673adrienneb,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a stellar review! Amy and Andrew are absolutely amazing, and we are so glad to hear that they were able to make your stay outstanding, right from the start! We pride ourselves in having the friendliest hotel team around, and we love to help our guests feel right at home. We are overjoyed that your room was perfect, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all of our amenities, and all that San Clemente has to offer, while you were here! Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you like... We will be waiting to welcome you back home.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This is a really nice hotel- spacious rooms, great location centrally located and most important- fantastic staff. I can’t say enough about the staff here, starting with the front desk friendly and helpful to the room steward cheerful and warm each day.   I would highly recommend this hotel!  Mike S.
Manager Response: Dear Mike S,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to thank you for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review. We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so very glad that we were able to help you feel at home! San Clemente is a beautiful city, and we hope that you were able to take in all that there is to see and do while you were here. Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are back in the area, and please consider yourself home whenever you are here. Thank you again, and have a wonderful day!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Attended a wedding at the Golf Course next door. Our room was king suite, was very roomy, separate living room, with balcony. The small fridge was enough for drinks and snacks. Enjoyed my short stay, staff was very friendly and helpful. Has underground parking and ample parking in the back. We spent most of our time on the balcony just listening to the ocean surf. Hotel is close to beaches.
Manager Response: Dear 747roxannem,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a minute to say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind and warm review. We are beyond thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us while attending a wedding! What a great reason to make a trip to our beautiful city. We are so glad to hear that you were able to take in the sights and sounds of our lovely beach town, and yes, the surf is very relaxing! We hope that you will visit us again if you happen to be in town... Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you back!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We were in town for a wedding at the wedgewood. They text me the day before I checked in to see if I needed anything. I requested to be next to the brides room because I was in the bridal party and also if I could have an early check in because I was traveling with children. We were able to check in at 10:40 am on the same floor as the bride. Staff was so friendly and accommodating. The rooms were clean. They offer breakfast which was average. The only things that are inconvenient are the parking situation and the fact that they only have one elevator which is extremely slow. Take the stairs if you are able. Overall an excellent stay for the price if we are in town again we would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah C,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review or your stay with us. Our team is overjoyed to hear that your suite was clean and comfortable, and yes, we are a very convenient location to the Wedgewood Weddings venue. We do love to help make guests' weddings an easy and memorable time, and we hope that you were able to enjoy some of the beauty that San Clemente has to offer while you were here.  Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you like... Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I’ve been staying here for over 26 years for one weekend. I’ve never been disappointed in all these years. Especially the last two years. Amy, who works at the front desk is amazing. She is caring and can do almost anything that “superwoman” can do. Except maybe jump from a tall building. I love this place and I can’t say enough good things about Amy
Manager Response: Dear Apriltravel30,  Good morning! First of all, we would like to humbly thank you for choosing to stay with us for the past 26 years. We are absolutely honored to be of service for such a consistent span of time, and we are so grateful that you would choose us to be your home away from home.  Amy is such a big part of our hotel family here, and we surely treasure her and all that she does for our guests. Few people in this world are as kind and considerate as Amy, and we will surely make sure that she receives your kind words of appreciation.  We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for taking the time to leave us such a touching review, and we hope to be of service to you in the many years to come. Thank you again, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Kindest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This hotel was very clean and well kept. It is a couple miles from the actual beach and is located right against the I-5 freeway, but the noise was very well blocked out and not an issue for sleeping. The complimentary breakfast was good and had a large array of things to eat but some things were not very good. The staff was extremely helpful and the check in and out process was very easy and painless! Would definitely stay here and recommend this hotel to anyone! Great experience.
Manager Response: Dear 743kimberlib,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire hotel family, we would like to take a minute to say a big, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind and outstanding review. We are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so glad that your suite was quiet, clean and comfortable. We love to go out of our way to help our guests feel at home, and we are so glad that we were able to make this stay a success! We do hope that you will come back and visit us again... Our team will be waiting to welcome you Home! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Great room and hotel, and very good service.
Summary: Unfortunately, our room had a very strong smell of nail polish remover...like someone had spilled a whole bottle.  The smell seemed to improve over the ~10 hours we were in the hotel, but certainly impacted our experience.  They would have moved us to another room, but there was not a similar one and with our family of seven, we needed the space!
Manager Response: Dear Flyer59465672912,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a great review.
