We deeply appreciate all guest feedback, as that allows us to better ourselves for all of our guests. We would like to sincerely apologize for the odor in your room, and we are deeply sorry if this affected your stay in any way at all. We are very glad to hear that we were able to make this a five-star stay, despite the setback, and we do hope that you were able to enjoy all of the sights and sounds that San Clemente has to offer while you were here. If you are ever back in the area, please feel free to reach out to me directly at cherieb@dknhotels.com. I will make sure that everything with your next stay is world-class and outstanding. Take care, and have an excellent week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff made the trip perfect
Summary: An exceptional employee at our breakfast was Maria,  Fresh hot and cold items, but Maria was so sweet I had to mention.  Another outstanding employee was Amy.  I am writing about the staff because I don't think they ever get enough appreciation from the visitors.  My guests for my son's wedding all were complementary about the entire hotel, rooms, breakfast and cleanliness.
Manager Response: Dear Pathfinder367711,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to say a big, warm, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a fantastic review. I am so glad to hear that Maria helped make your stay exceptional- She really is one of our Shining Stars and an absolutely beloved member of our hotel family. Our Front Desk would not be the place that it is without Amy either, and it sounds like you received the world-class customer service that she is famous for!  We absolutely love to help our guests feel at home, an we are so glad that we could help make your son's special day that much brighter and memorable- It is our honor! Again, we thank you from the bottom of our hearts for taking the time to share such a kind and heartwarming message about our team, and we do hope to be able to welcome you back to our property in the future!  Take care, and have an absolutely wonderful day!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great place to stay, we used it several times and always receive great service. The rooms are clean, the staff is friendly and accommodating. The location is great for easy access on and off the 5 freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Menlewis79,  Good afternoon, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review! Our team is beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Welcome home! We are so glad to hear that our spacious suites fit the bill, and we are more than happy to make sure everything with your stay is clean and comfortable.  We hope that you will come back and visit us again soon... We will be ready and waiting to welcome you back through our doors when you do! Take care, and have a wonderful day.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Excellent price for Easter Week. One of the best hotels in San Clemente with an excellent location. The room rate was outstanding compared to lesser properties surprisingly so since this was the week before Easter and a lot of spring break families in the area.
Manager Response: Dear B5713Ntonys,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your time with us over Easter Weekend, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all of our many amenities while you were here. We do hope that you will come back and visit us whenever you are in San Clemente again... We would love to welcome you Home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Amy from the front desk was awesome! She texted me via the hotel a couple of nights before to ask if we needed anything for our stay and was super nice during our visit.   The bathrooms were clean and the sink was separate from the toilet and bathtub, which is helpful when more than one of you is getting ready in the morning. The room itself had a great view with a balcony and there was a nice living room area with a foldout couch and chairs. There was also a mini fridge, a microwave, and a sink in the living room.   We chose this hotel because of how close it is to downtown San Clemente and we will definitely be returning the next time we need a staycation.
Manager Response: Dear Happiness34670836855,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a minute to say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a fantastic review. We are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are in complete agreement about Amy... She is amazing, and a dear member of our hotel family.  We are so glad that you enjoyed our spacious suites and many hotel amenities, and we hope that you were able to enjoy downtown San Clemente while you were here... There is so much to see and do; San Clemente really has so much to offer! Please feel free to come back and visit us any time you are back in the area... We consider you family, and we always love to welcome our family members home. Take care, and have a wonderful day!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Unexpected delight!  Plenty of room, beautiful view, nice balcony and great service. Easy check in.  Staff was helpful with restaurant suggestions near by. Lovely area to visit and didnt get to see it all on our sisters' get away.  Planning a return visit.
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. Hawkins, We're so glad that you were able to come visit with us! - isn't San Clemente great? :). We are honored to be here for you and your family and we look forward to offering you more comfort and relaxation on your next adventure. Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: This hotel is great!  We encountered many staff members and all were friendly and helpful.  Rooms are nice, clean and quiet.  Hotel is very close to the freeway, gas stations and restaurants.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth,  Thank you so much for your kind words regarding your stay here with us! We're so glad to provide a friendly place for you to stay. We look forward to seeing you again when you're back in town. Until then :). Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: This hotel was pricier then then other hotel options but it was closest to wedding venue but boy are we glad we stayed.  The rooms were nice, the bridal sweet was great, the staff went above and beyond!
Manager Response: Dear David M,  Good afternoon! Our team is so thrilled to hear about your wonderful stay with us, and we just wanted to take a minute to thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. Congratulations to your daughter again, as well! We are so happy that you enjoyed our spacious suites, and yes, the Wedgewood bridal changing room is a great benefit for the bridal parties! We are so glad that we could help make such a big day that much easier for everyone involved. Please feel free to come back and visit us again if you are ever back in the area... Anniversary celebration, perhaps? You and your family are always welcome!   Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Incredible service, Huge rooms, gracious and helpful staff, complimentary breakfast at a great price!  We will definitely stay with Hampton Inn, again!  A special thank you to Amy and Herman for treating us like VIPS!  They text you BEFORE your stay to ask if there is anything special needed!  Nice touch!
Manager Response: Dear HBTerry,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such a kind and heartfelt review. We are absolutely thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us, and also our world class service! Amy and Herman are both wonderful members of our team, and we greatly cherish and value their part in our hotel family. We hope that you were able to get out and about in San Clemente while you were here; there is so much to see and do at this time of the year! Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you like... Our doors and our arms will be open to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Awesome stay, great staff, professional service as always.  San Clemente Hampton Inn & Suites staff are exemplary, always going above and beyond.  Highly recommend staying for business or leisure.  Thanks again for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Dear Dana G, Thank you so much for staying with us and your kind words in your review. It is our absolute pleasure to host you and all our guests in a comfortable atmosphere with all the amenities we can muster :). Come back and stay with us anytime- we're here for you! Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: This Hampton is better than most!
Summary: My husband and were on our way to San Diego and stayed at the Hampton in San Clemente.  All the rooms are suites and they have a better breakfast that most - fresh fruit, not from a can!  it's next to a golf course and not far from the beach.
Manager Response: Dear JoySpohn,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely and kind review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious suites and delicious breakfast. And yes, it is absolutely lovely to look out on our golf course side to see the hills and the golfers enjoying our beautiful weather. We do hope that you will come back and visit us again soon... We would love to have you back!  Take care, and have a wonderful day.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Really Great Service, Nice Room, Great Location
Summary: The staff at the Hampton Inn in San Clemente were exemplary. We need these  people at all hotels. Before our arrival I got a text saying that they were looking forward to our staying with them with a number to call with any questions. I called asked if we could get an early check-in and they were happy to accommodate. The head of housekeeping called me 3 hours before regular check-in  and cheerfully informed me that our room was ready.     The greeting at the front desk was so warm and welcoming. The young woman at the registration desk made us feel like they really wanted to make our stay there special. The room was clean, spacious and  very comfortable. Breakfast was very good and everywhere we went in the hotel from breakfast room to hallways to lobby to parking garage the
Manager Response: Dear Larrydebo,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente, I would like to take a minute to say, "Thank you!" for going out of your way to leave us such a warm and kind review. We are absolutely thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so happy that we were able to help you feel at home! We love to make guests a part of our family. It sounds like you were really able to enjoy all of our many amenities, and we hope that you were able to dip your toes in the water while you were out by the Pier! The waves and the restaurants are just some things that make San Clemente such an amazing town. Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are back in the area! Our team will be waiting to welcome you back with open arms. Have a great day!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: My wife and I travel a lot and we have used Hampton Inn's in the past. Our experience with the San Clemente location was not good at all, the noise from the I5 interstate was awful and we had to buy ear plugs to sleep. The air conditioner leaked a lot of water that made even more noise. Staff forgot to call us for a wake up call. Do not recommend when traveling.
Manager Response: Dear Curiosity729583,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us a review of your recent stay with us. We welcome all guest feedback, both positive and not, so we can better grow for you, our guests. We apologize that the ocean-view side of the property was too noisy... I am a light sleeper myself, and know that peace and quiet is necessary for a good night's sleep. I would recommend requesting the golf-course side if you happen to give us another try, as that side will face towards the hills and the sunrise. I am so very sorry about the wake-up call issue as well. Please know that we have addressed the issue, and it has been rectified. We do hope that you will come back and visit us again if you are back in the area. Please feel free to reach out to us directly, and we will make sure that the room location is an ideal match for your traveling needs. Thank you for your feed back again, and we hope that your day is pleasant!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night and the breakfast and the pool was great for the kids.  They especially loved the waffles at breakfast.  The beds were comfortable and we enjoyed the convenience of texting with the staff ahead of time to get an earlier check-in.  Black-out curtains were excellent and allowed me to take a nap in the middle of the afternoon.  The only thing I would add would be black-out to the interior door so that people in the other half of the suite could turn lights on without lighting up the bedroom too.   Super close to San Clemente beach, convenient parking, friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Maps05939300217,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a fun review! You are actually our first "pool" review of the year, and we are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed some time in the water! We had our pool and Jacuzzi renovated back in November, and we love to hear when guests are able to take advantage of the space. We are so glad that the waffles were able to hit the spot for breakfast too! A tasty bite to eat is always the best way to start the day, especially before heading to the beach or pool. I personally love to douse my waffles with mountains of sprinkles. Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are in the San Clemente area! Our friendly team will be waiting to help you feel at home on your next visit with us, and the waffles and pool will be waiting as well. Take care!  Sunniest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The spacious well kept room was perfect for our family. It is minutes away from the beach and right next to a beautiful golf course. Everyone from the staff that we interacted with was courteous and helpful. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Trejep,  Good morning! Our team would like to take a minute to say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind review. We are so glad that we were able to help you and your family feel at home while you were with us, and we hope that you were able to enjoy the beach as well! San Clemente is a wonderful town, with sights and sounds for the entire family.   Please feel free to come back any time! Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you Home.  Warmest regards,   Cherie Brower  General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We were texted in advance, greeted by the manager and treated with kindness and respect. We were encouraged to take a preferred parking spot and given a room with an ocean view. Great service, comfortable room, all provisions. Feels warm and I loved the location!
Manager Response: Dear Raquel W,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so glad that we were able to help you feel at home during such a momentous weekend. We hope that everything about your weekend was wonderful, and we hope to be of service again if you are ever back in the area! Please enjoy your day, and thank you again for your kind words.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Awesome experience and very friendly staff. Made us feel totally at ease and was willing to go the extra mile. The check in was smooth and we didn't have to spend any time wince everything was taken care prior to arrival
Manager Response: Dear Greencontributor11,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to give you a big thumbs up and say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a fantastic review. We are so happy to hear that we were able to help you feel comfortable and at home while you were with us, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all that San Clemete has to offer while you were here! Please feel free to come back and visit at any time; Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you Home!   Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great hotel with a great staff.   We selected this hotel for a visit  to San Clemente, CA to celebrate our 60th wedding anniversary.    WHAT A SURPRISE  when we arrived at our suite.  We found  a beautifully decorated anniversary cake,  a bottle of champagne,  a bouquet of flowers, and an anniversary card signed  by the whole staff.  Cherie and her  staff were terrific. They were very  accommodating, efficient, and pleasant. The suite was quiet,   kept clean and neat,  and the breakfast brunch was great.  	  I am a retired executive who has traveled extensively  internationally on business staying in many five star hotels  world wide.  I have never been treated better and felt more  comfortable than at the San Clemente Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: Dear ontrag15,  Good morning! We are so deeply thrilled and grateful that we were able to help you celebrate your 60th anniversary! We absolutley love to help mark all the wonderful points in life, and 60 years of love is certainly a cause for celebration. Congratulations again! We thank you so much for sharing your time and your memories with us... Please feel free to come back and visit us again; You will always have a home away from home here in San Clemente!  Warmest regards,   Cherie Brower  General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Quality below expectations for Hampton Inn
Summary: Positives: location easy off freeway, staff friendly, surprisingly quiet for how close to freeway it was (we were on golf course side) Negatives: odd smell of musty, moldy, chemical in room and hallways.  Breakfast items did not seem fresh.  Overall quality well below usual Hampton Inn brand standard.  I will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Edward,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review regarding your recent stay with us. We thank you for your feedback, and we do apologize that your accommodations were not up to your expectations. We love to help our guests feel at home, and we are truly sorry for any trouble or inconvenience an odor may have caused. We will have our engineering team double check our vents in the hallways, to make sure that everything is up to par. We do hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the San Clemente area, as we would love another opportunity to "wow!" you. Take care, and have a pleasant rest of the day.  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: We were very pleased with the service.  The evening Manager Rolaura, made sure we had the perfect room.  We had trouble adjusting the heater, and they fixed it immediately.  We were asked by several of the staff, if it was working properly. They even said they’d move us to another room, if need be.  Clean!!! Well stocked with towels and extra blankets.   Thank you for making our stay a pleasant one!!
Manager Response: Dear LVNG2LOVEU,  Good morning! Our team would like to take a moment to say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a sincere review. We are so glad that we could assist with the heater issue, and yes, Rolaura is such a rockstar member of our hotel family! We hope that your entire stay was enjoyable, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all that San Clement has to offer. Please feel free to come back and visit again whenever you are in the area... We would love to welcome you home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We stayed here for a week. When we first arrived, I wasn’t too impressed. I thought the place was a bit outdated. My thoughts soon changed, to appreciate this older hotel. The staff was so wonderful and welcoming. They kept the room very clean. We had a wonderful week staying here!
Manager Response: Dear T7076KKemilym,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such a kind review. Our team is so happy that we were able to help you feel right at home while you are with us... We like to think of our guests as family, and our home is your home. We hope that you were able to enjoy some of the beautiful sights and sounds of San Clemente during your week; There is so much to do, even in the cooler/rainy weather! We do hope that your weekend was outstanding, and we hope to be able to be of service to you whenever you are back in the area... We would love to welcome you Home! Until then, take care!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: San Clemente is a beautiful town and the Hampton there is just that, beautiful. We enjoyed the conversations with the staff who were all  incredibly friendly and helpful. We had a beautiful view of the ocean from our extremely clean room. We loved our time there!
Manager Response: Dear Paradise25129899633,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to take a moment to sincerely thank you for leaving us such a kind review..  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us! We love to help our guests feel at home when they are traveling, and it sounds like your stay was spot on! We hope that you were able to enjoy some of the sights and sounds of San Clemente while you were here, and we hope that you will come back to visit soon! Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you home.   Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower  General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Staff welcomed us as soon as we arrived and were friendly and accommodating. Convenient to downtown areas and nearby local restaurants. We had an ocean view room and enjoyed our stay while being away from home on our weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Vacation48678235009,  Good morning! On behalf our our entire team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente, we would like to say a big, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review. We are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us; We love to help our guests feel at home! It sounds like you were able to enjoy our world-class customer service and some of the many sights and sounds that San Clemente has to offer. Even during the winter season, San Clemente is truly a hidden gem of OC! Please feel free to come back and visit whenever you like... Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Wonderful service and staff - very welcoming and accommodating. I was pleased with the view from my room and amenities as well. I would definitely stay at this property again in the future.  Breakfast was typical Hampton inn style, and I was disappointed that there weren’t more options (sausage or bacon) of the hot breakfast - since I do not eat eggs.   Gym had free weights, bosu balls and yoga mats, along with some cardio machines. Tight quarters when there are even a few others working out at the same time. Nonetheless, a great stay
Manager Response: Dear JetstephanieA, Thank you so much for taking the time to review us and also for your truly kind words :). We have a unique location with view opportunities of both the ocean and the golf course, and we're glad you got to take it all in! We have a variety of different breakfast meat options throughout the week from sausage patties, to links, to bacon (but unfortunately not all at the same time) come back and visit us again on a different day and we'll have something new for you! I'm glad you had an opportunity to also use or workout room- I'm sorry it was tight for you when others were there, may I recommend a dip in the pool or some suggested running paths? There's a beautiful trail that runs along the beach, we would love to point you in that direction next time you visit with us! Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager

Summary: I stay at the Hampton Inn in San Clemente every time I travel on business to this area. All of the staff are awesome—it truly is like “coming home” each time. The location is also great. Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear Stacey, We are honored to be your home away from home each time, every time :). Your happiness and the happiness of all our guests means so much to us. Thank you so much for taking a minute to review us! We look forward to seeing you again on your next business trip. Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: The Hilton Honors website makes this place seem much nicer than it is. I wish I would've booked us at the Dana Point Doubletree like last time we came down here. This hotel needs a remodel. Not coming back.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Rachina, We are very sorry to hear you did not enjoy your stay here with us. Based on this and your other review, I understand that the appearance of our hotel was a lead factor in your decision and are glad to hear that our staff lived up to your expectations. While we are not the newest hotel, we take every care to make your stay outstanding from comfort of rooms, to breakfast, to the support of our staff. Please accept our apologies for your experience and please see my response to your other review. Take care and best wishes Mr. Rachina. Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager

Summary: We were welcomed by a very warm and hospitable staff.  The hotel was very clean, quiet, and comfortable.  The underground parking was very convenient and there is also outdoor parking.  The breakfast was just OK.  The hotel is close to good restaurants, and close to the beach.  It felt like an upscale B & B.
Manager Response: Dear 2travelingdudes,  Good morning! First of all, our team absolutely loves your username- Very fun! We are truly thrilled to hear that you had a great stay with us while in San Clemente, and it sounds like you were able to enjoy your time here during Superbowl Weekend. With the beaches just a few minutes away and many delicious restaurants just down the way, we are so happy that you chose to make us your home base while on the road! We do hope that you will come back and visit whenever you are in the area; Our friendly team will be waiting to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great location and accommodation. Clean and good price value. We walked 2mins to a local Irish pub and food and hospitality was great. Many restaurants available on short distances. Beach area amazing. Will go again
Manager Response: Dear Paul G,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente, we would like to give you a big shout out and say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a fantastic review. We are so glad to hear that you made your way over to Molly Bloom's (definitely a local favorite, and some of the best shepard's pie around), and our gorgeous State beach! San Clemente is truly a hidden gem in Orange County, and it sounds like you definitely made the most of your stay. Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you like... We will be waiting to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Nice place to stop after traveling all day
Summary: We stayed a night at this Hampton after my wife and I had spent a couple days in Hollywood/LA and were headed back to San Diego. The location is easy to get to, parking is easy and check in was quick. Our room was nice and roomy. Comfy bed and a Great HVAC system kept our room comfortable. One downside is I chose a room that had an ocean view with I-5 traffic noise. But we still got a good nights rest and having the balcony is a nice asset. Breakfast was good and plentiful. Staff was helpful and friendly. I’d stay here again, especially for the cost.
Manager Response: Dear brianfL1486FL,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review! Our entire team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. Hollywood to San Diego can be quite the stretch, and we are so glad that you chose to stay with us to rest! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your suite and our tasty breakfast... That's always a great way to start the day! Please feel free to come back and visit us whenever you are back in the area. I do recommend a "golf course view" room for your next stay- The sunrise is beautiful, and the east side of the property is a bit more peaceful for travelers who are a bit more sensitive to road noise. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower  General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: From the day before our reservation when I was messaged and asked if I needed anything for our stay through the checkout process, I don't have one complaint. A very clean, comfortable hotel with clean and comfortable rooms. The hot breakfast in the morning was great! If back in the area again, I will definitely be staying at the Hampton Inn again.
Manager Response: Dear Curious27110795151,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente, we would like to say a big, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a warm and kind review. Everyone, from the Front Office Team to our Housekeeping Team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.... We love to help our guests feel at home! We are so glad that you enjoyed your room and our delicious breakfast, which is always a great way to start the day. Please consider yourself a part of our hotel family, and feel free to stay whenever you are in the beautiful San Clemente area. We will be waiting to welcome you back!  Until then, take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week,  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This was a first rate stay at a first rate hotel. We stayed two days and every staff member we encountered was beyond friendly. Clean rooms, decent breakfast, great location and an upgraded room. You even get a view, water or golf course.
Manager Response: Dear JRL5,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take a moment to say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a wonderful review. We are thrilled that we were able to help you feel at home while you were with us, which is our greatest accomplishment!  It sounds like you were able to enjoy our tasty breakfast, and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your suite as well; The views of the area are absolutely beautiful, and we hope that you were able to enjoy one of our famous sunsets while you were in the area!  Please feel free to come back and visit whenever you are in the area. Our team will be waiting to welcome you back Home. Until then, take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: As  a pastor a time of consecration is important and this hotel was perfect for my needs to sit and read , study, and relax good clean hotel and rooms.Complimentary Breakfast  served daily. Free parking structure. Easy accessGreat trip
Manager Response: Dear Terrence H,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to take a moment to say a big, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind and heartfelt review. We are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and it sounds like you were really able to relax and enjoy a quite Home Away From Home. Our Breakfast Team is so glad that you enjoyed our tasty, complimentary breakfast, and our Housekeeping Team is happy that your suite was to your liking. We hope that you will come back and visit us whenever you are in the area... We would love to welcome you back!  Take care, and have a wonderful weekend!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great value.  Stayed here with 2 kids under 2 and the one bedroom suite was great.   They supplied us with a pack n play and it worked great.  Staff was amazingly friendly.  You can see the ocean but the location is right on the freeway; even so, with the balcony door closed you couldn’t hear any traffic.  Breakfast was really good but really crowded.  Overall great value.
Manager Response: Dear Escape, Thank you so much for writing us a review! We love having families like yours coming to visit with us and taking care of all of your comfort needs as a hotel should- making it your home away from home. The ocean and sunsets here have been spectacular here the last week and we've had so many wonderful guests staying with us during the holidays. We hope you all had a memorable time here with us and we look forward to seeing you again in 2019. Happy New Year to you! Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Nice little hotel off the main beat but with sea view
Summary: I stayed here in passing to be closer to the Airport in the morning (40 minutes).  welcomed by very friendly staff who also recommended a place to eat. The rooms we had were large with comfortable beds and a decent view over the sea despite having the highway in between. The sound insulation is good and even if one could hear the traffic it was very faint. Breakfast had the essentials. Parking was free.
Manager Response: Dear JohnWennborg,  Good morning! Our team would like to take a minute to say, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind review. We are always thrilled to hear when our guests enjoy their time with us, and we are so happy to hear that you felt at home. We hope that you found a great place to eat, as there are so many delicious options blocks away! If you are ever back in the area, please feel free to come on back... We would love to welcome you back home! Take care, and have a wonderful week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I have to start this review by saying that the front desk staff at this hotel are some of the best I have ever encountered. They were friendly, helpful  and willing to go out of their way for the customer.   My room was spacious and accommodating. The tv in the main room didn’t get the same channels as the bedroom, which was very frustrating. The room was not all that quiet either, I could hear the traffic from the road below, I-5.   Maybe next time I will try and request a room that doesn’t face the beach. Will definitely be willing to try again.
Manager Response: Dear Scotchman2926,  Good morning! Our team loves to hear that we were able to help a guest feel at home, and it sounds like we were spot on with your stay! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and felt taken care of. Our greatest hope is that guests feel like they are a part of our family when they are with us.  I would like to apologize for the television issues in your room, and we will certainly have our fantastic chief engineer take a look at this first this today! I know that there are a few favorite channels of mine that I would be very frustrated not to have. And yes, our "golf course" side rooms are just as lovely as the rooms that face out towards the beach, and most of the rooms on the golf course side have balconies as well! We would be happy to help out with this request the next time that you are here. As always, please feel free to come back and visit whenever you like... Our doors are open, and our team is waiting to welcome you back home!

Summary: We have traveled to San Clemente about a dozen times in the past 3 years and we stay here every time. The staff have become like our family. Everyone is so friendly and professional. They all bend over backward to make our stay as pleasant as possible - and they succeed every time. I can't imagine staying anywhere else in the area. This is our home away from home.
Manager Response: Dear Kentheriot1066,  Good morning! First of all, we love your handle! Very creative! Our entire team is so thrilled to hear that you have been enjoying your time with us, here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente. To hear that a guest feels like they are a part of our family is truly the greatest compliment that we could ever receive, and we are so very happy to make our home yours. We hope to be of service to you years to come, and please feel free to come back and visit whenever you are in the area... Our hearts and our doors are always open to you and yours.  Thank you so much, and please have a wonderful rest of your week!

Summary: The front desk staff at this Hampton are fantastic!  They go the extra mile for you.  Breakfast is what you expect at the Hampton Inn and the beds are great!  Location is close to the beach with easy access to the freeways.
Manager Response: Dear Kristin A,  Good morning! Our entire team would like to say a big, "Thank You!" for taking the time to leave us such an outstanding review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us, and your review has certainly made our day! We love to help our guests feel at home when they are with us, and we are so glad to hear that we were able to keep that going during your stay. We hope that you were able to enjoy some of the beauty of San Clemente while you were here; The beaches are fantastic when the cooler weather sets in. Please feel free to come visit whenever you like... We will be waiting to welcome you back!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Friendly staff, nice room with view of the ocean, good breakfast, very convenient location to downtown San Clemente and Camp Pendleton, garage parking. Love the pillows! Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Jofish2017,   Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to take this opportunity to say, "Thank you!" for a leaving us such a warm and friendly review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and it sounds like you were really able to enjoy the best that our property and city has to offer. Our team works hard to help our guests feel at home, and San Clemente is a wonderful place to live and visit... We are so glad that you had a memorable stay. Please feel free to come back and visit us soon, downtown is beautiful during the holiday season!  Warmest regards,   Cherie Brower  General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: older but homey Hampton Inn with great location and service
Summary: I stayed for a week in late July/early August. The location was just minutes from shopping and the beach in San Clemente and was seconds off the interstate for travel north towards all the stops on the way towards LA or south towards Carlsbad and San Diego. Breakfast was typical HI. Clean dinning room and friendly staff. The lobby was clean and cute and the staff was friendly and helpful. We were able to get a Lyft ride in about 5 minutes for a Saturday night at the wine bars downtown. The room was clean and traditional but a little old. We had a king suite and it was very roomy. The service in the room was great. No complaints. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear docgompf,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to leave us such a terrific review! Love your username by the way. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while you were in San Clemente. Our hotel is small but mighty! It sounds like you had a great time in Downtown, there really are some fantastic wine bars and restaurants in the area. What better way to celebrate the changing of the seasons than a fun evening out on the town! Our team is so happy to hear that you felt at home while you were with us, and we are glad that your suite was comfortable and to your liking. Please, feel free to come back whenever you like. We would love to be of service to you again! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This is the ONLY place we will stay when we visit this area.  The location is great for military families visiting those stationed nearby.  The staff is very friendly and wonderful to engage with.  THANKS!!
Manager Response: Dear Eden B,  Good morning! What a pleasant surprise this morning to see your wonderfully kind review of our property! Our entire team has been absolutely thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are so happy to hear that we were able to make our home your home while you were on the road. We absolutely love taking care of our military and their families, and we really love to be of service... It is our way of giving back for all that the military and their families do for our country. So from the bottom of our hearts, Thank you!  We hope to see you again soon, San Clemente is absolutely beautiful around the holidays!  Sincerest of regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Three wonderful stays within the past four weeks!
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel three separate times in the past four weeks (due to work commitments in the area).  I have found that the employees at this property are extremely courteous, helpful, and professional.  I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Stacey2023,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to sincerely thank you for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful heartfelt review... We love to help every guest feel at home when they are with us, and we are so glad to be able to be of service to you! Knowing that you have enjoyed your time with us warms our hearts. We hope that you have been enjoying your time in San Clemente, and all of the beauty that the area has to offer. If you haven't been to the San Clemente Pier yet, we highly recommend taking a stroll over there before sunset... The waves and the water are just beautiful at that time of day! We hope that you are enjoying your week, and we can't wait to welcome you back home, soon!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower (and our Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente Team) General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: My husband and I took a quick trip anniversary trip to SOCAL and stayed 1 night at the Hampton Inn in San Clemente in our way between LA and San Diego.  We were very pleasantly surprised with how much we enjoyed San Clemente and the local Hampton Inn gove us exceptional customer service during our short stay.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie L,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave our property such a kind review! Our team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed our world-class customer service as well! We do try to make sure all of our guests feel at home with us during their stay.We do hope that you were able to enjoy some of the beauty that San Clemente has to offer during your short stay; May I recommend exploring Downtown San Clemente during your next visit to the area? There are some amazing restaurants by the pier, as well as many wonderful, locally-owned stores and shops.  Please feel free to come back and visit any time... Our team here waiting to welcome you and your husband back Home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This lovely facility is well designed and conveniently located.  The staff is first rate.  The breakfast is more tasteful and abundant.  The only serious draw back is the noise from the freeway between the hotel and the ocean.  A closed door keeps out the noise.  Unfortunately, an open door to enjoy the ocean breeze and view lets it in.
Manager Response: Dear Jill, Thank you so much for staying with us and taking the time to write us a review! We're so happy you enjoyed our location in beautiful San Clemente by the beach, our wonderful staff, and the complementary breakfast (I love those waffles!). I'm sorry to hear that you were disturbed by the outside noise with the door open. Our location is blessed with the benefit of views BOTH ways, with the other half of the hotel overlooking the golf course. We hope that you'll visit with us again, and if you put in a request for the golf course side we can arrange that so you can enjoy the ocean breezes, great view, and no freeway. Sincerely, Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager

Summary: This Hampton Inn was adequate for my stay during a friend's wedding.  The staff were very welcoming and friendly.  My only issue with the hotel is its location, right next to a busy street, which was loud.
Manager Response: Dear Posiblonde,  Good evening! We would like to take a moment to say, "Thank you!" for leaving us a review of your time with us during your friend's wedding. We are happy to hear that our team helped you feel at home with our world-class hospitality, and we hope that you were able to enjoy some of our many amenities while you were with us. I am sorry to hear that outside noise kept you up at night... If you are ever with us again, we do offer many comfortable suites on the golf course side of the property-most of which have balconies as well! We do sincerely thank you again for taking the time to give us your feedback, and we wish you a wonderful and happy remainder of your week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: In town for my son’s wedding. Staff bent over backwards to accommodate our numerous requests. Couldn’t have been happier with the service we received. I have never seen such helpful staff. Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear Susan M,  Good evening! Our team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites would like to take a moment to sincerely thank you for leaving us such a warm and kind review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and we are so glad that we were able to help you feel at home. Congratulations to your son on his wedding as well! We wish your family nothing but love and happiness in the years to come. Please feel free to come back and visit whenever you like- Consider yourself among family when you are here.  Warmest wishes and regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Last night I stayed in Room 321 and everything was perfect from Amy at the front desk getting me all checked in even though it was only 1 pm to Herman helping me with the Business Center and everything in between. The Ocean View Room was amazing especially at Sunset! The room had a King size bed with a separate sitting and TV area on the Ocean View side. Even though I-5 is close by I didn’t hear a sound. The underground parking is very nice and I felt as if my motorcycle was very safe there. The morning breakfast is served on the 1st floor and was great with all the yogurt, cereals and fruits that I eat in the morning. There was plenty of hot food too. Lots of caffeine free tea choices too. A typical perfect Hilton property experience as usual!
Manager Response: Dear Tim, I absolutely love your review! We are so honored to have had you as our guest. If I could, I'd put your review in every magazine and publication I could get my hands on- beautifully worded and so sincere. We so look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. Until then, I hope your days and bright and beautiful. Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: The hotel was okay, easy access off the highway.  Walking distance to beach and pier (quite enjoyable and scenic route as well!).  Room was average, but clean enough.  AC unit was extremely loud and made it hard to sleep.  It even caused the bathroom to rattle/shake when running on high. Overall, it was an okay hotel with a decent location.  Front desk staff was really kind and welcoming.  Price was decent for area.
Manager Response: Dear NolesRx08,  Good afternoon, and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review of your recent stay! Our team works hard to make sure that each one of our guests feels at home while they are with us, and we do pride ourselves in our kind hospitality. I do apologize that the AC unit caused discomfort, and we will make sure that our maintenance team takes a look at the unit right away- The comfort of our guests is our upmost priority. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your scenic walk to the pier, and we hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area! We would love another opportunity to make this your Home Away from Home.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: our stay was awesome. room was clean and very spacious. Manager Amy was very kind and we look forward to staying at this property again. There was a beautiful view of the ocean as well. The location was perfect. One can walk to the beach from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Phillip O,   Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review! Our team is thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time here with us, and we are so happy that Amy was able to make your stay that much more special... She is such a beloved member of our family here! We hope that you were able to enjoy the beauty of San Clemente while you were here, and yes, the beach is just a stone's throw away! Please feel free to come back and visit us any time... We would love to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Yelled at my autistic daughter to be quiet!
Summary: I would not recommend this hotel for families of autistic children. Herman at the front desk is going to yell at you to keep your child quiet by 8: 30 at night if they should run amok before the bath time by 9 you can expect them at your door telling you he's going to call the sheriff's and have you removed from the property. Never again! Hilton should be ashamed of having someone like Herman work for them.
Manager Response: Dear Sara M.,  For the occurrence in question; please know that all of our staff followed proper protocol in the resolution of this matter in a professional manor. For further discussion to the specifics of your stay you may contact me at Andrews@DKNHotels.com - I'd be happy to speak with you.  Andrew Sunderly Assistant General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff were very helpful.  Especially the friont desk at the evening at check in and the desk at check out on the Sunday.  The breakfast was good but the room was too tight and needs to be larger.
Manager Response: Dear raysobrinojr,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time  to leave us such a kind review. We are so glad to hear that our world-class team was able to help you feel at home while you are with us... Our entire hotel family is amazing! We are glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our delicious breakfast, but we are sorry to hear that seating was a little tight. Summertime is our most popular time in scenic San Clemente!  If you are ever back in the area please feel free to come on by...  We would love to welcome you back home.  Warmest regards,   Cherie Brower  General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Can't go wrong with this hotel
Summary: Every time we travel we look for Hampton Inn's, first. We have never had a bad experience with them. They are a tiny bit on the pricey side, but we are willing to pay the little bit extra for what we receive. We always have the kids with us, so the included breakfast is a BIG deal. It saves us a ton of money on food. They also have 24 hour coffee/hot chocolate and free prime time freshly baked cookies. There's nothing spectacular about the rooms, per se, but, then again, you are probably not staying there to spend all day in the room. They have several movie channels on the TV's and the free internet service works just fine. The staff is attentive and they get you whatever you need without delay, whenever you ask for something extra (Towels, blankets, pillows, etc). We have
Manager Response: Dear 221peterq,  Good afternoon! Nothing makes our hotel family team happier than to hear that one of our guests truly enjoyed their time with us, and we are so glad to hear that we were able to make your stay! Our team certainly loves everyone who comes through our door feel at home. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy our tasty hot breakfast buffet, and yes, our evening cookies are DELICIOUS! We hope that you were able to enjoy the beauty and simple fun of San Clemente while your family was with us, and it sounds like you were able to catch one of our breathtaking neon sunsets. Please feel free to come back and visit us again whenever you are back in the area... We will have a parking space open and fresh, hot baked cookies waiting for you and your entire family!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Great staff and very clean hotel. Was worried about proximity to highway but door and blinds kept all noise out.
Summary: Had a great experience at this hotel. Housekeeping and front desk staff were always helpful and professional. Rooms were cleaned very well. Good breakfast selection. My children enjoyed the pool. Would stay there again
Manager Response: Dear mntraveler757,  Good afternoon! Our team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente would like to take a moment to say a big, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a kind review from your recent stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our world-class hospitality and spacious suites. San Clemente is absolutely the best place to take the family in the summer, and we are so glad that your children enjoyed our pool as well! It's been a hot one, there's nothing better than to take a splash in the pool! Please come back and visit us again soon... We would love to welcome your family back Home!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Stopped here on the way up to LA from SD. Good location and very nice staff.  Rooms are a bit older but everything was in good working order.  Staff was very nice.  Parking was a little tight and I was forced to park in a shady looking alley adjacent to the hotel.  Car was fine in the morning but it didn't feel great when I had to leave my car on the street like that.
Manager Response: Dear skiang,  Good afternoon, and thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback from your recent stay with us! Our team works hard to make sure that guests feel at home while they are with us in beautiful San Clemente, and it sounds like we were right on the mark. You may be excited to hear that we are slated for a parking lot improvement later on this year, which will help our guests with parking during our more busy times. San Clemente is certainly a destination area, and we do want to make sure that our guests have a comfortable and happy stay while they are with us. Please feel free to come on by if you are ever in the area... We would love to welcome you back home!  Warmest regards,   Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Overall check-in was a breeze.  Staff was friendly.  At first the room seemed great but the toilet smelled really bad and the beds were incredibly uncomfortable.  The walls were thin and there were kids running up and down them at night, keeping my daughter awake in the front living area.  Pool was the biggest disappointment and ultimately the reason we checked out (other than the beds). Algae on the steps and black spots on the bottom.  The floor of the spa had a ton of sand.
Manager Response: Dear lovetheknightskye,  Good afternoon! We would like to thank you for taking the time to leave us a review of your recent stay with us. Our team welcomes all guest feedback, as that allows us to grow and better ourselves for our guests to come. We are sorry to hear that our Hampton Cloud 9 beds were not to your liking, and we are looking into ways to help guests who may need softer or firmer mattresses during their stay. You may be also excited to hear that we are scheduled to have our pool resurfaced later on this year! Our team is looking forward to the positive improvements to continue to better ourselves for the years to come. We do hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area... We would love another opportunity to help you feel at home.  Sincerest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: It was a short stay but a very pleasant one. The staff was very professional, helpful and pleasant. The room was clean and very comfortable. The hotel was quiet and pleasant. We didn't use the pool but we did have the complementary breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear idaanak,   Good morning! Our team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente would like to take a moment to sincerely thank you for leaving us such a kind review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are delighted to hear that our suites were comfortable and pleasant. Our team works hard to make sure that all of our guests are happy and delighted with their stay, and ot sounds like you are able to enjoy a good deal of our amenities as well! A tasty, hot breakfast is a great way to start the day! We do hope that you will come back and visit us again, we would love to welcome you back Home.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I used this hotel to book a couple rooms for our wedding.  Along the way the management kept changing and terms of my block did as well.   When my guests went to finally book it, they said it wasn't even there.   After we checked out - they charged us over $385 in room charges TWICE.  They even put rooms fees on a card that was authorized for damages only causing me a huge headache and fear that they would just use this card information as they pleased.   After dealing with all this on my honeymoon, they didn't even follow up with us to confirm charges were reversed or to apologize.   TERRIBLE!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ashleyacosta13,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We do thank you for patience during our change in sales leadership on property, and we are glad that we were able to address any booking questions or concerns for your guests in a timely manner, prior to the start of your event. We do deeply apologize for the miscommunication regarding billing, along with the concern that it caused. If you would like to speak further, please feel free to reach out to me directly at cherieb@dknhotels.com. Thank you for your feedback again.  Sincerest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place, good amenities, just a little pricey
Summary: Overall this is a solid hotel. Jacuzzi and pool available, complimentary breakfast provided, rooms had A/C, looked nice and were fairly large (1 Queen bed corner room). The wifi was simple to connect to and I never had to wait in a line for check in or check out. My only complaint would be that it was a bit pricey. I'd say if I paid about $50 less, it'd be 5 star for its value.
Manager Response: Dear Megan_Medeir0s,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious suites and complimentary hot breakfast. We do hope that you enjoyed some of the beauty of San Clemente during your time here with us, and we hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area. We would love to welcome you home.  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This hotel felt more like a Motel 6, needs lots of renovation. Everything looked great in the picture but inside the room is a bit outdated. Perfect location right near the freeway, the noise you can't really hear. Not worth what I paid for but since everything else was sold out I had no option.
Manager Response: Dear Scc0101,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We welcome all feedback and do thank our guests for their stay with us. We are centrally located to all of San Clemente, just a half our south of Irvine, and about 40 minutes north of San Diego. We do hope that you were able to enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast and free WiFi during your stay with us. If you are ever back in the area, we do hope that you will give us another try, as we would love the opportunity to really "wow!" you.  Please take care, and thank you again for your time and review.  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Freeway & Pipe noise for light sleepers
Summary: This hotel is located just east of the busy I-5 freeway. It’s a small narrow shoebox style hotel with rooms on the east & west sides of the building. Even though we have a room on the east side, overlooking the little golf course, and opposite the rooms which face the freeway, we could hear the freeway noise all night. And with it being Memorial Day Weekend, there was steady traffic all night.     Also, the pipes were making tapping noises all night long. Perhaps it was the water pipers. Even my husband, who is a heavy sleeper, could hear them. We woke up many times, and had a light sleep the rest of the time. I could tell by the many dreams I remembered. Even my teenage son is tired today, and he usually has lots of energy. He’s playing in a soccer tournament, so it may affect
Manager Response: Dear SoccerCentralCat,  Good evening! I would just like to start out with a very big Thank You! for leaving us such a sincere and well-worded review. I know what a good chunk of time it takes to write a review, so I thank you very much for that. I would like to apologize from the bottom of my heart that your stay with us was less than desirable. Our team works hard to make sure that our guests are comfortable and well rested during their stay, and I am so sorry that we missed the mark. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our tasty buffet breakfast, and we do hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area... I do recommend the rooms on the golf course side for lighter sleepers (myself included!), though our windows on the ocean view side are double-paned. If you do find yourselves back this way, please feel free to reach out to me at cherieb@dknhotels.com, and I would be happy to assist with finding your ideal room location. Please take care, and we all wish you a safe and happy weekend.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Nice hotel. Breakfast was different each day which is nice. Walking distance to the beach and restaurants. About 30 minutes from legoland and an hour from San Diego zoo. Would stay here again if we went back.
Manager Response: Dear Mcwes,  Good afternoon! Our team wanted to drop you a quick note and a big, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a lovely review. San Clemente is such a lovely area, and it is wonderful to hear that you were able to enjoy the many sights and wonders during your stay. We are all big fans of Legoland over here, and the zoo is always a great place to take the family. We hope that our tasty breakfast gave you some good fuel for the day! Please feel free to come back whenever you like, and we will be waiting to welcome you Home.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The hotel looks nicer on the website but it actually was a bit outdated facility. Though, the hotel tried the best possible maintenance on top of the old facility. BF area is good and the hotel service is extremely nice and professional manner.
Manager Response: Dear Jang S,  Good afternoon, and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review of your stay! Our team works hard to make sure that all of our guests have a comfortable and happy stay while they are with us, and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time. San Clemente is a more historical area, but there are so many fun things to do in the area, and our central location makes this the place to be. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast area, and our team is looking forward to welcoming you back Home soon!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Had some a/c problems but was promptly reserved. Service was great and accommodating. They tried to fix the a/c, when it didn’t work, front desk gave us another room.  Breakfast selection was decent and bed was ok.
Manager Response: Dear Dara K,  Good afternoon! I would like to take a minute to thank you for leaving us a review of our property. We always appreciate the time and effort that it takes for our guests to give us feedback. Our entire team is so happy to hear that you enjoyed our world-class customer service, and we do hope that you felt at home while you were with us. I am so very sorry to hear about the troubles with the ac unit it in the room, but I am glad that we were able to help rectify the situation. Our tasty breakfast is always a great way to start the day, and we hope that you were able to enjoy all that San Clemente has to offer while you were here. If you are ever back in the area, please feel free to give us another try... We would love to welcome you back home.  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I enjoyed my stay and would come back. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. The staff was real friendly and helpful. The hotel was real clean and the bed was very comfortable. We had a nice ocean view room. Also parking was free.
Manager Response: Dear Sbudlong,  Good afternoon! We would like to reach out to you to say a big, "Thank you!" for leaving us such a wonderful review. Here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente, our goal is to help each guest feel at home when they are with us, and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay! The views of the ocean are magnificent, aren't they? The sunsets are my personal favorite as well! We hope to see you back whenever you are in the area; We would love to welcome you home!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Beautiful suite.Quiet.Very well equipped.Clean.Great breakfast choices.The sausage and eggs were delicious. Enjoyed my stay.Thanks to Dee Heintze and Janice H Heintze for a very well planned out wedding event.
Manager Response: Dear ilsanders0345,  Good morning! Our team here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente would like to take a minute to personally thank you for leaving us such a lovely review. We are so glad that you had a memorable time with us, and it sounds like each amenity was enjoyed to the fullest! We do hope that if you are ever back in the area, you will stop on by... We would love to welcome you home!  Take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Excellent service of the entire personnel. Quiet rooms in spite of being old facility facing the freeway Good breakfast service Outstanding management One minus: only one elevator, making the service slow
Manager Response: Dear Esandru,  Good morning and thank you for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review! We were so happy to be a part of your anniversary; our team was truly overjoyed to help bring joy and cheer to such a special and memorable occasion! Thank you for your kind words, they mean so very much to each person who helps to make our property a home away from home. We hope that we will be able to welcome you back soon, and also wish all the best for your anniversaries to come!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: A great hotel to visit the beaches in the area
Summary: We stayed here for two nights. We got upgraded to a suite in a newly renovated room.  The front desk staff was very Knowledgeable. They helped us with directions to sights in the area and interesting places to visit.  As many people have said its overlooking the highway. We were on the third floor and the breakfast room was down one floor. The have a pretty standard Hampton breakfast. The room is clean and pretty well maintained by the staff. The only glitch was the fire alarm went off and the elevator was down for a few hours. The fire alarm is ear splitting. This is a great location if you are sightseeing along the Orange County' coast.
Manager Response: Dear Mazuza2,  Good morning! We wanted to take a minute to thank you for leaving us such a wonderful review. We truly value the words of our guests, and we hope that you know how grateful we are to be of service to you. We hope that you were able to enjoy the beauty and sights of San Clemente- there is so much to see and do in and around the town! We are also glad to hear that you enjoyed our clean, spacious suites and tasty hot breakfast buffet. I do apologize very much for the fire alarms, but I'm so glad that we were able to get everything back to peaceful order in an efficient manner. We do hope that you will come back and visit us again when you are back in the area- We would love to welcome you home!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: My mom and I stayed in a suite for a nearby wedding. Staff was great, but the room, hallways, and breakfast room are quite worn down. Dingy carpet and furnishings, broken coffee maker, etc. The hotel was very crowded that weekend with children, which made the breakfast room quite messy and no one seemed to be cleaning up. Lots of noise in the hallways from children running around late at night; when I called front desk to get help, no one answered. Expected more from a Hilton property in such a nice area.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda M,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to review our property. We welcome all guest feedback, whether positive or not, as that allows us to see where our areas of opportunity are, to grow for our guests. I am truly sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your stay, and apologize for the noise that you experienced over the weekend. We are a family-friendly property, and as such, our property can become a bit more lively during times of leisure stay. We do hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area, as we would love another opportunity to Wow you. If you would like to discuss your stay further, please feel free to reach out to me at cherieb@dknhotels.com.  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: On the bright side, the people that work this hotel are very kind and accommodating. The original room I checked into faced the freeway, which are the rooms that also have the ocean view. Unfortunately, the hotel construction is such that the noise levels at the bed are between 85-95 decibels - which is like a blow dryer operating next to you while you try to sleep. They were kind enough to move me to a room on the other side of the hotel, however, both rooms also were fairly poor in quality. Specifically, the rooms smelled like old socks and the a/c units sounded like a truck turning on an off in the night. Generally speaking, the accommodations felt worn, tired and painted over many times. If your baseline of hotel quality is informed by
Manager Response: Crimsonkid,  Good morning, and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review of our property. We do welcome and appreciate all guest feedback, positive or otherwise, as that allows us to grow and become a better hotel for our guests. I am so glad to hear that our stellar team was able to make you feel welcome and at home while you were here, but I am so very sorry to hear that noise and accommodation challenges were faced. We do work hard to make sure that each one of our guests is comfortable and happy, and I am so sorry that this was not the case. If you would like to discuss your stay further, please feel free to reach out to me at cherieb@dknhotels.com. If you are ever back in the area I do hope that you will give us another try... We would love a second chance to welcome you home.  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: We were able to check in early.  The staff was friendly and very accommodating. We had an issue with our air conditioning but the staff came promptly and fixed it.  All personal went beyond the norm to be friendly and helpful.  We appreciate their great service.
Manager Response: Barbara T,  Good afternoon! I would like to take a minute to thank you for leaving us such a kind review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your time here at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente. I'm happy to hear that we were able to take care of your air conditioning promptly and efficiently...We certainly want to make sure that everyone is comfortable while they are here with us. Please feel free to come back by whenever you are in the area; We would love to welcome you home!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for just one night.  My rate was $131.42 for the night.  I was assigned room 318, a suite.   This Hampton Inn and Suites is on the smaller size.  It only has 70 rooms and three floors.  The entrance / lobby is slightly strange.  You enter the hotel from the parking garage on the ground level and the lobby is right there.  The complimentary breakfast is on the 1st floor.  It is always a perfect start to the day.  My suite was large, clean, super comfortable, and spacious.  I had a nice view of the golf course.  The front desk staff were all friendly, welcoming, and personable.    The hotel sits directly on Interstate 5, but the freeway noise was not bothersome.  I used this hotel as a base for San Juan Capistrano and Dana Point.  It was very close to both.
Manager Response: Thank you UFCKnightsFan for taking the time to write this lovely review for our Hampton Inn. We are happy that you choose our hotel to stay at while you were in San Clemente as a base. We are very close to San Juan Capistrano and Dana Point, so I am happy to hear that you did not have to travel far. It was great having you hear and we would love to have you stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Just over night, going fishing early the next morning
Summary: Need a hotel just for the night, we're going fishing early the next morning. The drive e from home would have caused us to have to get up extremely early and with a very long drive. We really enjoyed the suite.
Manager Response: Good Evening Keith D,  Thank you for staying with us at our hotel and for taking the time to share your review. After a long drive we are glad to hear that you were able to relax and get ready for your fishing trip. We hope that you had an amazing time fishing and we sure do look forward to welcoming you back to San Clemente soon!   Amy Gonzalez Assistant General Manager

Summary: We were in town for a family wedding at the San Clemente Golf Course next door.  Great location.  We loved our room.  Breakfast was good and the staff was superb!  We would definitely stay again and recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear Pagni5,  Good morning! Our team is overjoyed to hear that you loved your stay with us! What a wonderful weekend for a wedding, it's been such a beautiful time of year. Thank you so much for your kind and gracious words, they truly warm our hearts... Please feel free to come back by  atany time, and we will be more than happy to welcome you back home!  All our best!

Summary: Overall the property was very good however the free breakfast was not up to what you would expect from a hilton family property.  The hotel is very easy to get to from the highway and really close to camp pendleton.
Manager Response: John T,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we will certainly look into what we can do to make breakfast time that much better for our guests... Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, after all! We are just a hop, skip, and a jump away from Camp Pendleton, and we would love to welcome you back the next time you are in the area. Take care, and have a wonderful week!

Summary Heading: Nice place but avoid freeway side...
Summary: The first night we were assigned a handicap-accessible room (no separate room in suite) which was not desirable since we were traveling with our son.  We were able to change room the next day and took a suite with a partial view of the ocean.  Unfortunately, those rooms face the freeway.  Lots of noise during the night.  The rooms facing the pool are much quieter.  Nice breakfast room and fitness room.
Manager Response: Grazia_2125,  Good morning, and thank you for taking a minute to review our property! We are very happy that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and updated workout facility while you were here; Getting a good run in is just the thing to start the morning! We do apologize about the noise that you experienced during your stay, and yes, the golf course rooms are just as lovely as the ocean view rooms. Nothing beats that view of the sunset though! We do hope that you will come back and visit the next time that you are in the area, as our team would be thrilled to welcome you back home. Take care and have a wonderful rest of your week!

Summary Heading: The staff and the fountain make it a great place to stay
Summary: Our 90 yr old Aunt that lives in San Clemente and needed some work done to her home. Not knowing a lot about the area since we are from Ohio we thought we would try the Hampton , The Hampton Inn was down the street from her home and we were staying for 2 weeks to be with her.  We loved the fountain right outside our door. We spent a lot of time in their court yard.  Each morning was a pleasure going to breakfast to see Angel that worked in the breakfast room. She was so very delightful.   You can also bring your dog to stay with you. The only thing to make it better is a little more sound proofing.
Manager Response: ChrisandJohn we are glad to so glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us while getting some work done on your aunts home. We hope that if your ever back in the area you will come back and stay with us again.

Summary Heading: I wish there was a 4.5 to leave cause I would
