Summary: Quaint beachy feel California hotel that just happened to be a Hampton. Right off the I-5. Parking was ample but a little tricky. Lobby in basement. Rooms and common areas 1st floor and up. I was given an ocean view suite (thank you) walked in to the bedroom which seemed odd at first that the living room was the other room facing the ocean but realized it had to do with the possible road noise. Even had a door you could close if it got too much. I didn’t hear a thing. As matter of fact there was a 4.0 magnitude quake at 4am and I slept right thru it ! Room had a Nice little seating area and desk area. Tv. The 2 main rooms divided by the vanity area and the bathroom ( toilet and shower ). I enjoyed the room a lot. The ocean view was most beautiful at sunset. It was across the
Manager Response: Thank you Patrick C for taking the time to share this review with us. We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay with us! I too slept through the earthquake. We hope to see you again soon. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Staff fantastic...room ok...clean. I believe the rooms have been updated, but, weird setup in main room. The sink was way too high...TV horrible..smell in room.  Not sure if I would stay there again... pricey for what was offered. Average...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We do thank you for your feedback and we are glad that you chose our hotel for your most recent visit to San Clemente. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us and helps us to improve with each and every stay. Thank you again!

Summary: An odd location for a Hampton Inn, with a very small footprint.  If you don't tolerate freeway noise, make sure you get an even-numbered room. The rooms with an "Ocean View" are practically smack dab on the I-5.  Front desk staff charming as always.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review on our hotel. We hope that you had a wonderful stay with us. While we do have those beautiful rooms on the golf course side which over looks the pool and we do have rooms on the ocean side as well. While there is a little noise from the highway it does offer a beautiful view of the ocean. Once again thank you TravellinDavid and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great hotel.  Not close to the beach, but a very reasonably priced and family friendly hotel.  Far enough from the freeway to get a good night sleep, and located between San Diego and LA, so this is a great location if looking at colleges.
Manager Response: Hello again CharlescS9447NC we are so happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. I'm glad to hear that you chose our location to stay at while looking for colleges. San Clemente is a great middle area if you are looking for colleges in between the San Diego and LA area. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: We came in from Canada with a cancelled reservation , but Cherie at front desk was awesome! , still got our reservation for a few days , even changed us to a more quiter room facing golf course instead of ocean view. Clean , good options at breakfast , hot beverages in lobby all the time even cookies one night. Close to ocean, beach , short drive to pier and Diana Point.On the con side........elevator is old , smaller and very slow, we used the stairs mostly.
Manager Response: Hello 1234246 I am so glad to hear that Cherie was able to get a reservation for you after travelling over here and noticing the cancelled reservation. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and all of San Clemente. There are so many fun things to do here! Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Off the path but Great anyway
Summary: Maybe on the East side of the 5 Freeway from the water but still close to downtown San Clemente. Price and service very good and staff willing to make things right. As a Diamond member treated good . Wish some of the local restaurants in San Clemente were as good in service and value.
Manager Response: Hello there R1696YVtimothyg we are very appreciative for the time you have taken to post a review on our hotel and we are so glad to hear that you had a great stay with us. Thank you for being a Diamond member and we hope that you will stop by and see us again!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during Christmas time. Our stay was wonderfully comfortable in a spacious junior-suite which suited our family perfectly. It was clean, had a lovely view of the ocean, and had super comfy beds and pillows. The courtesy breakfast area was decorated for Christmas with lovely and hearty options for any family member. (Many festive options for coffee!) The staff were super friendly and kind, very accomodating. We loved our stay and plan to book this very hotel when in the area again!
Manager Response: Thank you donaldrP3405L for posting such a wonderful review on our hotel. We are so glad to hear that you had a memorable stay with us while you were here during Christmas time. We do love decorating for the holidays so I'm glad that you and your family enjoyed them. We would be thrilled to have you and your family to come back and stay with us again. Hope to see you soon!  Happy New Year!

Summary: We were impressed with the excelent staff. The complimentry breakfast is also good selling point. We were able to use the handicap parking areas which is also helpfull to us. The bathroom areas were just large enough to put your essentuals.
Manager Response: We are delighted haroldh101 to hear that you had a lovely visit with us at our hotel. Thank you for taking the time to share this wonderful review with us. We hope that you will stop by and visit us again soon.   Happy New Year!

Summary: You will feel like a part of the Hilton family this is one of the finest staffs my wife and I have ever encountered.  And while the hotel is old, it is in great repair and the beds and bedding are perfect.  The location is convenient for any San Clemente needs!
Manager Response: Thank you X561DKstevent for the amazing review on our hotel. I hope that you and your wife enjoyed your stay with us. Even for this short visit the both of you felt like family to us too! We hope that next time your in the area you will stop by and visit us again.   Have a Happy New Year!

Summary: The room and bathroom was very clean and the bed was very comfortable.  The Wi-Fi worked without any problems.  The staff was the best, always pleasant and accommodating!  The housekeeper working on my floor smiled and said good morning or hello every time I saw her.   The complimentary breakfast buffet was great both mornings that I was there; one day bacon and eggs, the next sausage with eggs cooked with ham and cheese everything hot and fresh including big fat waffles that you cook right there, oatmeal with all the trimmings, fresh fruit, toast, muffins, juice, coffee, milk, etc.  Overall, one of the best stays I ever experienced!
Manager Response: Thank you 189terrih for the wonderful review on our hotel. We are glad to hear that you had a lovely time at our hotel. Having a full breakfast is a extra bonus that we have here at the hotel. So I'm glad that you did get a chance to enjoy it. 189terrih we hope you keep us in mind next time your in San Clemente.   Happy Holidays!  Amy Gonzalez Guest Service Ambassador

Summary: We’ve stayed here many times and it’s always been excellent. We love the location and its proximity to San Clemente State Park/Beach. It’s a great value, especially when using Hilton Honors points. Will definitely stay here again next time we visit San Clemente.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at the Hampton Inn. We thank you for staying with us and we hope that you had a memorable stay with us. See you soon!  Happy Holidays from all of us at the Hampton Inn and Suites, San Clemente

Summary: We had a special request for the hotel to change down bedding off the bed because of our allergies, the front desk assured us that the request had been met. The next morning we realized the maid had missed the request and we were feeling quite ill. The staff was extremely apologetic and rectified the situation in an extremely satisfying way. We are very happy with the Hampton Inn!!
Manager Response: Hello BlueJade 51.. It was a pleasure to have the both of you stay with us. We are sorry for any mis communication that we may have had here at the hotel but we are glad that everything was all taken care of. We hope that there is another vacation coming in your near future so that you can come back and stay with us!  Happy Holidays!

Summary: This is a unique hotel, especially one so reasonably priced.  On one side you can see the ocean, and on the other a golf course.  San Clemente State Park, with a beautiful beach is minutes away.  Downtown San Clemente is just a short drive.  The property itself is well run and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you James O for the wonderful review on our hotel. It was a pleasure having you stay here with us and we are glad that you had a wonderful view of the ocean. Being close to the beach, the pier and the San Clemente State park really does put us in a wonderful location. Thanks again James O and we hope to see you again soon!  Happy Holidays!

Summary: It was conveniently located off the highway. The service was great. Everyone was helpful and friendly. They accommodated us very well as a family of six! I would definitely recommend this place while traveling with family.
Manager Response: Shelby C It's always a pleasure to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay along with their families. We hope that you were able to have some fun in San Clemente while you were here. As there is so many fun things to do. See you next time your back in town

Summary: Had a great stay at the Hampton Inn.  Very clean room with a great view of the ocean.  Internet was strong.  Pool was small but well kept.  Location was perfect.  Close to everything and the beach.  Staff was super friendly.
Manager Response: Walter D I really appreciate your great review on our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at our hotel and we do hope that you had the most wonderful time at the wedding you attended. We hope that you get another chance to come back to San Clemente and come visit us soon.  Happy Holidays!!

Summary: About a mile away from downtown and right across from the municipal golf course in San Clemente! Staff is friendly and very helpful, I used this hotel for my wedding and all the guests commented on how friendly and great the front desk was! Most rooms also have a balcony! The staff even checked in on me while I was getting ready for my wedding and ask if we needed anything, they even helped move my stuff from the room I was getting ready in to our honeymoon room! The only negative is that the walls are pretty thin so if your beds are near the hallway you can hear people in the halls but other than that the hotel was great!
Manager Response: Congratulations daniellebJ5033EF on your WEDDING!!! We are so happy that we were able to share your special day with you! You looked beautiful on your wedding day and we wish you and your hubby the best!!

Summary: Stayed here for two nights and it was a great place to stay!  Staff was all very friendly, especially Herman, who checked us in and got us into a really nice room on the third floor facing the golf course in back.  Breakfast was nice - standard Hampton fare.  Nice, large room with a full-sized couch.  I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Ptc897 It is always a pleasure to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay. Thank you for all of your kind words and I'll be sure to let Herman know that he  made your stay even more special. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: My husband travels quite a bit for business and we used our points to stay at this lovely hotel for my birthday.  The staff was beyond sweet!  They had a bottle of wine in our room to celebrate my birthday and had written a birthday message to me on the chalkboard the next morning after checking in.  Our room had a wonderful view of the ocean.  The only drawback was the noise of traffic in the morning, but otherwise, this hotel was charming beyond measure.  Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you Cyndee B for spending your birthday with us! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope that you were able to get our a little and explore San Clemente. Next time you stay with us we will get you a room on the other side of the hotel which has the lovely view of the golf course. Once again thank you Cyndee B for your amazing review and we hope that you will come and stay with us for your next birthday!

Summary: This is one of the beat hotels my family has had the pleasure of staying at! The room was comfortable, the view could have been better but with our room having a bed room and a living area it was amazing! The employees were all super friendly!!!
Manager Response: Hello Sierra B,  Thank you for providing a fabulous review on our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had a wonderful time at our hotel. We hope that you will come and stay with us again soon!

Summary: This is a terrific hotel for location, staff and size of rooms. It is an older hotel, but very well kept up and has been updated. There is a lobby area at garage level, checking in is super easy, park, check in, go to your room. On line check in the night before, with room choice options is a nice touch too. The hotel was fully booked the entire time during our stay. We had virtually no issues with anything, our room was kept very clean, the free breakfast was decent, make your own waffles, coffee choices, breakfast cereal, etc.  The large amount of people in this breakfast room was constant, I was impressed how clean and stocked it remained. Our room was large with a sitting area, 2 televisions, nice bathroom, Neutrogena products. There is a laundry on site, gym and a smallish
Manager Response: Thank you ilovenewport36 for such a wonderful review on our hotel. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and staff. Please keep us in mind if and when you come back to San Clemente.

Summary: My first time staying at a Hampton Inn, and this one was very clean and the room was spacious.  Friendly staff and convenient location. There is a sitting room when you first walk in, and then the bedroom also has a door.  Both areas have a TV in it. Complimentary breakfast was also nice.  Free but limited parking.  I did not have to use it, but they also have a variety of complimentary toiletries available in the lobby in case you forgot something.
Manager Response: Thank you Ionic161 for the wonderful review!! We are thrilled you had a great stay with us at the Hampton Inn and Suites. We greatly appreciate all your wonderful feedback and we hope to see you again soon.   Happy Holidays!

Summary: Awesome Experience... Very clean room, very spacious, great breakfast that came with the package. Very Friendly Service E-Z Parking Sport.Bars down the street and walking distance to the Wedding @ the Country Club As Arnold would say....  We'll will be back
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you had such an awesome experience with our hotel for your most recent stay in San Clemente. I love that your wedding party  was able to just walk down to the wedding venue it makes it so much easier and we do hope that you will be back. Thanks ricofisher25!!!

Summary Heading: Good hotel with easy access to the freeway
Summary: We spent one night at the Hampton and were very pleased.  The rooms were nicely furnished and the beds comfortable.  The check in process was easy and the staff pleasant.  My husband was a bit disappointed with the complimentary breakfast. However, that would not prevent us from returning again. The San Clemente Municipal Golf Course is right next door, so a real plus for anyone wanting to play golf.
Manager Response: Thanks Justine L for the great review on our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. Hope you will come back soon and get a chance to come and play some golf. Have a wonderful afternoon..

Summary: Everything from check in to check out was very easy. Staff was pleasant and strived to make our stay a welcoming experience. The beds and furniture were comfortable. My wife who has a hard time sleeping anywhere else other than our bed was able to get a full nights rest. The four day stay was the best stay outside of a five star hotel we've ever had.
Manager Response: Hey there christinacP3514NT we are so glad to hear that you were able to get a good nights rest while you were here. I know that sometimes we get so used to sleeping in our beds that it is difficult to get some rest while you are staying at other places. So I am very happy that you had that wonderful experience with our beds. They are very comfortable.  christinacP3514NT we loved having you here and we hope that you come back and visit us soon!

Summary Heading: very polite staff and very clean hotel.
Summary: I enjoyed my stay and will consider staying here again. the rooms were cleaned. it was a quiet place.  and in the morning enjoyed breakfast.the hotel being close to the beach made it easy to drive. overall I had a good experience. thank you
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites while you were in beautiful San Clemente. We hope that you had a great time at the beach. See you next time!

Summary: Very friendly staff and rooms are very clean and comfortable. The location is in a great area and if you forget personal products they have those available.  They also have complimentary breakfast which is nice.
Manager Response: We thank you for the wonderful review on our hotel! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our nice hot complimentary breakfast and yes and if you have forgotten a toothbrush, toothpaste, razor or maybe even shaving cream we do have them available for you complimentary at the Front Desk. Once again thank you and hope to see you next time!

Summary: Stayed for 6 nights while visiting friends in Southern LA.  Nice view of the beach and great breakfast. Room was spacious and clean.  Located right near the freeway so easy to get around and travel to other parts of LA. Also nice to have a 7/11 nearby.  Wouldn't mind staying here again when I'm in LA.   It isn't full stars because the pool is pretty small and wifi in my room was very unstable.
Manager Response: Hello from San Clemente! Thank you for your most recent stay at our hotel and comments regarding your visit. We are happy to hear that you had a great time while visiting friends in LA and we hope that you had a fun time exploring San Clemente. There are so many fun things to do! See you next time.

Summary: Very impressed with the size of the room for the price. Rooms were very clean and a nice view of the ocean. Layout of the rooms perfect. Bed were very comfortable. Hotel room was very quiet. Great  place to stay for the price. Would stay here again. Would recommend staying here in the future.
Manager Response: It is greatly appreciated for posting a review from your most recent stay at our hotel. We have many families that come to visit San Clemente to take a mini vacation or to visit family, so I am glad to hear that you did enjoy our spacious suites and our nice comfortable beds. Hope to see again soon!

Summary: Really nice place to stay, staff is fantastic.  Close to the beach and good eats.  Very close to freeways, close to Hwy 1 PCH and some very nice hiking trails.  I would recommend if your visiting San Clemente area.
Manager Response: danrW4585NY Thank you for your 5 star review!! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you found many fun things to do in San Clemente. Next time you should come and check out the San Clemente Outlets and also the Market Place is nice to walk around at. Once again thank you danrW4585NY

Summary: This is the way all hotels should be! Everything was spectacular from the lobby to the comfy beds! The service from the manager to the maids! Friendly staff like Amy! My kids remembered her kindness from our trip at Christmas time last year and couldn't wait to see her again! She was there! No turn over in staff so it must be a happy place to work! It certainly was a happy place to stay! We will be back for a third stay!
Manager Response: Stevens875 we are so glad to hear that you had another Fabulous stay at our hotel. Thank you for all of your wonderful comments and I do hope that we get to catch up next time. See you soon!

Summary: I've never done this before... base a review almost solely on one of the staff members but I cannot say enough good things about Nick. He was there when we arrived at the hotel on Friday the 15th, which happened to be my 50th birthday. He was extremely helpful in getting us situated.  We arrived fairly early as our flight got in from Seattle around 9am so even though we had already checked in via the Hilton Hhonors website, the previous guest was still occupying the room. So Nick held our bags in the back and gave us a snack of some chips and bottles of water. He gave us the number to Enterprise which was located a few miles down the road and we were able to call them and they came and picked us up and took us to the car rental place. While we waited for them, Nick made sure
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you iloveseaotters for your amazing review!! We are very happy to hear that Nick made your stay amazing. He is definitely a great asset to our hotel and we love having him here. We hope that you had a wonderful birthday and I will make sure Nick is here next time you stay with us. See you both soon!

Summary: We stayed on the Labor day holiday weekend. There were 5 of us so the suites were the perfect size. I was very impressed by the breakfast buffet served from 6-10 am. It was extensive compared to other free hotel breakfasts I've had. Other reviewers have listed the food items so I won't. It was very crowded from 8-9. Next time we'll go earlier!
Manager Response: It is greatly appreciated for your posting a review on our hotel. Labor Day Weekend is a great time to get away and enjoy the beach and with us! Hope everyone had a great time and enjoyed our nice hot complimentary breakfast. Thanks again 1Kmi1step

Summary: Staff was fine, air conditioners didn't work in the breakfast room and lobby during a heatwave in California. Air Conditioner was very loud in my room and the mattress kept sliding away from the box springs. bathtub handle broke so I couldn't turn off the water after taking a shower. No access to the lobby by stairs without walking quite a distance from the other side of the building to an underground garage to get to the lobby.  Old hotel not up to the standards of the Hilton Hotels Breakfast was good but the room was hot.
Manager Response: Mr. Fred we sincerely apologize for the experience that you had during your stay. I will definitely take a look into seeing what the issue was with the air conditioner in the room you stayed in and make sure we get that taken care of right away. Once again thank you for all of your feedback and we do look forward to having you stay with us again if your ever back in San Clemente.

Summary: Excellent place to stay. The suite concept of having a separate "sitting area" really worked well. Not much of an ocean view as advertised, but that was okay. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Complimentary breakfast was excellent.
Manager Response: We thank for the excellent review on our hotel. We hope that you had a memorable experience with us and glad to hear that our staff was friendly and helpful. See you again soon!

Summary: Good place to be!! Food was great our room was nice and clean we got the double queen suite deluxe and was perfect for my family ..staff was friendly (: overall I would definitely stay again the location was amazing right by the freeway!
Manager Response: Thank you Morales90 for the wonderful review on our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay and that it was a perfect fit for your family. We hope to see you on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Hampton Inn. Location was on Hwy. If we had the balcony door open or sat outside it would be noisy.  Once inside and air conditioning on, we didn't hear anything. The breakfast was plentiful to choose from. The ladies helping at breakfast were very accommodating, and tried their best to clean tables and refill-low items.   They were friendly and  willing to help in any way they could. We had 1 unfortunate event upon arrival, we are HILTON  Reward members and upon receiving an email for key app to pick our room and bypass check in, we looked at room they picked for us, and was pleased they picked high floor as per our  room profile. So I did not change what they picked.  We arrived and was given the 2nd floor, right below the floor we were to be on. The
Manager Response: Thank you u Barbara H for spending your birthday with us. I'm sorry that we were not able to get you on that 3rd floor, but we do hope that you did enjoy your stay with us. Hope to see you on your next birthday!

Summary: Upon arriving at this hotel there is a doormat that says they are happy if they make their guests happy. Well after spending 3 days there I can say that they do just as they say! I felt that Amy at the front desk was kind and efficient, Our room had an ocean view and was a roomy suite at a good price. Even though the property is adjacent to the highway you don't even realize it because of the thick windows and ocean views. Most importantly Nick the manager went above and beyond to make our stay a great one! He simply accommodated our every need and helped from breakfast to tourist attractions, Thank you nick!
Manager Response: Thank you Tanya T for leaving such a wonderful review on our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed everything about your stay. I will definitely pass this review on to Nick. I'm sure he would love to know that he made your stay a great one. See you soon!

Summary: My son is autistic and he likes to look outside and see how the weather is. He walked outside on three occasions and this Caused a red flag for the staff who  was not been happy with him enjoying  looking outside and then coming in
Manager Response: Thank you Scott E for staying with us at our hotel while visiting San Clemente. We would like to apologize for your negative experience you had at our hotel. It was truly not our intention to make your son feel that way. Our guests safety is our main concern. I know that Annette our General Manager has reached out to you but if there is anything that I can do for you please contact me directly.   Sincerely,  Amy Gonzalez Guest Service Ambassador

Summary: The staff is great! Hotel has a lot going for it in good location. Accommodations are more than norm. Stayed 62 days+- due to flooded house. Only challenge is parking underground. Can't just pull into a space...you have to jockey into it and spaces underground can go quickly. Although the area is a relatively safe area of San Clemente.
Manager Response: richardsG3125KB It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. It's always nice to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay. Thank you for the wine and we hope that you stop by and see us soon.

Summary: This hotel was excellent! We had a room with two twin beds in one part for my wife and daughters, and another room with a foldout couch for my mom.  The kids loved the pool and hot tub. I enjoyed using the weight room, my daughter's stuffed frog liked it so much he spent a whole day exercising. The front desk was super-helpful and friendly, and they always had fresh coffee and tea, and occasionally cookies! The breakfast was the best I have ever had, including hot featured items, waffles, and all the other things you would expect.
Manager Response: Thank you JasonDenver for the 5 star review on our hotel. We are glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed their stay. (Especially Mr. Frog) We hope to see you all again in the future.

Summary: Perfect for a wedding we were in and attending across the fwy. Complimentary breakfast of waffles, bagels, pastries, cereal, eggs, sausage was good. Used their jacuzzi and pool. Pool is heated, was too cool for me but for sure better than cold. Jacuzzi had too much cholorine we couldn't keep our eyes open but was glad it was sanitary lol
Manager Response: Thank you BZRN21 for reviewing our hotel. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay at our hotel and we hope that you had a wonderful time at the wedding. Hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: I hope this is not the typical experience for a visit but must say I was more than disappointed in my stay.  Hot water heater was broken and had to take a cold shower before the wedding. The next day the hot water was so hot that you burned yourself.   Engineering was not on the ball for this repair.  Breakfast area ran out of items.  Definitely, I would look for other accommodations if in the area.
Manager Response: First of all thank you Wallobey for your recent stay and review on our property. We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy your overall experience with us. We would love for you to give us a 2nd chance and stay with us again.

Summary: This hotel was very well located, was very clean, the staff were extremely friendly and the food was very good for breakfast.  The staff went out of their way to make us feel welcomed and accommodated.
Manager Response: Thank you Sue C for taking the time to review our property. We here at the Hampton Inn and Suites are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary: This hotel is good, clean and quite. We even stayed next to the freeway and did not have a problem with noise. There is no musty smell and it is updated. It has large rooms which was really great for a family of 5, we all had plenty of space. Breakfast was great, lots of food but the pool is very small. I have stayed in some amazing places and can't stand gross hotels but I was completely happy here.
Manager Response: Hello from San Clemente! Thank you for your most recent stay and review on our property. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay and enjoyed our nice complimentary hot breakfast. We do hope that you will stay with us again in the future.

Summary: First, I want to say the service from the staff here is excellent. The breakfast buffet is very good and has a large variety. You can make your own waffles and all the fruits are fresh. My low rating is due to the building's dire need of maintenance and update. HILTON, please renovate this property. At more than $200/night, you are really only paying for the proximity to the ocean and not much else. It looks and smells like it hasn't been upgraded since the 1950's even though it was built in 1990. Althought, it was renovated in 2004, that is still 13 years of accumulated gunk, dirt, mold and smell. Just walk in the hallways on the 3rd floor and you'll know what I mean. This location was rated number 1 of San Clemente hotels on Trip Advisor, I don't even want to know what number
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on our hotel. We are happy to hear that you had an excellent experience with our staff and enjoyed our nice hot complimentary breakfast. Your feedback is very important to us as this continually helps us improve our facilities. Once again thank you 2klo for all of your feedback and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for our wedding along with 30 guests. Nike and the staff were very accommodating with all our requests. I would stay here again. It's close to the beach and bars and the venue is around the corner.
Manager Response: Thank you Vivian L for staying with us during one of your most important days. We hope that you had a wonderful wedding and that I'm glad to hear that Nick was helpful with any requests that you had. Hope to see you on your 1st wedding anniversary and CONGRATULATIONS!!

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for wedding held at golf course
Summary: We went in the pool after checking in and then got ready for a wedding being held up the street at Wedgewood. We were able to walk no problem. Very convenient and staff was super friendly.  Elevators were slow and hallways a little dated, but rooms were fine.
Manager Response: Thank you 798amandav for staying with us for the wedding you attended at Wedgewood. I love that the wedding venue is so close to our hotel. It really does make it convenient for all of our guests. Once again thank you for the review and we will see you next time!

Summary: This hotel had some pleasant rooms but no dining room other than a breakfast facility and the waffles were brilliant.  There is a highway to the front of the building which is noisey and a golf course at the back.  The view over the course is ok.  The pool is small as is the pool area.  The pool was not heated and the sun goes down behind the hotel building so the water gets colder.  The staff are quite helpful and the beds were quite comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you chose our hotel for your stay in San Clemente. While I wish that you had a better experience in regards to the noise, we do hope that you did enjoy your overall stay with us. Many thanks for all of your feedback and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Loved the size of the room, the rest was just ok
Summary: We stayed for one night because we were traveling from San Diego to Disneyland and wanted to see some sights along the way.  The hotel is located right off of I-5.  Registration is accessed by entering a small parking garage, which is mostly spaces for Elite status guests or handicapped spots.  We checked in with the friendly, if a little odd, staff and went up to our room.  We booked a one bedroom two queen suite and were pleased to see that one bedroom actually meant a separate bedroom at this hotel.  The room was spacious for our family of four.  First we walked into the living area with a couch, armchair, coffee table, end table, closet, tv and mini fridge.  Then you entered the bathroom area with the sink in the "hallway" and then the toilet and tub were in a small,
Manager Response: Dear JLD1368,  Good morning! My name is Cherie Brower, new General Manager of the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente. I am going through past reviews of our property on here, and I noticed that you were not responded to. I would like to take a minute to thank you for your review of our property! Our team greatly thrives on the feedback of our guests, and we genuinely work to make each stay even better. Since your stay with us, we have been making some fantastic strides on improving our facility, and we do hope that if you are ever back in the area, you will give us another try! Again, we do thank you for your feedback, and I hope that you have a wonderful upcoming weekend!   Warmest of regards,   Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I love this hotel! We stay here every time we come to San Clemente! It is very clean and the staff is very helpful and welcoming. It is so close to the beach and to all our favorite shops and restaurants! :)
Manager Response: Thank you Shauna B for taking the time to post a review regarding your recent stay with us. We hope that you can come back and visit us soon.

Summary: Stayed here a few days in a suite on the 3rd floor overlooking the golf course.  Great stay.  Room was large with a "living room" with pull out couch portion separated by a door, 2 full size beds.  For us, the beds were a bit too soft, but still comfortable nonetheless.  We were immediately greeted by "Herman" upon check-in, who was a delight.  Herman ensured we got a requested room and briefed on the hotel's amenities.  We love the fact that this hotel is located on El Camino Real, which is convenient to travel in/around San Clemente and on/off the I-5.  Wi-Fi was fine.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you ELS20 so much for the wonderful review on our hotel! We are happy you enjoyed everything about your stay and that Herman provided you with exceptional customer service. We will be sure to share your review with him and the entire staff. Thank you again and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The suite was a great option for our family of five. The living room area was large and accomodated  our family nicely!  We found the room large, clean, fresh and located close to our vacation plans.  We travelled to San Diego, Disneyland and Catalina Island and found this to be a perfect central location.
Manager Response: Thank you Barbara S for your 5 star review! We are thrilled you choose our property to stay at while in San Clemente for your wonderful vacation. I hope that everyone had a great time at Disneyland and Catalina Island. We hope that you can back and visit us soon!

Summary: We just stayed here last night and really enjoyed the staff, especially Herman! Everyone was over the top and they were so accommodating. The hotel is located in a excellent location close to the ocean. We had an ocean view room and would definitely be back thanks to the staff love the price!
Manager Response: Thank you Greg B for the wonderful review! We are thrilled you had a great stay with us at the Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente. We greatly appreciate all of your wonderful feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Nice, clean hotel with a very friendly and efficient staff.  Complimentary breakfast was very good.  The hotel needs a remodel but that did not negatively affect our stay.  Will definitely stay there again when we visit relatives in CA.
Manager Response: Thank you I747PTjeffreys for reviewing our property. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope that you had a great time with your family. We hope to see you next time your in San Clemente!

Summary: staff was excellent.  great place for family.  very close to beach. convienient to have breakfast at hotel and head off to the beach.  The only thing that could have been better would be a shuttle to the beach
Manager Response: Thank you Jeannette F for taking the time to review our property. We here at the Hampton Inn and Suites appreciate that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Location good for launching your visit; not good for hotel stay
Summary: We stayed here for 3 day visit. Suite style rooms are very nice size. We were given golf course view, request that upon checking in else you are viewing the highway. Our room #314 had a smell (cigarette we think). The beds were very comfortable. Rooms are full of amenities. Hotel staff was pleasant. This is a nice place to stay in San Clemente, it just is just shoe horned in by a highway.
Manager Response: David M We appreciate you visit to our hotel and the review. We hope that you had a great time while you were here and we hope that you come back and visit us soon.

Summary: We've stayed here every few years to visit family nearby while on vacation. Room was big enough for 4 of us. Pull out couch mattress could be a little thicker. Great location, 5 minutes from beach and downtown shopping. Quiet, but close to I-5 traffic. Delicious hot, complimentary breakfast with lots of variety. Staff went out of its way to help in every manner. Relaxing hot tub and great workout area. 3-4 stars.
Manager Response: stevewN412OUT Thank you for the wonderful review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope that we will choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: This hotel is right off I-5 freeway which makes the locale very noisy. The area is a bit scary, I wouldn't venture out at night for a walk. The dive bars down the street are not what I expexted to see. No nice restaurants within walking distance and the ammenities of this hotel are subpar. The room itself was oky for 1-2 nights max, and the best part of my room was the larger split bathroom with the shower and toilet in the bathroom and the sink and or vanity outside. I didn't experience the pool but I saw it out my window and ir was okay. But the complementary breakfast was poor because there was not enough workers to cook all the hot foods, plus the self serve waffle area was a mess. Who wants to cook your own meal when on holiday? The bed was worn and the comforter the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you Lcchocolate for taking the time out to review our property. I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your overall experience with us. If there is anything that I can do for you please let me know and if your ever back in San Clemente again we do hope that you will decide to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: So nice! I would definitely go back!
Summary: We came over after wasting two nights at the Quality Inn in Capistrano. That hotel was terrible! This hotel was a HUGE upgrade, even though the price was no more expensive. The front desk clerk Nick was extremely accommodating. Knowing that we left a hotel we hated to come here, he made sure that we were well taken care of. We had a very nice room. It was clean and pretty with room for our son to come and stay with us a couple of nights. The coffee is good. There is a small refrigerator and a microwave. There is a hot breakfast every morning that stays stocked until closing time. There is always fruit, coffee, tea, hot chocolate in the lobby. The staff was very quick to respond to any requests we made and did everything possible to make our stay comfortable and pleasant. I
Manager Response: Thank you Linda S for the wonderful review on our hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us after having a not so good one with the Quality Inn. I will share your review with Nick and and entire staff. I'm sure he would to know that you had a great time while you were here. Once again thank you Linda S and we we hope to see you next time your back in San Clemente.

Summary: Great customer service!! Used for Our wedding, thought the bridal suite would have had champagne but nothing I couldn't provide!! Super nice staff and very helpful all day! Definitely recommend!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you J3626HDtaylorw for the 5 star review on our hotel. We are thrilled that you chose our property to stay at for your wedding. We hope that everyone had a great time at the wedding and Congratulations to you both!!! Hope to see you for your 1 year Anniversary.

Summary: This hotel was very close to the wedding venue and turned out to be a comfortable and convenient location.  The staff was helpful in helping out with our wishes and needs.  I enjoyed being able to e-select my hotel room ahead of time.
Manager Response: Hello there X2229IHkarenr! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel while you were here for the wedding and that our staff was able to help you with anything that you needed during your stay. We do hope that everyone had a wonderful time at the wedding and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Booked a room for Mothers Day and took my 85 year old mother instead of buying her something she would never use.  She can't walk very much so I thought that a nice room and lots of lovely places to drive and look at would be a nice time.  The room was spotless and so very nice and comfortable.  We got there a little early so the room I requested which was a front balcony, high floor was not available.  So we settled on a first floor balcony room which was kind of a waste because of the road noise.  If there is a next time I will ask for a room facing the back where there is a golf course and quieter.  The breakfast was very nicely done and again spotless, constantly bringing anything that was running low out to make sure there was plenty for guests, constantly wiping up the
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Sherri B,   We are so glad to hear that you had a great time at our hotel for you and your mom for Mother's Day weekend. That was really sweet of you! There are so many fun things to do in San Clemente. We hope that she had a great time!  Hope to see you again soon!  Amy

Summary Heading: Exceeded expectations on two fronts - a delightful surprise
Summary: We spent a night in town to attend the memorial for a friend, and chose this hotel for its proximity to the event and for its reasonable room rates. We expected (hoped for) modest accommodations but got a very nice room and a robust breakfast bar, all attended by very friendly staff.  Then the surprise: After checking out I realized I had left a prized belt in the closet. I called that evening, expecting to hear that nothing was found (leave behind typically disappear in my past experience). The next day I got a call that my belt was found and they would return it. The young lady even called twice because they had gotten our home address wrong, to ensure it got delivered. Two days later it did, by Priority Mail no less. Nice people, nice hotel, reasonable rates, and integrity.
Manager Response: Thank you cfoforrent for staying with us at our hotel for the memorial service for your friend. We wish that you could have stayed with us under better circumstances. We were very happy to hear that you have received your belt. I know it took a little bit longer than expected to get it back, but we are definitely happy to hear that you finally received it. Thank you for the great review and we do hope to see you both again.

Summary: Love this place, the suites have 2 big rooms, great for a family. There's a fridge and microwave and sink. The free parking and free breakfast really make this place a great deal. It's also so close to the beach, which is always a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you GER4511 for the great review on our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you had an awesome time at our hotel. Please keep our hotel in mind if your ever back in San Clemente, we do hope that you will stay with us again.

Summary: This is a great spot for a great price.  Nice customer service and very clean spacious rooms.  Free breakfast was very tasteful compared to others I've seen.  This hotel is in walking distance to golf course and a wedding venue.
Manager Response: Thank you Jessica H for the great review on our hotel. It was great to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Hampton Inn and our nice hot complimentary breakfast. We look for to welcoming you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel was very nicely situated and the staff was extremely nice.  Thebreakfast was more than expected and higher quality than at other brand hotels.  Close to the beach and within walking distance if you wanted a nice walk.  10 minutes or so.  Highly recommend this Hampton.
Manager Response: Thank you Melissa H for your stay with us and reviewing our property. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Being close to the beaches and downtown area of San Clemente sure does put our hotel in a great location. Once again thank you the great review and we hope to see you next time your in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Hotel right above the freeway very outdated
Summary: I was very disappointed when I arrived at this hotel from the online pictures it looked like there was an ocean view so I requested that however it was deceiving being that there was only a freeway view. The hotel was very old and not of Hilton quality
Manager Response: Francenew2017,  Good morning! I have been going through older reviews of our property, and I came across yours. I'm sorry that you did not receive a response to your review, but I do thank you for taking the time to leave us your feedback. You may be excited to hear that we are making some really exciting adjustments to our property, such as room brightening. If you are ever back in the area, we do hope that you will give us another try- We would love to welcome you home. Take care, and have a wonderful week!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Love Amy!  So helpfuly, made me feel welcome.
Summary: Amy checked me in and made sure I was all set. The over the week, any questions I had, she was eager to help.  So nice.   Then I went, and left behind a small treasured alarm clock. I just called, and yep, Amy answered the front desk. :)  The housekeeper had found it, and Amy is mailing it back to me today.  So happy.  Thanks Amy.
Manager Response: Thank you 208tamaraf for staying with us at our hotel for your stay. It was truly a pleasure meeting you and I hope that I got all of your questions answered while you were here. I haven't heard from you in awhile so I do hope that you did get your alarm clock back. Once again thank you for the great review and I hope that you come back and visit us soon!

Summary: A nice place to stay at when we arrived late at night.  Parking was a trick to find a spot to park in-had to park off the street in the back due to small spaces.  Waking up and seeing the ocean from my room was a very nice wake-up.
Manager Response: Thank you Mark L for taking the time to post a review on our hotel. We hope that you will visit us again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: All interactions with staff were truly positive!  You-all made our three night stay very enjoyable! What is this ridiculous "minimum" requirement?  Is this what i have to do ... keep writing in order to be able to submit this?  i cannot even "go back".  Chees!  This was a positive review of the hotel, but inane of Trip Advisor.  I cannot even "skip" this step now!  ok, let's see if now i can "submit" or "skip".  Oi!
Manager Response: Dear Fil C thank you very much for the great review. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: Had a great time on my 3-day trip to San Clemente for business. Enjoyed the amazing scenic view of the beach and definitely LOVED the proximity to a couple of nearby restaurants. The front desk was awesome and so attentive to checking in on myself and my business partner while we worked on power points in the lobby. Great stay! Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us 203keishah at our hotel for your most recent visit to San Clemente for your business trip. It was a pleasure having you stay here with us and for keeping me company for a few nights while you were here. We hope to see you again next time your in town for business.

Summary: We have a great time at this location. Walking / Bike Riding distance to the beach. This was our third consecutive years staying here. Perfect place to go visit my family while they're camping at San Clemente State Park.
Manager Response: Thank you OstiCam for your great review regarding our property. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while your family was camping at San Clemente Park. I would definitely be doing the same thing. Staying at a hotel while my family went camping. It's always nice to come back to a nice comfortable bed. Once again thank you for your great review and we hope to see you next year!

Summary: The rooms were clean and large in size.  I especially liked the private living room separate from the bedrooms.  It was a great experience. A double queen room can sleep up to 6 very comfortable.  I w ould stay again.  The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you Stacia R for the great review on our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and had a great experience. We hope to see you next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: This hotel was suggested by the bride of the wedding party.  We made the reservations not knowing anything about this hotel.  We arrived and was met by Amy who was very friendly and helpful in getting us checked in early so that we could get to the wedding.  The room was very nice and clean.  Extremely large rooms.  Bathroom was clean.  When we checked out Amy was again there and again very cheerful and helpful.  Thank you for making our stay very enjoyable.  Will come back.
Manager Response: Thank you adelew284 for taking the time to post a great review regarding your stay with us and I'm glad that I was able to get you checked in early for the wedding you attended. We hope that everything went great and hope you come back and visit us soon!

Summary Heading: Very accommodating for our wedding guests
Summary: We stayed here because we got married at the historic cottage down the street. We stayed here two nights and our wedding party and some of guests stayed here as well. They were very accommodating when we requested more towels or trash bags as we got ready for the wedding. They were nice and always helped when they could. From my room you could see the ocean which was cool. It was a great experience overall.
Manager Response: U9011TUmatts,  Good morning! I was going through past reviews, and I came across your lovely review of our property. Though it's been a while since you have stayed with us, I just wanted to reach out and extend my sincerest appreciation for the time you took to leave us such a great summary of your stay! Our team works so hard to make sure that all of our guests are taken care of, and we are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us. I hope that this response finds you well, and have a wonderful rest of your week!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Nice Staff Working with a Dog of a Hotel
Summary: I stay due to the location in regard  to my work and being a Hilton Diamond member.I would welcome an alternative, newer .upgraded hotel in the area. Too old sand tired, needs upgrade. Very nice staff.
Manager Response: John A,  Good afternoon! We are going through past reviews and came across yours. We apologize that you did not receive a response to your review, but we wanted to take the time to say thank you for the time and effort that it took to make it. Our team hopes that you have been well since your last stay with us, and we do hope that you have or will give us another try if you are ever back in the area. We have some exciting refreshers in the pipelines that we would love to share with you.   Take care and have a wonderful rest of your week!

Summary: The hotel was an amazing value.  The room was large and clean.  The free breakfast was very good.  The pool and hot tub were very nice.  Also, there is a pretty sitting area in the back of the hotel.  The staff was friendly. I highly recommend.
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

Summary: Everything was excellent. From the minute I checked in. The recommendations for food near by. Great location within walking distance to so many things and the beach. I highly recommend this hotel. Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you V2171YOpatriciac for your wonderful review on our hotel. It was great to hear that you enjoyed your stay while you were here and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Nicely decorated hotel but no outside space
Summary: Room was on the 3rd floor on the golf course side of hotel. The room layout was great and the view was lovely but the balconies (if you could call it that) are tiny and unusable which was very, very disappointing. The pool area is so small and it was unfortunate to not have any decent outdoor space.
Manager Response: 13Fog13,   Good afternoon! I am going through past responses, and I wanted to take a minute to thank you for leaving us a review during your stay. The fresh sea air is absolutely refreshing in the morning, and we are sorry to hear that the balconies were on the small side. We do hope that you will give us another try if you are ever back in the area. We would love another chance to wow you!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager

Summary: Awesome staff and clean rooms. Ocean view rooms with a balcony and the staff at this location is the best I found in this area. You won't be disappointed. If your unhappy they will make sure you leave smiling!
Manager Response: Thank you akimep for providing such a wonderful review regarding your most recent stay at our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here while you were on your mini vacation. Hope to see you next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, and were able to walk right up the hill to the wedding we attended at the golf course. Room was spacious, views of the beach from the top floor, only downside is the proximity of the freeway.
Manager Response: Hello Samantha G. We really appreciate your great review of our hotel. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay while you were here and I love that the venue is in short distance from our hotel. It makes it so much easier for our guests to stay here and just walk minutes away to the venue. You don't have to worry about any parking issues. So it definetly does put us in a great location. We hope that everyone had a great time at the wedding and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We came in for a wedding at a nearby location. We were warmly welcomed and made comfortable at every turn. Only the complimentary internet was weak. We really enjoyed our stay as the rooms were well laid out, quiet and clean. Every request we made was created with an eagerness to help. I hope to return!
Manager Response: Thank you 551chucka for providing such a wonderful review regarding your recent stay in San Clemente for the wedding you attended. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our spacious suites. We hope that everyone had a great time at the wedding and we do hope to see you again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: Staff made us feel very welcome and sincere about our event (wedding).  I felt they wanted us to be happy about our stay and went out of their way to accommodate the smallest of requests.  Breakfast staff very friendly and appreciative of our patronage.
Manager Response: Thank you ghh3 for providing such a wonderful review regarding your recent stay. We hope that everyone had a great time at the wedding and hope to see you next time your in town.

Summary: Wedding venue steps away from this hotel.  It was perfect for out of town family/guests and for locals as well.  Who wants to deal with CA highways.  Very friendly staff, from the front desk, to room service and even the late crew.
Manager Response: Thank you U8313WPaliciap for taking the time to review our property. We are happy to hear that our hotel was a great place for your stay for the wedding you attended. It definitely is great to not have to worry about having to driving to the wedding venue with it only being located right behind the hotel. We hope that everyone had a great time at the wedding and hope to see you next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: This hotel had very good reviews, so we tried it! The fact that the beach was a very short car ride away, did not bother us. The room layout was very functional. The bedroom actually had a door on it, which they don't always have. The sink was outside the bathroom which we appreciated as there were 4 of us, which meant that when one was showering, the others could still do makeup, brush teeth, blow-dry hair, etc. The air conditioning was a bit noisy, but not too bothersome. Like having a refrigerator & microwave. The parking lot is very tiny/cramped, but we found places to park each night.
Manager Response: Dear KckbxrSSM,  Good morning! We are going back through some past reviews, and have realized that nobody ever responded to your kind review of your property.. We are so sorry about that, and we would like to take a minute to thank you! We love to hear how our guests are doing during and after their stay with us, and it sounds like you were able to enjoy our property, and hopefully some of the beauty of San Clemente, while you were here. We hope that you have and/or will be by to visit us again.. We would love to welcome you back!  Take care, and have a wonderful week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Amazing weekend! Wedding was amazing! Being able to check in early when we had to switch rooms made it convenient for us to get ready for the wedding. I couldn't be happier! Only if there was a Costco and an In N Out near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review on our hotel. We are happy to hear that the wedding was amazing and that everyone was able to check in early so that way you could all get ready. I wish there was In N Out around here also, but there is a couple of other good hamburger places. I hear Biggie's Burgers is pretty good and its just right down the street. Mr. h_kim90 once again thank you for the great review and we do hope to see you both again soon!

Summary: Awesome stay by the beach for the wedding. Loved the ocean view room and friendly service. Affordable and the local restaurants were very close by.  Very quite area. The people were friendly. Very close to the freeway
Manager Response: Thank you philipdW3853AH so much for reviewing our property. It was truly a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your visit at our hotel. If your ever in San Clemente again, we do hope that you will stay with us again.

Summary: A comfort hotel to stay in when away from home in a very scenic location with a well trained and friendly staff.Easily accessible and to the freeway and local towns and restaurants.A 18 hole golf coarse easy walking distance to the hotel that includes a well staffed club house and bar.
Manager Response: Thank you V567YBrichardk for taking the time to review our property. We here at the Hampton Inn and Suites are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back next time your in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: We love the consistent quality of Hampton Inn
Summary: Always stay here when we visit San Clemente. The staff is friendly and helpful, good location, great breakfast and everything we love about staying at Hamptons! If you are coming specifically to be near the beach, it is a drive from the hotel. Some rooms on the beach side have an ocean view--but it is a distance view and it is also noisier on that side due to it being right next to the 405 freeway. It's much quieter to stay on the golf course side.
Manager Response: Bluebird823,  Good morning! I have been going through older reviews of our property, and I came across your lovely review. I'm sorry that nobody ever responded! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time here with us, and I do hope that you have come back to visit since- We love welcoming home our wonderful guests.  Take care, and have a fantastic week!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Very comfortable and clean accommodations. Chocolate chip cookies every afternoon! Staff was excellent- we felt like we were visiting friends. Everyone was welcoming and gracious. Location was very convenient for our purposes.
Manager Response: Thank you mbcWashington for providing us with such a fantastic review on our hotel. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time at our hotel while you were here in San Clemente and that our location was very convenient for you. Once again thank you for your great review and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We like to choose hotels that have complimentary hot breakfast, which most of them disappoint, however this one did not. The general manager with the sweetest girl you will ever meet, she was incredibly knowledgeable and helpful. The breakfast lady was so sweet the breakfast area was so clean and neat and beautifully displayed, both ladies literally had Smiles on their face the whole time we were in contact with them. We had a very pretty ocean facing Room. The room had a refrigerator microwave and coffee pot with plenty of coffee and tea. The hotel offered tea coffee and cookies downstairs in the lobby along with fresh fruit. The girl is very clean and very pretty. We will definitely be coming back again.
Manager Response: Thank you kellymO806JB for the fantastic review on our hotel. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you got to meet our General Manager Annette and Mika our Breakfast Host and that both of them were very sweet and were able to help you with anything that you needed during your stay. Once again thank you for the wonderful review and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Staff and accommodations were great!  Our room was clean and served our needs.  We liked having a microwave and refrigerator in our room as we were traveling with little ones.  The breakfast was okay.  All the staff we encountered were awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you 310vickiej for you recent stay at our hotel and reviewing our property. We are glad to hear that you and your family had a great stay with us. Hope to see everyone again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Great Ocean Views...but super noisy from freeway......
Summary: Overall my stay here was good, no complaints. 3rd floor overlooking the 405 freeway (noisy when sliding glass balcony door is open)...but the views of the ocean and Sunset are Supreme!  Amy at the front desk was super accommodating....and I would Definitely stay here again....although my mini-fridge didn't quite work well enough to keep my items chilled/frozen....but that's that.  I would say their fridges do NOT work at all...so if you have any food, expect to go bad overnight.  The Hotel itself is a bit dated, but suffice enough.  King bedrooms facing the Ocean are very big.
Manager Response: Thank you enbunny007 for staying with us and for taking the time to review our property. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay while you were here in town. It was a pleasure meeting you and we look forward to seeing you again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: A little muffled freeway noise but i give this place 5 stars anyway. VERY nicely appointed room. Separate sitting room with tv and hide-a-bed. Great coffee. Microwave. Fridge. Maybe the most comfortable bed I've ever slept on. Full breakfast with scrambled eggs, ham, and potatoes. Waffles. Cold and hot cereals. 3 juices and more.  Front desk staff very helpful.  The location across I-5 from the beach. Ocean view from the room.  Nice outdoor pool and jacuzzi. Golf course around the corner.  Reasonable rates.
Manager Response: Thank you papaken65 for taking the time to review our property. We here at the Hampton Inn are pleased to hear that you had a great stay here for the wedding you attended. We are happy that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast and you slept great in our comfortable beds. We hope that you had a great time at the wedding and we look forward to seeing you next time your in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Don't think of staying anywhere else!!
Summary: The staff was absolutely delightful! The room was so spacious and it was a stay to remember! You won't regret stay at this hotel. The breakfast and complementary internet are great! Definitely will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you Ysarai for the amazing review on our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was delightful. Hope to see you again next time your in town. Thank you again.

Summary: Friendly staff specially Amie and Karina. Definitely recommend this property. Good value for the money spent. Good location overseeing the ocean. Breakfast is good and the staff is friendly. We are thankful to the cleaning staff.
Manager Response: Thank you 33thanujap for writing such a wonderful review on our property. It's great to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay while you were here. We are definitely going to miss having you guys here. Stop by and visit us soon.

Summary Heading: Great Short Stay in San Clemente
Summary: There was a group of us up from San Diego for a concert at the Coach House and this hotel was available on Groupon in south San Clemente about 6 miles from the venue.  We were all pleasantly surprised at the ease to get to the hotel - just off the free, they updated look and feel of the common spaces, the room and the quality of the complimentary breakfast.  Hilton always does a great job and this was a great selection for our one night stay.  Would do it again  Best part - nice and helpful staff.  Always an important hotel quality for me.
Manager Response: Thank you sandiegosantorini for providing such an amazing review on our hotel. We are glad to hear that you liked our hotel and our complimentary hot breakfast. It's always a pleasure to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay. We hope that you will stay with us next time your in San Clemente and I hope that everyone had a great time at the concert.

Summary: Went for a little overnight getaway with my boyfriend for Valentine's Day. The staff was extremely friendly. The hotel smelled a little weird, but wasn't intolerable. Overall, great expertise and will definitely be returning again.
Manager Response: Thank you jessst0tts for the great review on our hotel. We are glad that you and your boyfriend came to visit us for Valentine's Day and for sharing that special day with us. Hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Golf course view room. Two full beds, sofa bed. Very comfy for our family of 4. Typical breakfast, decent variety.   I like spacious rooms like this one. Microwave, fridge, extra sink, door between beds and sofa area. Great value.  Stopped here last minute to beat storm Lucifer. Glad we did!
Manager Response: Thank you mm1970 for staying with us and for reviewing our property. We are glad that you stopped by and were able to get out of the storm for awhile. It was pretty bad out there. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay while you were hear with our nice spacious suites and our nice complimentary hot breakfast. Hope to see you again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: This hotel is one mile from Camp Pendleton so a prime location to stay if visiting Marines. Visiting the quaint town of San Clemente was a treat with beautiful vistas, great food and shopping. It's also a midway location to visit Disney to the north, points south such as Oceanside, Carlsbad. One can travel on the Coaster train from one of these cities all the way to San Diego, avoiding driving, also seeing the sites from the train. The hotel has very nice room layouts, friendly staff, clean throughout. I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you HFHTTraveler for providing such a wonderful review on our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Our hotel does put us in a great location. We are close to Camp Pendleton, San Clemente Outlets and the beaches. All of which are very close and when you get back from spending the day at Camp Pendleton or the beach, its nice to come back and relax at the hotel. Once again thank you and we hope to see you again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: golf course view or Ocean view, both were great, breakfast full of quality beds great and clean, easy access to highway 5, close to Beaches, golf next door, felt secure and safe, parking was tight for large vehicles, but plenty was avail. good TV's, lobby was nice and comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you Z6278BKbrendas for your kind words about our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and enjoyed our nice complimentary hot breakfast. Hope to see you again on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary: This was the most pleasant hotel experience. Extremely nice staff, everything was clean and well decorated. They have a heated pool and spa and they are location a just few blocks from the beach. Great experience
Manager Response: Hello from San Clemente. Thank you B9527ZSjennifern for your most recent stay and comments regarding your visit. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope that your daughter had a wonderful birthday. Hope to see everyone again soon.

Summary: It was a pleasure to experience the staff and amenities at the Hampton Inn & Suites in San Clemente.  It was evident that the staff take a personal interest in people who stay there.  The room was beautiful and very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you robertadE1427PS for such a wonderful review. We are glad that you liked our hotel and all the amenities that we have to offer. Please keep us in mind if and when you are coming back to town.   Thanks!

Summary: Quick check in on phone and keycard ready when we got there. Room clean and comfortable. However, bed was very soft as you rolled towards the middle when spouse got in the bed. Like that sink separate from shower/toilet area so others in room could get ready for wedding doing hair and makeup. Breakfast is what you would expect. Bacon was very thin, but very good. Ham on alternate day. Scrambled eggs, muffins, cereal, bagels, fresh cut fruit, or whole apples/banana/oranges to take with you. Walked to the Wedgwood Club where reception was held. A few minute walk to the Sugar Shack restaurant and other restaurants. If you're sensitive to noise, get room on back of hotel as front faces I-5., but you do have a view of the ocean a couple of miles in the distance as you are set up on
Manager Response: Roxanne Z We appreciate your visit and time to review our hotel. We are glad that you had a great time at our hotel for the wedding you attended. Its great that Wedgewood is very close to the hotel and with in walking distance. You can see the wedding venue if you are staying on the golf course side of the hotel. Which is great. We hope that you enjoyed the wedding. See you next time.

Summary: Although I have stayed in many Hampton Inn facilities, this was the first I can recall that was originally designed as another brand and then converted. The conversion was carried out well. It contained all the features and amenities that are standard to a Hampton Inn. The convenient lower level parking just a few feet away from the lobby entrance was a nice feature, as was the layout of the suite. The staff was dutiful and Amy Gonzalez did an outstanding job representing the company.
Manager Response: Thank you lwstoner for such a great review. We are glad that you loved our hotel and all of the amenities we have to offer. It was a pleasure meeting you and I hope that you will keep us in mind next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: We loved this hotel when we stayed here, in San Clemente! The staff was so friendly and helpful. The room had a nice little "living room" and the bed was really comfortable. The breakfast was delicious and it was  nice that it went until 10:00 A.M. so we didn't have to get up too early, if we didn't want to. I'd definitely stay there again!!
Manager Response: Thank you Jim N for writing such a fabulous review on our hotel. We are glad to hear that everyone enjoyed their stay. Hope to see you again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary: We stayed in one of their suites. The room was very spacious and an excellent value for the money I paid. The only downfall was that my sheets seemed slept in when I pulled the comforter back so I had to ask for a clean set. Otherwise, everything was perfect.
Manager Response: Maria S Thank you for providing a great review on our hotel and that you enjoyed our spacious suites. If your ever back in town. Please stop by and visit us again.

Summary: Friendly staff, clean property, clean rooms.  This hotel had it all.  Internet was pretty fast for a complimentary Wifi.  Breakfast was great with plenty of choices.  I slept pretty well thanks to these one bedroom suites and the blackout drapes.  Short drive down to the beach and San Clemente pier and plenty of restaurants and stores.  Will be happy to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you Adam A for the great review on our hotel. We are happy to hear that you loved our hotel and friendly staff. We look forward to seeing you again next time your in San Clemente.

Summary Heading: We loved our room our stay was excellent everyone is so friendly and so welcoming.
Summary: The breakfast was great! Everything was fresh and cooked so good. We defenetly recommend this hotel. The rooms are clean and so big. I loved the privacy of we would have had our daughter staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you Blanquita88 for providing such an amazing review on our hotel and that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast during your stay. We hope that next time you stay with us your able to bring your daughter. I'm sure that she would have a great time. Once again thank you and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The staff are awesome! Best value. We stayed here because it was in walking distance to a wedding that my daughter was in. The staff were great. You can tell that they try to make this value hotel into a resort with what they have. I felt like I was in a classy place because the staff behaved like you were. Good job to all of the staff and management.
Manager Response: Thank you L4628FT for providing such a wonderful on our hotel. We thank you for all of the great comments about our staff. I love where our hotel is located. It's great that all of our guests are able to walk and not have to worry about driving to the wedding venue. We hope that you had a great time at the wedding and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Being a Hilton Honors member, I got a great prepurchased deal for 2 nights. Family emergencies and plans changed and I called to change my dates, but was unable to because of the prepurchase. When I arrived, I told Karin I had called previous in regards to the change and I might need an extra day. She apologized and gave me an extra day for free. The whole staff at the Hampton are so attentive and are willing to make your stay the best it can possibly be. We came to celebrate my step-daughter's wedding, but I think we will make it a traditional to have a mini vacay at San Clemente's Hampton after Christmas every year.
Manager Response: Cmartinez72,  Good afternoon! I was going through our past responses, and I saw that nobody has responded to your lovely review of our property. For that I am sorry, but I would like to take a minute to truly thank you for your kind words. We are so glad that you enjoyed the time that you were with us, and I do hope that you have returned since! If you are back in the area, please feel free to come by... We would love to welcome you back home! Take care and have a wonderful week!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: When you think of a hotel by the ocean you should consider this one!  The staff are so friendly! The rooms are beautiful and well maintained.  It was a little cold during our stay, but our kids still jumped in the pool and spa.  Breakfast was decent and the gals who take care of the breakfast area aren't just nice, they are helpful and willing to do more than just wipe the counters!
Manager Response: Thank you ginasmile1 for all of your fantastic comments about our hotel. We are glad to hear that you and your family had a great stay with us and thank you for all of the wonderful comments about our staff. We appreciate all of your great feed back and look forward to seeing you next time you guys are in town.
