Summary: Visiting family in San Clemente. Conveniently located near highway. Room was a very nice-sized suite. Biggest negative was the lack of climate control...room was unbearably warm. Maintenance did come to reset the thermastat but the only way to cool things down was to open the sliding glass door. Nice breakfast room with a great variety at the complimentary buffet.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ideal stay in a perfect location
Summary: Clean comfortable rooms complemented by efficient and helpful staff. We reached the hotel in the early hours of the morning (due to flight delays) but judging by our reception one would have thought we had just walked in at 9 am! Highly recommend as an alternate to many of the more expensive lodgings nearby.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I rented 4 bedrooms they were beautiful queen the staff was very helpful and polite I would highly recommend this hotel to all of my friends and I would say here again my son is at Camp Pendleton and I would stay here when I go to visit him
Manager Response: Thank you mom198505 for providing such an amazing review on our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay while you were here for the wedding you attended. Hope to see you again soon when you come to visit your son!

Summary Heading: Delightful facility with warm, kind, friendly, and helpful staff.
Summary: Each and every staff member who we came into contact with treated us with helpful courtesy and made us feel welcome and important. They operate as a cohesive, supportive family inviting you to enjoy your stay in their home. We adore San Clemente and the Hampton Inn staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a pleasure staying here. I enjoyed the complimentary accommodations, convenience of services and cleanliness of the venue. I felt welcome by the hotel staff and they were very helpful in assisting with questions about the town.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I arrived late in the evening but was greeted with a smile and assurance that my room was ready.  My son was graduating from boot camp that weekend and the close proximity of the hotel to the interstate was a plus to lessen the commute time.  The beds and pillows are super comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you johnpJ7182AJ for providing such a wonderful review regarding your stay. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay while visiting your son at Camp Pendleton. I love that our hotel is so close to the base. It's only 2 exits away. We hope to see you again next time you visit your son.

Summary Heading: Great view with a great location
Summary: The rooms were beautiful along with the view, overall great experience. Friendly staff. Great value priced for the location. I definitely recommend you check into this hotel. Centrally located between many sightseeing areas.
Manager Response: Thank you nicealex77 for staying with us and reviewing our property. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful suites and that it was a great location for you. We are close to some great sight seeing areas like the beaches, San Diego, San Juan Mission and other great places does put us in a great location. If your ever back in San Clemente we do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I took my wife here for a Romantic evening. I blindfolded her and dressed her in a Sexy Sheer See-Through nighty and drove her here for her Birthday. We had a room over looking the Ocean and had a wonderful time. Staff was amazing and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you Dana M for providing such a great review on our property. We here at Hampton Inn are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope that your wife enjoyed her romantic evening. Hope to see you guys again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel but small lobby. Breakfast was good but there were no other amenities like bar or rest. The road traffic was loud and you have to cross the hwy to get to the beach. The pool was closed and also very small.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A very clean facility with extremely helpful, caring staff.  The complimentary breakfast provides an excellent selection of fruit, cereals, oatmeal, waffles, eggs, breakfast meats and starches to fill you up. An excellent choice for a comfortable, laid back stay for pleasure or business.
Manager Response: Thank you Dana G for providing such a wonderful review on our property. We are happy that you enjoyed our nice hot complimentary breakfast during your stay. We look forward to seeing you again. Thank you again.

Summary: The hotel needed updating and smelled a little old. Not up to normal standards for Hampton.  Staff was very friendly and helpful. It was a good location close to the ocean and freeway. Very cute shopping area near by.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel! The rooms are very spacious and super clean. Very comfortable bed so I slept like a baby! Good selection of morning goodies at the comp breakfast they offer. The staff is very welcoming and super nice to all the guests. I'm coming back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: On the way to San Diego
Summary: The property is easy to get to off of the freeway.  We flew in late and were driving to San Diego so it was a good location for us.  All of the employees that we had contact with were excellent.  The room was fine but there was not anything special about it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spent a week in San Clemente visiting friends, and chose to stay at the Hampton Inn. I liked that it had suites, equipped with a sink, refrigerator and microwave. Just feels better to have more space. Overall I thought this was a good Hampton to stay at. It isn't a place you stay for the ambiance or view, as it is off of I-5, but the main road it's on takes you right into downtown San Clemente, so it has a functional location in regards to getting around. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: David M Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We here at the Hampton Inn and Suites appreciate that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente. Thank you again.

Summary: We always stay at this location it's comfortable and easy access to the freeways. Nicks restaurant is our favorite place for dinner the breakfast is always fresh and hot and there are tons of local spots to grab a bite
Manager Response: Thank you Kellafields for staying with us during your most recent visit to San Clemente and comments regarding your visit. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay.  Being close to the beach, outlets and freeway does put us in a great location. We do hope to see you again on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Hampton Inn in San Clemente the customer service was excellent and their attention to detail was impeccable. Both Taylor and Amy made our stay as comfortable as possible .   Taylor was kind enough to videotape a surprise for our Marine.  We had driven our Marines truck From Ohio to California and I brought his cousin along with me as a surprise.    The room was very nice, it was clean and nea.   We had originally wanted an oceanfront balcony however once we had arrived and we saw that the hotel was next to the I 5  freeway  we decided to switch to a balcony overlooking the golf course which was much quieter and very relaxing.    We decided to switch hotels the next day moving to the Laguna Cliffs resort and spa which was a big mistake in hindsight and
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff handled the busy Times with grace and speed. Our checkin was perfect. Location was perfect for our get away. This was the 2nd time for my wife and I to visit and enjoy the San Clemente area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall, this was a nice,clean,freeway-close hotel. The rooms on the freeway side were a little noisy. I would choose the golf course side if I stayed here again. Also, channel selections in the room were limited. We stayed here during the baseball playoffs and we had to go to a local sports bar to watch the Dodgers/Cubs playoff game.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our 5th visit to this hotel! We come back because the customer service team is amazing! I want to give an extra thanks/recognition to Amy Gonzalez who works at the front desk. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you Elisa L for providing such a wonderful review on our property and for all the fantastic comments about our team. It was such a pleasure meeting you. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The rooms were lovely and very comfortable. The extra sitting room was a nice feature. All of the service staff was very friendly and helpful. I plan to stay there the next time I have to be in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you Michelle R for your recent stay with us and reviewing our property. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We do hope to see you soon next time your in the area.

Summary: We stayed a week and the staff was extremely accommodating and helpful. One of the best hotel staff experiences we have had. Our daughter had type 1 diabetes and we had special medical requests which were promptly complied to.
Manager Response: Thank you CCA2012 for providing such a wonderful review regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear that you and your family had a wonderful time at our hotel and that our staff was very helpful and accommodating. If you are ever in the area we do hope to see you guys again soon.

Summary: Very convenient to wedding venue!!! Clean room, easy check in/out. Very convenient. Would recommend & stay again. Appreciated complimentary breakfast though average.  Staff friendly & helpful. Overall lovely stay
Manager Response: Thank you tifgar for providing such a great review of our property. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay during the wedding that you attended. Being close to the wedding venue does put us in a great location. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The rooms are very small, tight and noisy!  View from 3rd floor room was of the 5 Fwy and a distant ocean.  Noise was awful and the suite was a nuisance, made it even smaller. The room felt like a glorified closet at best.  Only reason we stayed at this hotel was because the Wedding Party booked for friends and family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved this place. It was just down the street from where my daughter got married. The grooms party used my room to get ready for the special day. It was awesome. The only things I have against this place was the street noise. I am from middle of no where and freeway noise is something I don't have to deal with.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Recently visited family at Camp Pendleton and chose to stay in San Clemente because of its proximity and we were not disappointed with the convenience.  The front desk staff were very friendly and the views of the ocean were wonderful.  The only real drawback was the I-5 freeway (literally across the street from the hotel) as it got quite noisy at times.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We picked this hotel to its approximate location to the area we were visiting. We were not aware it sat right next to a freeway. Even with a ocean view room, you could not leave the patio slider open as the noise was over the top. The hotel itself was a typical Hampton Inn and all the amenities. Great. We could have picked a room on the opposite side of the building, but you look at a open field and homes. If it were not for the freeway noise, it would be a fantastic location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed in the San Clemente/Dana Point area 5 times prior to this stay at comparable hotels (Best Westerns and Holiday Inn) and this one is by far the best!   The room layout is very nice, the amenities are very comfortable, the breakfast is solid.  The staff was fantastic and housekeeping was wonderful.  Our room was spotless the entire stay so much so that we got cash out to tip them extra.  I travel a lot and I've never done that before.  We did have to make a room change to accommodate my sports equipment and the second room was quieter than the first (AC was a bit louder in the first room).  It want bad but if it's too loud for you ask to switch rooms, our second one made quite a bit less noise.  In spite of the location we did not hear any road noise and being right
Manager Response: Thank you HookupSurfing for providing such a wonderful review regarding your most recent stay. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast and our great staff and that we were also able to switch your rooms so that you could get that extra space for your sports equipment. If you are ever in the area again we hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,  Amy Gonzalez

Summary: The staff was very cheerful and friendly.  Our room was bigger than expected and very nice.  They provide every amenity that a traveler could want.  The breakfast was exceptional. I would recommend this to anyone going to San Clemente.
Manager Response: Thank you Beth M for providing such a wonderful review about our hotel. We are happy to hear that our staff was cheerful and friendly and that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast. We hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely, Amy Gonzalez

Summary: Such a great property. I travel often and in all of years of travel I have never received a hand written welcome letter from the hotel. I was very impressed by that and the delicious cookies they left in my room. The hotel is in a great location and I love the setup. The staff is very friendly and accommodating and the parking is a breeze. The views from my balcony were of the golf course, which was very nice.   I really enjoyed my stay at this property and will most definitely stay again next time I'm in the area for business.
Manager Response: Thank you mtvl2001 for your most recent stay and kind comments regarding your visit. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay as well as our fresh baked cookies!! They are certainly delicious. We do hope to see you again when your area.   Sincerely,  Amy Gonzalez

Summary: Failed to meet my expectations upon arrival when rooms were not cleaned and ready for us after we checked in. I was told they should have been a priority due to my HH membership.  Closeness to the wedding venue was our reason for staying here
Manager Response: Thank you R8809DG for reaching out to us. I was sorry to hear that your room was not ready when you checked in as promised. We work hard to accommodate all requests for early check ins. I will be working with front desk team so that we can prevent this sort of issue from happening again in the future. We do hope to see you again.   Sincerely, Amy Gonzalez

Summary: Overnight stay while driving the coast.  Hotel is right next to the freeway.   Stayed in one bedroom King suite.  Room was adequate and clean.  Very thin walls.  Interior noise and freeway noise.  Breakfast was a disappoint.  Warm juice, canned fruit, few choices compared to others.  Would probably choose another chain.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  The rooms were very clean and offered many amenities.  The rooms were also large and comfortable. The work out facility was very clean and all the equipment was newer and in good working condition.  The work out area was well maintained.  The pool/spa area was nice and clean as well and the water temperature of the pool was perfect.  The lobby had information on things to do in the area and they had a well stocked general store with plenty of goodies for snacks.  The breakfast area was nice and the food selections were very good.  They kept all breakfast items well stocked and the hot items were fresh and hot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: we attended a wedding nearby, this hotel's' location and we enjoyed our pool and golf course view. The location of the hotel was convenient to the freeway and coast highway. There were a few snack cafes nearby. It was a short walk to the wedding venue and enabled us to hit a few golf balls at the course.
Manager Response: none

Summary: AC in the room didn’t work and despite repeated request (4 in 5 days), the problem was never addressed.  My room wasn’t cleaned one day and on another no towels were give.  After requesting towels it took over 30 minutes to get them.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel had a great view of the ocean (odd room numbers).  The continental breakfast was good and had a large variety.  The rooms were nice and clean.  They had a microwave and small refrigerator.  The bed was comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The desk staff was exceptionally friendly, helpful and thorough, providing me with information on local attractions, dining, and simple directions to the closest market just down the street. Both Amy and the gentleman who checked me in (my apologies, I lost track of his name) were fantastic, and the housekeeping staff took great care of us as well. We'll definitely stay here again the next time we're in town!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is an all-suites hotel; room was huge and comfortable. We had a patio with a lovely view. We used the fitness room and the morning breakfast amenities. Front desk helped with directions. Overall a pleasant experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We usually love Hamptons and end up staying at this hotel often, because of my Hampton rewards.  The staff is extremely helpful and friendly, but the rooms need updated.  The vents in the bathrooms over the sink are often loud and leak sometimes.  Makes for a moldy smell at times>
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room to s very clean and very quiet. Love it . Parking is good breakfast is excellent. Would definitely stay here again. We have party of five , the room are comfortable enough for all of us. Recommend the suite if you travel with family it has everything you ask for in the room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent staff and service.  Loved the roomy and nicely decorated suite we had.  San Clemente is gorgeous.  Highly recommend staying here!  The breakfast was nice and there was a large selection to choose from.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay for a day at the beach
Summary: Hotel was clean, staff was very helpful and friendly. We had a great breakfast before heading to the beach for the day. Many options to choose from including eggs, waffles, potatoes, cereal, oatmeal, toast, juice, and fruit. It was a quick 5 minute ride to the beach and very convenient. There is plenty of parking and the WIFI worked without any issues. We would choose this location again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Noisey and unresponsive.  Very loud air conditioning system
Summary: Noises and unresponsive management. The front desk staff is very friendly abd they gave us a new room when we told them about the air condition noise but we expected the problem to either be corrected or at a minimum that they would have taken the rooms out of service since the noise was so bad.   They should have comped our stay the second time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was a surprise. The staff was attentive and helpful. The facility was clean and maintained. The front desk check-in experience was quick, friendly, and showed a true interest in our stay. The hotel was clean and well maintained. I loved the location, it was near everything. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone that is traveling in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I would have given the location a better rating except for the extremely high volume of highway noise. It made the balconies unusable. The pool was a typical parking lot pool, and only big enough for a few people at a time, but preferred the ocean anyway. Beach is definitely not walking distance, but only a very short drive. Overall, acceptable for the price. Downtown area is close, and well worth the experience. Good food and shops.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The fact that this facility is literally next to I-5 makes it an assist and a liability. The oceanview rooms face the freeway.  The rooms are nice and quiet.  The staff is very helpful.   Access to the state beach is less than a five minute drive.  We would highly recommend this motel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was well kept and spacious.  The breakfast was very good. It offered a variety of items.  The workout room appeared to have alot of equipment choices.  The pool was small but nice.  The only issue was there is only one elevator and the wait can be lengthy but the stairs are a great option.  There is limited covered parking and more uncovered parking.  NO CHARGE.   It is about two miles from the beach and local restaurants.  Provides immediate access to the freeway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice clean Hampton. Parking is challenging. Staff's primary language is Spanish. One elevator for guests and housekeeping.  Good long "hike" to beach. Downhill to beach uphill way back. Close to 1 mile to beach each way.
Manager Response: Thank you Terri W for reviewing our property. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our clean hotel. We work hard to keep it clean for our guests. I love that the beach is so close to the hotel, it is great to take a nice walk and enjoy the breeze. I was sorry to hear that your parking experience was anything but perfect. If you do decide to stay with us again, please come to the front desk and we will be happy to assist you with any of your parking needs. If you are ever in the area we do hope that you will stay with us again.   Sincerely, Amy Gonzalez

Summary Heading: About 24 miles from John Wayne Airport, and very close to MCB  Camp Pendleton
Summary: Had all the amenity items you would expect in the room and a snack bar and other needed travel items in the lobby for sale.  Very good breakfast buffet!    Chose this hotel by reading other Trip Advisor reviews and am glad I did.  Had an AC unit problem, (my room was 77 degrees and not cooling.)  They came up to try to repair within minutes, could not fix, but gave me a fan to use for the night.  They fixed it the next day.  Stayed in room #111 on the second of 4 floors.   I requested a balcony room on the highway side.  Great sunsets but freeway noise from I-5 traffic while on the balcony.  Balcony was about 10 x 15 feet and nice.  Most other balconies I saw were much smaller and about 4 feet wide and 10 feet long.  With patio door closed, I could not hear highway traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you Denverbeach for taking the time to write this review and for letting other future guests know about our suite shop and our breakfast. I'm glad to hear that we were able to get your a/c fixed and that you were able to enjoy the sunset from your balcony. We hoped that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,  Amy Gonzalez

Summary: Fantastic facility, wonderful service. We enjoyed the delicious breakfast. Loved the room. Jumped in the pool, swam in the ocean and ate at Pedro's tacos three days in a row. We are so grateful for the family time we spent together at the Hampton Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you so much patriciamG721QQ for reviewing our property. It was truly a pleasure to read that you enjoyed staying with us and that you were able to enjoy the beach, pool and especially family time. We do hope to see you and your family again soon.   Sincerely,  Amy Gonzalez

Summary: We stay at Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente every summer, while we celebrate our anniversary and attend the Laguna Art Festival & Pagent of the Masters in nearby Laguna Beach, CA.  Their friendly staff always goes out of the way to welcome us and make our stay pleasant and memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you Paul S. for providing such a wonderful review regarding your stay. I'm glad to hear that our staff was friendly and that we made your stay pleasant and memorable. We do hope that you had a great anniversary and a great time at the Laguna Art Festival. Hope to see you again on your next anniversary.   Sincerely,  Amy Gonzalez

Summary: Stayed here for two nights because of a wedding. Our room was great! Very spacious and the beds were very comfortable. The bathroom was also a good size. We also enjoyed the breakfast in the morning. I would stay here again and recommend if you're attending a wedding nearby.
Manager Response: Dear LbeforeE,  Thank you so much for reviewing our property. It truly was a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your visit. We certainly are recommended highly as both a wedding destination, and a leisure property. Thank you for your recommendation, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very nice personal, but a very dated hotel. And my room had no A/C, and sadly I believe the hotel knew it when they check me in. The A/C didn’t work the night before either (prior guest told me).  I guess the floor fan in the bedroom area should have been my tip off when I settled into the room. And after the hotel re-setting the A/C and it still not working at 8pm, they offered to credit my account with X amount of points – which I accepted. When I checked out the next morning, I found they were crediting me less than ½ of what I was promised. The lady at the front desk said there was nothing she could do. Overall, a very dated hotel and the most uncomfortable night of sleep in a long time (90+ degrees that day).
Manager Response: Dear Robert E  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We do apologize for the experience you had with us. We are working hard to get our A/C's up to the standards that our guests expect. Each day we are installing new ones to make our guests stays more comfortable. As with the points situation, I will be looking into it to see what happened. If you could, please feel free to email me any details regarding your conversation with our front desk. Thank you again.  Andrew Thomas Guest Service Ambassador Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente CA, 92672 2481 S. El Camino Real (949) 366-1000 andrewt@dknhotels.com

Summary: GREAT STAY, NO PROBLEMS AT ALL, BREAKFAST WAS VERY NICE.  We attended a wedding at the golf course behind the hotel and we were able to walk - very convenient.  I am glad we extended our stay to 2 nights because we wanted to walk on the beach (about 15 minutes).  Just exit the lobby and make a left at Camino Real, then go to the next light (Avenida San Luis Rey) and make a right crossing the bridge -- enter the State Park and follow the dirt trail all the way down to the sandy beach.   Well worth it !   We walked on the beach every morning --loved it !!1
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay. Being close to both the beach and golf course really has become something our guests love. Thank you again and we hope to see you again!

Summary: Staff were friendly. Room was neat and clean. I like the digital check in because you can choose your room right away from the digital map. Breakfast was really good and with variety. Hotel is near the beach and close to the Outlet Factory.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay. We do strive to provide the quality of service that many have come to know about the Hilton properties. Thank you again and we hope to see you again!

Summary: Very convenient location for the wedding being held at the nearby golf course. Very close to the freeway, beaches, gas stations and liquor store. Hotel is simple, but very clean with an excellent staff!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay. We have so much to offer in such a close proximity to us that we even find it hard to recommend only ONE place. Thank you again and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: There are three major hotel chains in San Clemente. This hotel had easy access to I5 and surrounding areas. Enjoy are stay while staying at this location. Staff is friendly, rooms are clean, relaxing pool area for kids to swim and play.
Manager Response: Dear Glenda N,  Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay. We do strive to provide the quality of service that many have come to know about the Hilton properties. Thank you again and we hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Great place for a wedding and family gathering!
Summary: Our wedding was held across the street.  Our extended family gathered here.  It was an exceptional place.  The "Breakfast Area" provided us with a place to gather, as well as the pool area.  The staff and managers could not have been nicer, efficient and generous.  The rooms were well designed, clean and spacious.  We loved our time there.  I could not recommend it higher!
Manager Response: Dear Royce D,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a enthralling review about our property. We do strive to provide the quality service that many have come to know about the Hilton properties. We look forward to having you return, thank you again.

Summary: We live in San Clemente and choose to stay at the Hampton Iin San Clemente for 4 - 5 weeks each summer when we rent our home to visitors.   We could stay with relatives for free, but we love the clean, air conditioned rooms, friendly staff and complimentary breakfast.  As 30 year residents of San Clemente, we know this town and all the hotels.  Hampton Inn is simply the best.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie A,  Thank you for providing such a wonderful review regarding your recent stay. It truly was a pleasure to read that your experience is what keeps you coming back year after year. We look forward to having you return again next year. Thank you again.

Summary: Would not reccomend, poor layout, unprofessional staff (allowed smoking in eating areas) breakfast was good but not supervised. Spend a little more somewhere else, (that isn't so odd and noisy) it was a very uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Tammy O,  Thank you for reaching out to us. I would like to apologize for the experience that you had. This is certainly not a normal experience from us. We will be looking into the matters regarding the smoking and unprofessional staff that you mentioned so we can take the necessary measures. I would like to welcome you back so that we can have the chance to make it right should you find yourself in the area again. Please feel free to reach out to me, and again thank you.  Andrew Thomas Guest Service Ambassador Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente CA, 92672 2481 S. El Camino Real (949) 366-1000 andrewt@dknhotels.com

Summary: Great having most of the wedding guests in one location. Venue was within walking distance.  Easy to get to beaches and fun tourist sites.  Joshua Weinstein provided exceptional customer service and consistently went above and beyond during my stay.  Upon arrival, helped get the crowd in the lobby checked in quickly.  At breakfast, personally brought me coffee by the pool after they ran out and made more.  At checkout, Josh personally went to another floor (no ice machine on lobby floor) and brought me a cup of ice for the long drive home.
Manager Response: Dear LisaRedondoBeach,  Thank you for your kind words regarding our staff. I know Josh will be thrilled to read what you wrote. He certainly does provide the quality experience that many have come to know from the Hampton's. Thank you again.

Summary: Based on the reviews on tripadvisor, I made reservations for three nights.  I was interested in the beach and experiencing a small beach town in Southern California.  Once I arrived at the Hampton, I just did not see the point in staying.  There is no ocean view, only a speck of blue over a very busy street.  I was offered a room with golf course views to avoid the noise from the busy street.  The golf course view is anything but.  The alleged golf course view is really a parking lot and a small patch of dried grass.  Also, the room overlooked the very small pool which was also loud.  The room was large but extremely dark.  Looking out to the balcony, there were walls and more walls.  Essentially, this was just a place to sleep.  Otherwise, the Hampton has absolutely no charm
Manager Response: Dear saghai,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We do apologize that your experience fell short of your expectations. We strive to provide the quality of service that people come to expect from the Hampton's and also an experience to be remembered. It appears we fell short on delivering both of those to you, and we do apologize. Should you find yourself in the area again, please feel free to reach out to me as I would love the chance to make your next visit one to be remembered.  Andrew Thomas Guest Service Ambassador Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente CA, 92672 2481 S. El Camino Real (949) 366-1000 andrewt@dknhotels.com

Summary: This hotel would have been ok had the AC been working.  We stayed the night of July 4th so as not to have to drive home after spending day with family in San Clemente.  We got back to our hotel room late only to find AC wasn't working properly.  No matter how low we set control it wouldn't go below 74.  The room was stuffy and couldn't open windows because freeway noise was so loud.  My husband was also bitten by some sort of insect after sitting in the chair in the sitting room.  He still has a horrible welt on his foot from it.  He had just taken his socks off so it definitely was something in the carpeting.  Carpet seemed pretty gross.    I mentioned the AC on check out and they acknowledged it was a problem but didn't offer to adjust bill.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer P,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We would like to apologize for your experience you had. This certainly is not what our guests come to expect when they stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites. We strive to provide not only quality service, but an experience that is exceeds expectations. We fell short and would love the opportunity to make it right. Please feel free to reach out to me and I can better assist you.  Andrew Thomas Guest Service Ambassador Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente CA, 92672 2481 S. El Camino Real (949) 366-1000 andrewt@dknhotels.com

Summary: Beds were so comfortable and the breakfast was awesome and staff friendly and helpful.  I would highly recommend to stay here. We were here over the 4th of July and we could even see the fireworks from our hotel room as a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear renel215,  Thank you for kind words regarding your recent visit to San Clemente. Over the 4th of July it can be a very busy time with the families and friends. It's certainly a pleasure to read we we're able to accommodate you so well over the Holiday. We hope to have the pleasure again next year. Thank you.

Summary: Great place to stay, friendly staff, very clean, large suite, great free breakfast and short drive to the beach and dining.  Check in and check out were very easy.  Complimentary coffee and cookies in the lobby were good. Highly recommended for visits to San Clemente and surrounding areas.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. It is always a pleasure to read that our guests had a wonderful stay. Service is our top priority and I am happy to read that we provided such outstanding service. Thank you again.

Summary: Thank you so much Viri for making my family stay unforgettable!  I booked an over night stay for my family who were visiting Doheny Beach, so they would not have to drive all the way back to Duarte so late in the day. I used my Hilton Honors points for the stay, as a GOLD member. And I must say the level of Service was impeccable! I should know, as I am a former Hilton employee.. now working for the Ritz Carlton. Managers, take note, she was awesome in assisting me with an amenity order that was placed in the room with a kind note.
Manager Response: Dear CasMor7,  Thank you taking the time to write such a wonderful review regarding your recent stay. Viri truly is an asset to this hotel, and I know she will be thrilled to read your very thoughtful words regarding her. Thank you again for reaching out to us, and we hope to have you visit us again should you find yourself in the area.

Summary: excellent location within walking distance from El Camino Real. Great restaurants within walking distance. Beach... The crew is also amazingly helpful and professional. Karina at the front desk strives to make everyone feel welcome and will do what's necessary to satisfy the guests.
Manager Response: Dear Mbarek O,  Thank you for your lovely words regarding Karina. As our Assistant General Manager she does a phenomenal job and were glad she made not only you but everyone feel welcomed. Thank you again for sharing with us your experience, and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Was impressed with the room and would agree with points about sleeping overlooking the motorway.  We got a room overlooking the golf course so was quiet - I've seen more picturesque views but was fine.  The pool looks bigger than it is and is not really in a nice setting - but is ok.  Suite was great to have mini kitchen etc.  The one thing that let the place down was the breakfast.  I have never eaten breakfast in an hotel with plastic cutlery, self service and not very healthy options but I suppose kids like it! Is it too much trouble to stick cutlery in a dish washer - paper plates too! Not sure whether these get re-cycled - very disappointing and would not return!
Manager Response: Dear Carole Z,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We do apologize that our breakfast was not up to standard. We often receive great reviews about our breakfast, but nevertheless we did fall short on your experience. We do hope that we have the chance to make it right should you return to our area. Thank you again.

Summary: Had a great experience.  Location was ideal for us...being close to downtown San Clemente.  We brought our bikes and it was a nice ride down to the pier.  Hotel was very clean and the staff was very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Craig S,  It is always a pleasure to hear that our staff was able to accommodate you so well. We understand that when traveling with bikes or other belongings it can be a toss up as to how every place will handle them. I am glad to hear that our staff was able to take care of you. Thank you.

Summary: This is a hotel right by the 5 freeway.  One side faces the ocean and freeway.  The other side of the hotel faces a beautiful golf course.  Our room was facing the golf course.  It was very quiet with a nice view.   We loved our room.  We ordered a king but we got two queens. (Which was fine).  The room was spacious with a sitting room when you walk in and the bedroom to the rear.  Both rooms have their own TVs which is great for kids.  The rooms were very clean (so important) and the breakfast was typical full breakfast with waffle maker, meat, eggs, yogurt, fruit, cereal, and I think oatmeal.  Tea/coffee/juice.  We usually eat breakfast late and they won't restock the food at most places.  But I was impressed, the food was still very much available!  THANK YOU!!!  The staff
Manager Response: Dear Heidi M,  Thank you for leaving such a wonderful review about us. We certainly try our best to provide the quality service and standards that Hampton Inns are famous for. I am happy to read that your experience certainly was one to remember.

Summary: If you need sleep, you need to request room not facing freeway. I enjoyed hotel, but would have been happier getting room facing golf course. couldn't change rooms because weddings going on & hotel full to capacity.
Manager Response: Dear Azucena S,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We do understand that with the freeway it can be a tough night sleep. We do offer earplugs, but we understand that might not be an option. We do apologize we were unable to accommodate you, and we hope to have a chance to make it right, should you visit San Clemente again.

Summary: Excellent Service, Excellent Facilities, Good Breakfast and goo Internet...  Only Negative was hot tub was Inop last 2 days and A/C was intermittent...  Would have give a 10 rating but those two items reduced overall rating to an 8, still very good but not as good as it could have been...
Manager Response: Dear David A,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. We do apologize that our hot tub was malfunctioning during the time of your visit. We have taken the necessary steps to fix it, and it is up and running properly. We do hope to have another chance to earn your business and make it right. Thank you again.

Summary: Don't stay here! We had a man yelling that he was going to murder someone staying at the hotel. He was banging on doors threatening someone in the middle of the night. The hotel did nothing to insure my safety and laughed when we said we were worried about safety when we checked out. They don't value their guests and they laughed at us when we brought up our concerns.
Manager Response: Dear Lauren G. Thank you for taking the time to provide us valuable feedback regarding your stay. I was sad to hear about your experience and wanted to assure you that this is not common at our hotel. If you have a moment, I would be happy to discuss this off line should you have any further details you’d like to share with me. I can be reached at karinag@dknhotels.com.   Best Regards,  Karina and Hampton Inn and Suites Team

Summary: Extremely pleased with Joseph's assistance with checking in and related services. The room was located that afforded an ocean view, the pool facilities was clean and well managed, breakfast items offered was adequate although room was a little small.
Manager Response: Dear K3086EJbenc,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a wonderful review regarding the service you received at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente. I will make sure Joseph reads your comments about him as I know he will be excited to read them. Thank you again.

Summary: I traveled to California on business and wanted to check out a new area other than my usual location so I decided on San Clemente. The hotel has underground parking which was nice when unloading my car, the hotel was quiet and clean. The breakfast was great every morning. The front desk recommended a restaurant Fisherman's Restaurant on Pier 57. It was delicious and had a beautiful view.
Manager Response: Dear khagan20,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We are happy that we had the opportunity to be your new choice of location. We often hear many guests rave about the quality of our breakfast. Our front desk certainly is friendly and knowledgeable of the area. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Even though is 30 minutes from Legoland it's a lot better than 6 hours to Legoland.  I really like to stay at this HI&S property.  It's close to the beach and shopping San Clemente Outlets. The staff has always being nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Elvia J,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We are happy to hear that our staff was able to accommodate you so well. Being close to the beach, outlets, and Lego Land really does put us in a great location. Thank you again.

Summary: We stayed here because we were getting married walking distance from the hotel. They offered a room-block discount to us and our guests. Everyone was really helpful and nice. Our guests enjoyed their stay, as did we. I would recommend it if you need somewhere to stay in the area. My then fiance had an ocean view and the girls and I had a view of the Golf Course.
Manager Response: Dear KasiaLandry,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful time at our hotel. All of us here truly wish you and your husband the best. Thank you again, and we hope that you'll come visit us again soon.

Summary: My husband and I just attended the Doheny Blues Festival in Dana Point, Ca. The Hampton Inn and Suites was perfect for our stay this year. I rated this hotel as a 4 out of 5 - instead of a 5 out of 5 due to its location next to the freeway. However - from our room we did NOT hear the freeway noise. It was only when we were on our balcony that we were reminded of our location. Rest assured - you will have a comfortable night's sleep at this establishment. The staff was eager to help and the complimentary breakfast did not disappoint. (It is free, folks.)
Manager Response: Dear Sandee D,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We do understand the noise of the 5 freeway can be a bit much and we do offer sleeping aids to those who are sensitive to the noise. We are happy to hear that it did not bother you, and that hopefully you got to enjoy the wonderful ocean view it provided. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary: Clean!  Clean!  Clean!  And I am very picky about cleanliness.  Our Room 209 and hallway appeared to have recently been remodeled.  New hallway carpet.  Fresh paint in the room.  The beds were super comfy.  Clean sheets.  Clean duvet.  Clean bathroom.  Clean everything.  Fresh cookies and coffee every evening in the reception area.  Breakfast was delish!  And the attendants kept everything tidied and...yes, clean!  Great stay.
Manager Response: Dear SuperMom1656,  Thank you for taking the time to write about us. We are thrilled to hear that the cleanliness of our property had exceeded you expectations. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: The room was great and so spacious, separate room for the sleeping area. Doesn't get much better than that. This is the hotel to come to when in San Clemente, will definitely come back and recommend to others. Amazing ocean view and nearby all the great spots in town!
Manager Response: Dear dev k,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. Our property really does have a prime location in San Clemente. The views can be tough to beat, especially with the spacious suites we offer as you mentioned. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Don't Even Hesitate To Choose this Location.
Summary: This is a warm ,comfortable friendly clean facility. rooms are spacious, clean w/ either ocean views or golf course  views.  . Staff is friendly, helpful, happy and respectful.  Complimentary breakfast is fresh and good quality w/ a wide variety. Close to oceans and downtown . Adequate parking w/ no extra fee.
Manager Response: Dear Mindi L,  Thank you for your kind words regarding our staff and property. Our views from the hotel certainly offer beautiful ocean views, or gold course and mountainous views. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: My Wife and I spent the weekend here to explore the Town and visit friends who live here. This Hampton Inn is quite nice. Clean, friendly staff and quiet (our room was #316). Good advice from previous Tripadvisor "Posters" to request a room on the back side of the Hotel to avoid the freeway noise. We will be back !
Manager Response: Dear Mike E,  Thank you for your kind words regarding our property and it's staff. It is always a pleasure to hear our guests enjoyed their stay. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: The rooms were a bit dated but clean and fresh.  The amenities of room fridge, suite room , large rooms were great. Underground parking, outstanding for this area. We had 2 rooms facing the ocean but the I 5 freeway noise was so loud it wakes you up.
Manager Response: Dear Aj M,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We do apologize that our rooms were not up to your standards. We do try to keep them up to date as we continue to move forward. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our amenities offered. As with the noise, we do understand it can be hard to sleep. We do offer a sleep package that helps to drown out the noise to those who request that and it is a complimentary amenity available to all guests. Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you back on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: comfortable well appointed accommodations good value
Summary: Stayed one night at this hotel. Friendly professional reception staff. Reception area very pleasant, with nice array of drinks and snacks. Also a small store to purchase snacks and personal items. Room was very comfortable, very clean, good quality accoutrements like soap, towels. Excellent breakfast offering in the am, with various hot foods as well as fruit and other items. Patrons enjoyed breakfast so much they lingered over their meal. This is an excellent value for comfortable night's stay. Very close to major highway, but sound proofing was more than adequate.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth m,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us with this wonderful review. We truly do appreciate the touching words you mentioned about our staff and amenities. I know our team here will be thrilled to read everything you mentioned. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back to San Clemente on your next visit.

Summary: Great price for a great room. It was clean, updated and had all the amenities we needed for a wedding nearby. The refrigerator was great as I needed to store a wedding gift in there. 2 tv's was a bonus! Parking was no problem, view of the water is beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear Laura Z,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Your kind words have been passed along to all who are responsible in making our hotel what it is. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary: This hotel has a wonderful location that's convenient to the beach, marina, and food options. The staff are always helpful and genuinely motivated to help in any way possible  to make your stay enjoyable. The rooms are clean and have a lot of space for a family of four. I highly recommend this hotel if you're visiting SoCal.
Manager Response: Dear Charles N,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are thrilled to hear that our staff was able to accommodate you so well. I know they will love to read your kind words regarding them. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: The room was ok but the air was musty due to clogged airfilters. These should be changed once every 3months. My family all ended up with bad allergies because they werent changed out. Food was soso typical free breakfast with a bust waffle maker two days in a row.
Manager Response: Dear 995charlesy,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. We do apologize for the inconveniences you experienced on your most recent stay with us. Allergies certainly are never a good thing for anyone, and we will be investigating the matter to ensure all our guests are properly accommodated. As with our breakfast we often receive many great reviews as it is a wonderful complimentary offering. We do apologize that you did not enjoy it. We would like to welcome you back so we have the chance to right the wrongs. Thank you again.

Summary Heading: San Clemente Hampton Inn & Suites. Great Staff & Accommodations
Summary: Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente is right off the 5 Freeway and just a 10 minute drive to the beach.  The entire staff were pleasant, willing to accommodate all concerns within a reasonable period of time.  The breakfast was great.  We appreciated the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel.  It's a great deal.  You wouldn't find anything like it in Los Angeles for the price and location!
Manager Response: Dear Linda L,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. You kind words certainly won't go unnoticed. Our staff was very excited to read your review. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary: Great hotel in convenient location. The staff was extremely professional, friendly & very helpful. The rooms were clean and the beds comfortable. The complimentary breakfast had a large selection and was great. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Sonia B,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. It's always a pleasure to read our guest's accommodations were met if not exceeded. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Nice King Suite, Friendly Desk Clerks
Summary: Recently stayed for two nights in one of the large 2 bedroom king suites.  The bed was comfortable and we had a nice balcony overlooking one hole from a nearby golf course.  The parking was free and we were able to park underneath the hotel.  The bedroom was so large that the 17 inch TV seemed too small for the room.  I know, I'm digging deep for a criticism.  The bathroom tub/shower enclosure had a repair done on it which made the bathroom look low budget.  The breakfast was typical Hampton 2016 - same choices, but more "mix-ins" for the waffle, oatmeal, and fruit salad.  It was fun to have coconut and walnuts.  Loved San Clemente and the value this hotel served.  Would definitely stay here again for the price.
Manager Response: Dear TravelerMR,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We always love to read that our guests enjoyed our spacious suites. In regards to the reparations, we will be investigating the matter, and taking the appropriate action based upon your review. We do thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we would also like to thank you for choosing to stay with us.

Summary: We had a large group in for a wedding. The staff went over and above to make sure everyone was well taken care of. The location was perfect for the wedding venue and within walking distance of restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear deborahf59,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are thrilled to read that our staff exceeded your expectations. With weddings being such a special day, we try to make each and everyone special in its own way. Thank you again, and we hope to have you visit us again on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in San Clemente
Summary: For the price and location, the Hampton Inn & Suites was a good choice for our accommodations  in San Clemente.  It was not on the beach, but it was convenient to the beach and also to downtown.  There were restaurants within walking distance from the hotel, but I would not recommend the OC Tavern & Grill (decent food but terrible service).  The pool was heated, which was nice especially during April.  Very family friendly.  The rooms on the west side had ocean views, and the room on the eat side had small balconies.  Although the ocean view was great, the windows didn't open to the outside on the west side where we stayed.  I think I would have preferred to have had fresh air during the night.  If I returned, I would request a balcony room.
Manager Response: Dear James U,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are happy to hear you enjoyed you accommodations and amenities that we had to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back and getting that balcony room so you can experience the fresh Southern California air.

Summary: We made a quick trip to stay at this hotel for a wedding that was walking distance to the venue.  I was pleasantly surprised that this hotel was so clean, the staff was very nice and the hotel itself was well manicured.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your short trip with us. Thank you again, and we hope to see you again on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary: Amy at the front desk was amazing! Thank you again for your hospitality and making my birthday more amazing.  We recommend anyone who is celebrating a special moment to stay. We had a great time and will recommend to my family and friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First the parking. Most of it is in an open lot but part of the hotel property. There is limited parking under ground. The breakfast was not very good. We had issues with our air the first night which was solved by removing the cover to the thermostat and reinstalling. If your on the street side, forget about opening your window for fresh air, the cars are roaring by on the freeway.   The staff seemed to care about their guest except 1 night duty person how was rather rude. Pool is on the shady side of the hotel so no afternoon sun. The beach is close, but you have to drive. Camp Pendleton main gate is about 18 miles or so down towards Oceanside.  Good cookies! Beds are ok.
Manager Response: Dear Marine-0311-Grunt,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We do apologize that we fell short of your expectations as I can assure you this simply is not normally the case. We often get many reviews in regards to our breakfast and comfort of our rooms. We will be investigating your experience and will be resolving the issues you mentioned so our guests can experience the proper accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed the cookies, we bake them fresh everyday. Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you back so we can have the chance to make it right.

Summary: We love coming to Hampton Inn. It is by far the best hotel we've stayed at. I would highly recommend staying here. What more can you ask for. Beach,outlets,great food, and of coarse Hampton Inn San Clemente
Manager Response: Dear Sean L,  Thank you for taking your time to review our property. San Clemente truly does have it all, and I honestly believe it is one of the few towns to be able to say so. We are glad you enjoyed your accommodations and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary: This is an unusual Hampton Inn because the rooms are all suites. There is a living room with its own TV, a bathroom, a sink outside the bathroom and a very large bedroom. Room is quiet even though the hotel is close to I-5. Breakfast is very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We certainly are different than most other Hamptons, but still offer that same Hamptonality our guests have come to love. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to San Clemente.

Summary Heading: I will forever choose to stay here when visiting south OC
Summary: Our room was immaculately clean - and the king bed we slept in was the softest, smoothest I have slept in throughout our whole vacation. There is HBO in the rooms, and they also offered complimentary toiletries should you run out. It is located close to the beach, in a safe neighborhood, and parking here is free. There is also a small store for snacks and munchies. The pool is small but perfect for kiddos, and they also have a hot tub. Another good thing about this hotel is that they provide free breakfast every morning from 6-10am and actually have an assortment of hot foods: sausage, ham, omelets, waffles, and oatmeal in addition to cereals and fresh fruits. All this for about $110 a night and it really just can't be beat. (Fyi, we stayed at a one-bedroom king suite - the
Manager Response: Hi wonderland62, Thank you for taking the time and writing this great review. I am extremely happy to hear that you were able to relax and have a goodnight rest, as well as enjoy all the amenities we have to offer.  We can't wait to welcome you back next time you are back in San Clemente. We will see you soon!  Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Overall, our experience was very good. Staff was friendly and pleasant. Also, the complimentary breakfast was good and a variety of choices to choose from. We plan to return in the future. Perfect location...San Clemente pier, restaurants, shopping, etc...about 2 miles away.
Manager Response: Hi Gisselle C,  Thank you for writing this review and letting others know about your experience. We are glad you enjoyed your stay while you got to visit the beach, restaurants and shops. Our staff wanted to thank you as well for the kinds words and we look forward to welcoming you back.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Was a great experience. Our son was getting married and they were able to accommodate our large group. The staff is professional,  friendly and accommodating. The continental breakfast was more than yogurt, yoas, bagels and fruit. We had waffles, omelets and coice of meat. Each day had different options. Also we were able to walk to our wedding venue and restaurants.
Manager Response: Hello U9040BKsharonh Congratulations to your son and daughter in law, we wish them nothing but the best!  Thank you for allowing us to be part of such a special moment in your lives. We are extremely ecstatic that all your wedding guest were able to stay with us and enjoy our hot complimentary breakfast. If you are ever back in San Clemente please keeps us in mind.  Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This is a very nice hotel, but a little pricey. Rooms are large and set up is great. The door closes between bedroom and living room for quiet and privacy. It was surprisingly quiet. Breakfast was very good.
Manager Response: Hello laurahM4157GB,  Thank your for visiting us while you were in San Clemente. We are happy to hear that you liked our rooms and the privacy the bedroom gave you. If you are ever back in San Clemente let us know if there is anything we can assist you with.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The room was clean and the staff was also ok. The breakfast was disgraceful. At 8:00am in the morning there was no fresh fruit cut ( I asked for some and it took 15 minutes) and out of yogurt for the day. The attendant said she was sorry and shrugged her shoulders.  I was shocked and left to have breakfast at a local establishment. I was prepared to discuss when I checked out but no one asked me about my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Michael S,  Thank you for your stay and your loyalty to our Brand. I want to express my sincerest apologies regarding you breakfast experience at our hotel. We pride ourselves on providing our guests vast selections of items in our breakfast bar. I am sorry that you experienced otherwise. It is inexcusable on our part to not have the basic items you expect but most importantly the lack of responsiveness or care from our staff. Again there is no excuse just regret and sincere apologies that we were unable to remedy the situation before your departure. Please feel free to contact me at the hotel to give us the opportunity to make it right. Thank you for your review and I look forward to connecting with you.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: A very good hotel with a lovely view.  Clean and quiet. Good valueforthe money.  Good selection for breakfast. Area is good to visit San Diego and allthe attractions in the south and north to Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm, Sea World etc.
Manager Response: Hi Patricia V, Thank you for staying with us on your most recent visit to San Clemente. We have great views to the ocean and to the Municipal Golf course and to those beautiful sunsets. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast since it looks like you needed the energy to visit all those places you mention. We hope you had a wonderful time and maybe we will see you again.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great room, staff and accommodations at a fair price. Very well planned out room with internet, two televisions, fridge and couch. Perfect place to relax and enjoy a couple days down time. Free breakfast that included all the items a normal breakfast should.
Manager Response: Hello David H,  Thank you for your recent visit. We love that you were able to relax and enjoy your stay with all the amenities our hotel has to offer, from WiFi to our hot breakfast. If you are ever in need of another relaxing few days come down to San Clemente and visit us again.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great small hotel in a nice beach town. The staff was very friendly and we left something in the room. They sent it back to me within 3 days. Thank you to the great staff!! I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Anthony D,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are happy that you received your items  that were left behind and for the kind words about our staff. Keep us in my for your next visit to our beach town of San Clemente.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel. I was visiting family in both Orange County and San Diego for Easter, so the location was perfect. It's a very short drive to great restaurants in San Clemente, along with the beach and SC pier. The hotel has very nice amenities. It has a complimentary breakfast and also coffee and juices in the lobby, which was really nice. Our room was very clean and pleasant. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Michele V,  Thank you for staying with us on your most recent visit to Southern California. I'm glad to hear that we were the perfect location for your vacation while visiting your family. We are glad you were able to enjoy our coffee that is available 24 hours in our lobby. Please keep us in mind for your next visit. See you soon.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Surf Getaway San Clemente Hampton Inn
Summary: We stay here quite often, it is near some of My Sons favorite Surf spots!! The Location of this San Clemente Hampton Inn is very good, close to Trestles , The Pier , "T" Street and restaurants. The friendly staff is very accommodating, and they are a reason we choose this location as well as convenience!  See you soon , Lisa Noll
Manager Response: Dear lisanF1900GE,  Thank you for choosing our hotel every time you visit San Clemente. I'm extremely happy that our staff is the reason you keep staying at our location. As you have mentioned our hotel is close to many restaurants to choose from and the beach. We hope you guys enjoyed the waves and see you soon.  Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Kids would say- awesome breakfasts, great rooms, glad we had wifi. Mom would say- rooms with a "bedroom" make traveling with kids easy, hot tub was wonderful, everything was clean and service was amazing.   Highly recommend from everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer P.   Thank you for staying with us and for the great review. The staff at the Hampton Inn is happy to hear that both the kids and you enjoy our room accommodations and our breakfast selections. We strive to provide our guest with the best service and it looks like our goal was accomplished. We look forward to welcoming you back if you decide to visit San Clemente again.   Warm regards,  Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel on Our Family Spring Break
Summary: This hotel was excellent and spacious for a family with it's suite style rooms which include living area with fold out bed and a room with two queen size beds.  Quality linens, clean and comfortable, many breakfast selections kept fresh and stocked, a great location close to San Clemente's beaches with a sneak peak of the ocean on one side and a golf course mountain view from the other.  We loved our stay and are coming back!  Thank you,  Butch and Christina Martin
Manager Response: Dear christinamK854GX,  Thank you for taking the time and writing such a kind review. We are glad that you guys had a great stay and were able to enjoy our wonderful views. Having all these great things near by, I hope you were able to see what San Clemente has to offer, if not there is always next time. We will see next time you stop by and visit.   Warm regards,   Karina and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Day trip value avoid spring break
Summary: Close to beach , old town and walking to restaurants. Thin floors, make sure to stay on the third floor and facing the golf course if you like peace and quiet. Staff is friendly and helpful. Double beds are uncomfortable. Rooms are spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Dear 756vanw,  Thank you for your most recent stay and candid feedback of your visit. While we are glad that you found our location convenient and our staff to be friendly and helpful, we apologize that you had issues with noise. We strive hard to provide our guest with a comfortable visit. Please know that we appreciate the opportunity to address your concerns to help us provide our future guests a problem free stay. We hope you will give us another try the next time you are in San Clemente.

Summary: This hotel was clean and the staff was courteous.  The desk clerk offered us free coupons for a neighboring eating place.  I would suggest you drive to a restaurant for dinner.  Those within walking distance are just ok if you are really hungry.
Manager Response: Hi,  Sandra P!   Thank you for your stay and taking the time to review our hotel! We appreciate the glowing review of our hotel's cleanliness and staff service! It gives us great pleasure to know that you enjoyed your visit. There are many restaurants in the area that have phenomenal and varied menus. Pls. stop by the desk next time and we'll be happy to provide you list and get our team's recommendations!  We hope to see you again in the near future!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Nice hotel in a good location for easy access to multiple local attractions.  Not in the downtown area which becomes very crowded during the daytime.  Hotel is an old building but is up to date on the inside.  Some of the wear and tear shows through.  Parking at the hotel is tight when most of the rooms are booked.  Staff is very good.
Manager Response: Dear Michael Q,  Thank you for your stay and your honest review of our hotel. We appreciate the feedback regarding your visit! We treasure our guests' comments as these help us improve our facilities and services. Our entire team would like to extend our thanks for your kind comments!  We invite you back to come see us again soon!  With gratitude,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: great rooms and friendly staff. Rooms were clean. Bed was comfy. Staff helpful. Room very spacious. Had a great time with family. Close to beach. No parking fees and lots of parking areas. Thanks for two great nights of sleep.
Manager Response: Hello, Tricia S  Greetings from San Clemente! Thank you for your stay and the "excellent" review! It is important and thrilling for us to know that your family trip went well and that you had two great nights of sleep here at our hotel!  We hope that you will think of us again the next time your travels take you to San Clemente!  Yours in hospitality,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary: I enjoy staying at this hotel for proximity to my temporary work location, friendliness of the staff, and comfy beds.  The breakfast in the morning is great and the variety changes every morning.  The coffee and tea available 24 hours in the lobby is also quite welcome.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen D,  Thank you for your recent visit and review of our hotel! We love that we were able to make it a comfortable stay for you while you are here for work and that you found our amenities and friendly staff a great fit for your needs. Please let us know how we can assist you in the future should your travels bring you back to San Clemente. We look forward to your next stay!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Good Value, location, and flexible scheduling
Summary: Stayed here on a recent trip to SoCal.  I stayed here before and returned because I liked it.  I had to change my reservation multiple times during my trip and they did so without any change fees or hassles.  This alone was great.  The hotel has many amenities including free breakfast, gym, pool, and wifi.  My only negative was the wifi could have been more robust.  It did not always work well.
Manager Response: Hello eddiesNYC!  Thank you for visiting our hotel during your recent trip to SoCal and taking the time to review your stay. We love hearing back from our guests about their experiences and appreciate the opportunity to address any concerns they may have. These are valuable feedback that we use to improve our product and services. While I am glad that a number of things went well from your reservation to your stay, it was disappointing to hear that your wifi experience were not as robust as you expected. I am happy to report that we are in the process of upgrading our current 30 Mbps to 100 Mbps in the next few months.  We hope that you will give us another try should your travels bring you back to San Clemente.  Sincerely,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: This is by one of the best hotels we've stayed at. The room was clean and ready for us on arrival and is very close the camp Pendleton for us.  The breakfast is far above and well worth the extra you pay for the room and you can get coffee all day! After 4pm they even bring out cookies at the front desk area for there guest.  I would recommend this place to all.
Manager Response: Dear Larkn5,  We would like to thank you for choosing our hotel to stay at during your visit to Camp Pendleton.  Our team are extremely glad to hear that your stay was spot on! There is no greater reward for our team's hard work than to hear that you have enjoyed your stay and fully experienced what we have to offer from our clean rooms, yummy breakfast and chocolate chip cookies! We appreciate the recommendation to your friends and family and hope to welcome you back in the near future.  With gratitude,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Ocean view, excellent breakfast and an amazing staff.  THis is one of the best places I've found to stay in the area, and by far the best staffed - everyone at the facility was friendly, professional and easy to deal with.
Manager Response: Hi, Johnny S!  Thank you for your visit and review of our hotel! There are no words to express our gratitude for your kind words  It is incredibly humbling to read your sincere comments regarding our team and hotel! We hope that you will find your way back to the "great spot in San Clemente" very soon. We are here to welcome you!  Warm regards and appreciation,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Stayed at the Hampton Inn for a baseball tournament.  Free breakfast was great.  Could figure out how to use the free wifi... Bed was very comfortable and it was nice to have a separate sitting room.  Thanks Hampton
Manager Response: Dear AHanes87,  Hello and thank you for your visit! We loved having your group stay with us and appreciate your awesome review of our hotel! We didn't hear how you did on your tournament but we hope that it was fun and went well. We invite you to come back and stay with us again the next time your team travels to San Clemente. Good luck to your team!  Until next time, Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary Heading: Well-lit, safe and convenient underground parking
Summary: This hotel is located not far off from highway 5.  It has a well-lit, safe & clean underground parking where the Lobby is accessed directly from this level. This was convenient for us arriving after dark.  We were traveling on business, so didn't take advantage of the pool area, which looked very inviting.
Manager Response: Hello deborahr763!  Thank you for your stay and 5 star review of our hotel! We loved that you found our location convenient, safe and clean!  We hope that you will visit us longer next time and take advantage of the pool area. We are having great weather lately and it will be perfect for you to do some sightseeing here in San Clemente.  Hope to see you soon,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We stayed in Hampton Inn at San Clemente location for Valentine's weekend and I got severely bitten by bed bugs. I have not realized that my swollen legs, arms and part of my face were due to these bites until later when it got bit down. This is my first experience with hotel infestation and I travel a lot. After a large dose of allergy medication to calm down swollen areas, I could visibly notice numerous bites in the same area. Photo attached. Otherwise, it is a nice and friendly hotel. I wish I could give them better review.
Manager Response: Dear olhappy,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a feedback from your most recent stay. I would like to offer my sincerest apologies for your experience during your visit. We pride ourselves in offering and providing all of our guests a clean, well maintained hotel. It saddens me greatly that you experienced otherwise.  Please know that we take our guests'  comments seriously and has taken the steps to investigate the issue you reported.  I would invite you to contact me personally at 949-366-1000 to discuss this matter further. I appreciate the opportunity to address your concerns.  Sincerely, Rachel L General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this location because of a wedding which was held at the golf course and club house.  Perfect location for both, comfortable room, friendly staff and the admenities which I like.  I shall make sure I stay at other Hampton locations in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Linda K,  Allow me to say THANK YOU for your stay! You must have attended a wedding at Wedgewood next door! Our location is the closest distance to this beautiful wedding venue and we enjoy hosting families and wedding guests who attend there. We appreciate the compliments on our room, staff and amenities! We love that we made you a loyal Hampton guest as well!  We look forward to your next visit!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We stayed here for a wedding that we were going to attend across the street at Wedgewood. Very spacious and clean room, friendly staff. Breakfast was good. A quick drive down the road took us to Del Mar, where we enjoyed shopping and an art fair and farmer's market on Sunday.   Only teeny tiny complaint is that the elevators are really slow and the stairs aren't easy to get to.
Manager Response: Hi, Felicia A!  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay! We hope the wedding was fun! We are over the top and super duper ecstatic that you thought our hotel was "Great" from our rooms to our friendly staff! The area does have a lot to offer and hop and skip away from cool destinations as you found out. We will certainly look into your complaint regarding the elevator. I sincerely apologize that although, teeny tiny, it left you with a negative memory of your visit.  We hope that you'll come and see us again soon!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente
