Summary: It's located right off I-5, just a few miles south of 73. It is a convenient drive to the OC using the toll road. There is covered parking. The lobby has a small pantry. Hot breakfast. Rooms are clean and quiet and modern.
Manager Response: Hello polly c!  A big THANK YOU! from our hotel and team for the awesome review of your most recent stay! It is always nice to receive the love back from our guests!  We're stoked that you found our location convenient and enjoyed our hotel and the services that we offer. Whatever occasion or reason you had for visiting us, we hope that you'll come back very soon! We cannot wait to welcome you back!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Of all the Hamptons we have stayed at, this ranks among the best. We had an ocean view room that was very clean and large, with all the amenities of a good hotel. The staff was amazing, polite and very helpful. The breakfast was great. If I have one complaint  - the ocean view rooms are a little bit noisy due to the freeway close by.
Manager Response: Hi  marlew76205!  You made our week! Thank you for naming us "Best Hampton Inn"! We appreciate your stay and the kind words! Our team are super excited to know that we stood out in cleanliness and service in your book! We sure do get tons of compliments on our super yummy breakfast and we're glad that you thought it great as well. The ocean view rooms are facing the highway and in your next visit we can offer an alternate view from our suites facing the beautiful golf course next door. We hope to be able to welcome you back very soon!  Best regards, Rachel and team at "Best Hampton Inn" & Suites San Clemente

Summary: Great Hampton. I have stayed at several. This one has a great staff, super clean and the complimentary breakfast is a step up. We stayed one night and two nights later went back for an additional night.
Manager Response: Hi, Katrina B!  Thank you for your stay and the "super" comments! We are super thrilled to hear that you found our hotel a Great Hampton! There is no better compliment than having you come back and stay an additional night! We hope that we can welcome you back soon!  Best regards,  Rachel and the Super Staff at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We enjoyed staying in this Hotel.  It was convenient to the venue our nephew chose for his wedding celebration.  It was also close to the ocean, shopping and good restaurants.  The staff was very friendly and always anxious to help.  When we reported a plumbing leak in our room they repaired it quickly.  Unfortunately,  we had an area of very wet carpet as a result of the leak.  The breakfast at Hampton Inns is always tasty.  When we travel with grandkids we feel it is a very money saving perk.
Manager Response: Dear yevettf,  Hello from San Clemente! Thank you for your most recent stay and comments regarding your visit!  Our entire team was pleased that you enjoyed your visit and appreciate our friendly nature. We sincerely apologize that the wet carpet after a plumbing issue put a "damper' on your visit. Please know that we take our guests' comments seriously and have taken the steps to correct the issue you brought up for future guests. We love that you found our breakfast tasty! We pride ourselves in providing our guests variety of choices that are sure to please! Please come and visit us again!  Sincerely, Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We had 2 TV's, one in the bedroom and one by the couches, felt like a 2 room suite:) Breakfast was great. Hot eggs and waffles, juice, hot drinks, pasteries, yogurt, sausage. Really clean. Would stay at a Hampton Inn again. Hot tub could be a little warmer. Enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Hi, Carrie A!  We appreciate your visit and time to review our hotel! We love that you found our breakfast yummy and totally enjoyed your stay! We have a huge selection of breakfast items that sure pleases even the pickiest eaters! We'll make sure to check that hot tub temperature for you.  We hope to welcome you back again, soon!  Best regards,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. The staff was friendly, the breakfast was great and the complimentary coffee and hot chocolate was much appreciated.  It was right off Interstate 5 but never heard the traffic.  The suite that we had was spacious and comfortable.  They do put a $25.00 hold per night on your card in the event of purchasing something from their gift shop. It had many amenities.  Thank you Hampton Inn & Suites for helping to make our family vacation a great one.  Anytime we come to California this will be where we stay.
Manager Response: Dear pheflin,  Greetings from San Clemente!  Thank you for your visit and glowing review! Our entire team was super excited to hear that your first family vacation to California was a great one and that we helped made it so!  Do come back and see us again the next time you are in our area!  Until next time,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: My family enoyed our 3 nights stay in this nice hotel.  They have clean, comfy beds and quiet room.  Very good staff.  Very nice location.  Close to restaurants.  Close to the beach.  And close to Shopping outlet. Yummy hot breakfast. We will go back in the summer. And might stay longer.
Manager Response: Hello JAM1018!  Thank you for being our guest during the Christmas holidays and your wonderful review! It warms our hearts that your enjoyed your stay and found the facilities and services to your liking! There is no better compliment than "We'll be back!"  See you this summer!  Warm regards,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We staqyed at the Hampton Inn in San Clemente on a Saturday night.  The staff were all extremely pleasant and accomadating.  The ocean view from the room was wonderful.  The room and amenities were great.  The bed comfy and cozy.  Our checkin and checkout went smoothly.  Loved the location and easy access to restaurants, etc.  Would go again for sure.
Manager Response: Hello nancils,  Greetings from Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente! We are grateful for the awesome review of our hotel and team!  Yes, the ocean view from the rooms are truly exceptional specially during sunsets. We love that you truly enjoyed your stay and hope that you visit us again to experience more of our hotel and area!  See you soon!  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: The hotel was clean and the room was a decent size.  The free breakfast is nothing special but is a nice touch and provides healthy alternatives like fruit, yogurt and granola.  The coffee is good and refills are free.  The location is right off the 5 freeway but we were on the east side of the hotel and couldn't hear the freeway at all.
Manager Response: Dear ScottD, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We appreciate your kind words and feedback regarding your visit.  I am happy to hear that the breakfast and coffee hits the spot for you! We hope that we will be able to welcome you back soon!  Yours in hospitality,  Rachel and the team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites because of a family wedding. The wedding venue and service was excellent.The hotel accommodations were very comfortable. The complimentary breakfast had a wide variety of choices, both hot and cold. The staff was friendly. We were very satisfied with our stay and would stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear elizabethrL4680AI,  Wow! We feel the love! Thank you for an awesome review! Our team are super excited to hear that your accommodations and service were excellent and that you were satisfied with your visit! We'll take you up on your word and hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rachel and team at Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente

Summary: Location is right off I-5, and close to state park down the road.  Odd layout of hotel.  Lobby on an entrance level, parking garage underneath property, floor 1 has breakfast room.  Rooms facing away from interstate face the municipal golf course.  If you're here for golf, not a bad place to stay.  Reason for average:  rooms felt dark, hotel lobby and breakfast area felt cramped, not enough space to be 'at home' on the road.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice amenities, breakfast was great - service friendly. Front desk staff a little confused with job. Entrance not elegant as it is through the parking structure, but lobby area nice and has coffee/tea/hot chocolate all day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were there for a wedding at the golf course.   This was a great Hotel 1 block to the wedding venue.  Quiet, very clean and everything worked for us.   Complimentary breakfast was very good too and most important, they had great coffee!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had a wonderful experience at the Hampton Inn & Suites in San Clemente. I had a wonderful view of the ocean, the suite was spacious and clean, the staff was professional and helpful, and the free breakfast was delicious. I was concerned because it was on a fairly busy road, but the windows were insulated well and noise was not an issue. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a cute town
Summary: The inside of this hotel is nearly perfect. Great staff, very clean and comfortable, everything in nice condition. There is only a tiny outdoor pool and it's quite a walk to downtown. Good choice though. Happy with my stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A bit pricey but comfy, clean, and has great staff
Summary: I stayed for a semi-destination wedding, and while it was a bit higher priced than I would have chosen for myself, it was very clean and the staff was very responsive. We had issues with our A.C. not wanting to cool the room, and the two times it went out, the management had a maintenance guy up there within minutes, who did whatever reset he did. This hotel is very proud of the fact that they wash their comforters for each new guest, and that's very much appreciated (most places only wash the sheets). Overall nice hotel and a 3 min walk to the Wedgewood.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the breakfast was GREAT.  We stayed there because of a wedding and it was an excellent stay.  I highly recommend this site.  The room was clean and the hotel grounds were picked up.  We even got a bottle of champagne and chocolates upon our arrival.  The property is situated on the San Clemente golf course which was a serious plus for my husband.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lost a nights sleep with unacceptable noise. The noise would come on and off. I thought it was the heater and turned that off but that wasn't what caused the problem. Staff did switch me to a different room the next day. But I will see if this hotel will honor their 100% guarantee by refunding me the first nights payment. Lost a good nights sleep on something that should have been repaired before the room is used.
Manager Response: none

Summary: San Clemente is a beautiful beach town which an abundance of restaurants and shops.  Shops for the ladies head straight to downtown (which is all of a few blocks) and go to 1699 it's where everything in the shop is $16.99.  Go to the pier and walk it and when coming back to land head straight for the restaurant on the left which is a pub type restaurant with good food and great service.  If the sun is about to set sit on the west side outside if you can and watch that incredible sun set behind Catalina Island.  For a great picture stand on the other side of the train tracks up on the hill to get the palms and beach in your picture.  I cannot begin to tell you how many fabulous restaurants are in San Clemente but my favorite higher end one is Village Mediterranean Rim.  They have
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although the room smelled a little old our stay here was perfect and what we needed for our big family. We were there for a local wedding and the staff was very helpful and thoughtful at the same time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: very nice, comfortable rooms. great bedding. Rooms are beautifully decorated. And wonderful views from your private balcony. Very safe area for a vacation.  Lots of wonderful resturants and shops close by. Very polite and helpful employees. Convience of parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great staff and maintenance person to fix a T.V. problem.  We were given a free movie due to issue.  Good location for us.  Very nice staff.  Located a short drive to walking path along ocean.  We didn't try the pool.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spent several nights here. My husband is disabled; so they gave us a disability compatible room. It was very comfortable, the staff could not have been friendlier and accommodating. We plan to go back here. It is only about 1.5 miles from downtown and the ocean. Breakfast was quite extensive and good quality. Our large room had 2 TVs with one in a sitting area with a couch and coffee table - also a microwave and small fridge.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a wedding that was taking place at the golf course right behind the hotel. We appreciated the cleanliness of the room and helpfulness of the staff. The complimentary breakfast was great, lots of hot and cold options, and all free wifi that came with the room did everything we needed it to. There isn't much to do in the area (within close walking distance, anyway), but that can't really be helped. Our room had an ocean view and we could even walk to the beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had to stay here for multiple weeks straight and couldn't be more pleased with my experience.  The staff here is wonderful and very accommodating.  My only complaint was the guest upstairs from me had very heavy feet and walked in his room alot for some reason..lol.. but this is completely out of the hotels hands so I don't blame them. The breakfast was great and consistent.  I highly recommend this hotel to anyone coming to the San Clemente area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were in San Clemente for a big family reunion this past summer.  We picked this hotel based on the close proximity to the San Mateo Campground, where many of our family members were staying, and because we like Hampton Inns.  This hotel did not disappoint.  While the hotel itself is older, it is well maintained and clean.  The suite arrangement worked well with our toddler, as we had more space to spread out and a separate bedroom to put him down for earlier bedtimes.  The only complaint is that the glass door between the bedroom and living room only had a sheer white curtain covering the glass.  It was very ineffective for blocking out light, so we pretty much had to turn off all the lights in the adjacent room when our son went to bed.  The sink was located in the hallway
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel and location is nearby the beach.  Highly recommended and the price can not be beat.  We stood at the Hampton for 3 days 2 nights for a wedding.  We have 2 kids and the room was very roomy and comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved our room overlooking the golf course.  The little balcony was a nice quiet area to sit in and enjoy the outside.  I would choose this room and location again.  We had a fabulous stay with a great breakfast and had many choices of hot and cold food to eat.  The location of the building was close to the wedding facility that we attended, so we were very pleased indeed.  Shopping in downtown San Clemente wasn't far away, nor was the Enterprise car rental facility that we rented a car from.  GREAT LOCATION OVERALL for our purposes.  Thanks Hampton Inn for a nice stay with you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: upon arrival to our room it didnt smell bad. But thru the course of the day and night the smell just got worse! Dont stay in room 207 OR 205 horrible sewer smell. They shoudl get that fixed before they book it. We had to wait a couple hours before we can get switched to another room. Dont think I would come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Is a last minute stay. But is working out well. Location location location. This will be a return spot. The staff is great we checked in and they made some great dinner suggestions. Cant wait to wake up and hear the ocean. The kids were jealous when we skyped earlier. I sensed a hint of envy from the wife as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great stay from start to finish. Easy check-in, great mini suites, super clean, comfortable beds, and an amazing view from the balcony. Friendly staff and a great location and an easy check-in. Yummy and convenient complementary breakfast in the morning. My only complaint is that it's very close to the freeway.  I would highly recommend this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ideally situated for San Diego and LA
Summary: Lovely suite, very clean, great wifi, complimentary breakfast good, coffee making facilities in room, pool very small more for a quick soak, but there is a Jacuzzi, and the carpark overlooks San Clemente's municipal Golf course.  Short downhill 1 mile walk the beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff went out of their way to accommodate us. We arrived late in the evening and the staff made the check-in process effortless, they then checked on us the next morning to be sure we were happy with our room and our stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great service, rooms were spotless and view from room was great. Staff takes care of your every need. The fitness center was first class. The free breakfast was good and most important the coffee was always fresh
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a great hotel and really nice staff. The breakfast was great, as was my room. Because it's so close to the freeway you have to drive underneath to reach the lobby in the parking garage. But not one sound from the freeway and our room faced it. Very quiet. A noisy ice machine was right across the hall but we never heard it if the door was closed, not a peep.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great smiles from staff, great beds, easy off 5 acess
Summary: Wonderful beds, dont use google gps to find it it takes you all over and by a golf course, when its so easy after you see it. The only thing I didnt like was the tv is only about 32 inches so when you are used to a 60 its really small, so much for reading on tv without the glasses. On wall temp to control room temp, if you get a rattle from ac look up in middle of room the air intake has a filter there and sometimes the metal door rattles. I put a piece of the coffee hot cup holder there and it solved the rattle. Microwave and fridge in by couch / tv dvd in double queen room. Second tv in bedroom.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hampton Inn and Suites are the best value- large 2 queen bed room with an adjoining sitting room that could be closed off. Clean, no smoke smell, 2 TV's, wet bar, good parking, very helpful staff, a breakfast that is not great but adequate.  Will always seek out this chain when traveling.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is not new, but very well maintained, the staff is very helpful and friendly, overall, one of the best run hotel I have stayed, big kudos to the staff. The fitness center is very clean and breakfast is fun very well with staff constantly present to check on guests and refill food
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was convenient to the soccer venue. Staff was very accommodating with late check out. Room was comfortable and quiet. The mini suite allowed me to work while my son slept. Breakfast was free. Parking was a little tight, but OK.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this deal thru groupon which was a great deal. I booked the king suite,when I got there they had it for a double. That wasn't gonna work. After awhile he found a queen. Suite we took it.  So I suggest double checking when you book third party. Room was awesome for us with 2 kids.  Clean and everything we needed and more. Parking was awesome.  Close to everything.  Coffee and cookies were a bonus.  We didn't eat the breakfast.  But if you are staying here. I highly suggest you head down the road on Del Mar to the S C cafe.  Awesome people, prices and great food we ordered the Bae omelette it was the bomb.  This place was great for our family vacation to the beach. Definitly will be back. People here super friendly. And oh yeah if you love seafood check out Fishermen
Manager Response: none

Summary: Old hotel but still comfortable sometimes noisy from the traffic, pool was clean and enjoyable, rooms quiet, hotel staff very pleasant especially the  night desk agent. Beach a couple of miles away, beautiful state park, close to downtown.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed in this hotel many times.  Every time I'm in the areas I come back because it's always clean, comfortable, and the staff is friendly and helpful.  The rooms are good sized, and the beds comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was an overnighter between San Diego and Los Angeles and we enjoyed our time here.  An older hotel but very clean and comfortable and with an excellent breakfast included.  There was even a waffle maker!  Helpful staff and a short walk to takeaways and a very nice hotel for a good meal.  The hotel overlooks the freeway on one side and the golf course on the other and we chose the golf course side as it is quieter.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times.  The last time was many years ago, right after a remodel. It seemed ok, and I always felt comfy. This time, however, it's changed. The rooms were dark and small. Felt very closed in.  The furniture needs a re-do, sofas are circa 1980 and dark.  Bed was comfy, I will give them that. There was a sewage odor in the room, and the bathroom sink was completely stopped up.  The shower area was clean, seemed the most remodeled part.  The carpet was soggy under the sink, and that really grossed me out.   We won't be staying here again, this has gone the way of many Hamptons, that have seen better days. Do yourself a favor and go to Laguna or Newport for something nicer.To pay $200 for a room like this is robbery.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It would be good assuring maintenance is in good working condition as guest room should be monitored daily or have a check list for housekeeping as they clean room to check all appliances, doors and air conditiong
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was highly rated on trip advisor.  I have stayed in many Hampton Inns and they have always been very good.  We stayed here for 7 nights.  This one does not measure up.  We used the hotel for sleeping and showering.  When the hotel is full, there are not enough places to park and some of the spaces are narrow.  There is only one elevator and it is used by the hotel staff as well as the guests, always busy and slow.  The breakfast room makes the whole hotel smell, especially the elevator, where we also saw a large cockroach. Many of the breakfast items are artificial tasting, such as the eggs - really bad.  We ended up eating breakfast elsewhere.  On the positive side, the  suite is big.  The room is comfortable and clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed with my family at this hotel located near the Calafia beach. It was clean and close to the beach. Breakfast daily was great. The kids loved the pool and hot tub every night. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was really excellent from the quality of the rooms, attention of the staff, breakfast, parking... There is easy access to San Clemente without the noise associated with being too close to the beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: located close to wedding reception facility we were attending, close to ocean - nice view, close to highway; front desk staff was helpful upon leaving, the complimentary breakfast was okay.  liked the suite style living area, could have had more people in there, but did not need it.  A/C was strong, bed was nice.  A bit small overall, but very functional.
Manager Response: none

Summary: loved the hotel, room was big enough for our family liked that we had a separate room from living room. view of the ocean. the pool was steps away along with the dinning area for breakfast & an additional restroom right outside our door (which is great with kids all needing to go at the same time) we couldn't hear any noise from the outside very comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this hotel online and when I chose the day for my stay, the computer looked as if it accepted it, but when it went to the next page, it hadn't. I didn't realize that, so I ended up booking the room at 8:00p.m. for the same night I was making the reservation, which wasn't what I needed at all. When I realized this, I called the hotel and had to call back THREE different days in order to speak with a supervisor. When I did speak with the supervisor she was unwilling to change my reservation and said that unless I could prove that the computer didn't change the day, I was going to be charged for not showing up. It's ridiculous, because it's really such an easy fix; credit my card and charge it for the day I intend to stay. It would have been such an easy way to keep a
Manager Response: none

Summary: This review is a bit overdue as I was needing a room for my son and the manager was very helpful during a busy time. I was going to prepay in advance and he helped with every step to make sure the stay was hassle free. The staff were very nice and the hotel was clean. I needed to be sure I found a safe place as my son remained by himself. Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location for our business purposes was perfect.  The hotel was quiet and well appointed for the business traveler.  Within easy driving distance to the beach, restarants and the like. We would stay there again for business as well as leisure travel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spent 3 nights at this location and was a great experience! It's a 5 minute drive to the beach and some of the most amazing restaurants.Very friendly and courteous staff.   We'd been out on the road for a week and were craving Indian masala chai,we just happened to mention it and voila it was arranged by the staff.   Would highly recommend it for great service. One tip though, get s room away from the elevator, it can be a big pain at night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose to stay at this hotel with the rest of the wedding party primarily because of its location relative to Wedgewood where the wedding took place. I'm sure in the not to distant past this hotel has been extremely popular for those getting married at Wedgewood. However, time has taken its toll on this facility. Although it is not quite as worn as the travel lodge next door I would expect the quality of this Hampton much greater than that of the average travel lodge. Luckily the wedding kept most of the party busy enough that simply putting up with the smell of our room was bearable... A good updating with make this hotel worth its price. I will be sticking with the comfort inn down the street next time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay in San Clemente!! The room was very nice and comfortable. Close to the beach and to local restaurants and The Pier and Dana Pointe. Just a hop and a skip to the mountains.   The staff was very friendly. Never had a bad stay at Hampton Inns.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is terrible. The quality of this hotel is that of a motel 6. the furniture is outdated in the rooms, lobby, etcetera. the freeway noise is extremely irritating when you're trying to get a good night's sleep. What they call breakfast is disgusting. I'm pretty sure what they serve in prison is the better then what they serve here.  Also parking is ridiculous at this place. the spots are tiny probably made for Fiat. Also the rooms are moderately clean. while I was there I didn't see a roach crawling up the wall, which was very unnerving. The staff was ok. Kirsti was probably the best person we actually ran into out of anyone including the manager. I will never day at this place again. If you're in the area I would opt to not stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review mtbas. We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our usual Hamptonality and welcoming staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. We try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay as we are all about Satisfaction Guaranteed. Thank you for your feedback and recognizing Kersti in your review and we hope you will come back and stay with us again.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: There for a car show the next morning.  Underground parking was great.  Staff was excellent.  Only issue was the room was near the freeway.  Try and get a room on the back side of the hotel if you want to sleep
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Marty P. I'm so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. I hope you get to come back and stay a litlle longer.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Good value, convenient and clean. staff friendly and very close to san clemente beach.  we enjoyed our stay ... Liked the sack snack to take in the car when we left.  Had a muffin, water bottle, etc.  Would definitely come back and visit when in san clemente.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review Marjorie B. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel. I also appreciate the great comments about our friendly staff and location. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: My Stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites
Summary: The Hotel is very clean and the staff is very friendly.  All furnishings look newer and smell clean.  Staff said hello to me every morning.    Breakfast was excellent and I had much to choose from.  They have a waffle maker that was totally worth the wait.    The only part that i was not to happy about was their parking situation. It is behind the hotel and is an alley with parking stalls.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Jorge H. I am sorry to hear that you had a difficult time with the parking situation, but I am pleased that you were me with a helpful staff. I hope we were able to provide you and your family with a great stay in San Clemente. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Worst stay in a hotel ever.  I felt like I was in a motel 6 but paying for a full service.  When we arrived they granted us an early check in but the room was not cleaned thoroughly.  When we informed the team, we got an non-apathetic sorry.  Very disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Desiree W. I sincerely apologize that your stay with us did not live up to your expectations. Please feel free to contact me at johnson.menezes@hilton.com so that perhaps we can make it up to you and your family the next time you are in town.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: This hotel is perfect for a family stay near the beach.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The beach is just a short 2-5 minute drive and there are several restaurants within walking distance.  Beautiful view of the ocean from West facing rooms.
Manager Response: Thanks Lori Y for such a great review. I really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites during your recent stay. The comments about the hotel, our location and our great team are very much appreciated. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Johnson the manager is rude and disrespectful
Summary: As a guest I overheard the Manager Johnson disrespect a United States Navy vet that used to work there and he started to speak ill of both her and the navy. as a fellow veteran, I must say his lack of humility and poor business ethics were adtonishing. Talk smack about a former employee for being in the navy?  I don't know whether he's just sexist or irresponsibly ignorant, but dont disrespect men and women in uniform especially around guest, totally no class. Dont even get me started on their crappy hotel and poor rooms. Ive stayed at better motel 6's...
Manager Response: Dear Josh L,  I am deeply saddened to hear about your experience at our hotel. My team and I always strive to provide guests with a welcoming and immaculate property, and an impeccable service that guests have come to love and expect from us. To hear that we didn’t live up to those expectations is unacceptable for us and I want to encourage you to communicate to us directly what we could improve upon.  But even more importantly, I want to address the issue of you overhearing a conversation that seemingly disrespected a United States Navy vet. I apologize if you received that impression. Never would it cross my mind to disrespect a veteran of our military, or a person of any other social group for that matter, and I am distressed by the thought that my words could have given up that impression. The team and I appreciate and honor our brave men and women in uniform, and we enjoy a wonderful relationship with the active service members and veterans from our neighbors here at Camp Pendleton. I do not discriminate on anyone for gender, profession, or any other socio-demographic factor. But we are all human, and sometimes, in the heat of the moment or on a stressful day we all might have chosen some words at one point in time that could have been understandably misinterpreted without the full context. And for that, I am sorry. I will reach out to you personally as well, and until then I hope you accept my sincere apology.  Respectfully,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Can't judge a book by it's cover
Summary: This is a terrific hotel. This properties exterior curb appeal is modest. Inside you will not be disappointed. The staff is friendly and helpful. The two room suites are large, clean, modern and extremely comfortable.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel Glen L. I too am delighted that you were met with a friendly and helpful staff. We are happy to have made your stay memorable and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Stayed here for a wedding. Nice view of the ocean but a bit noisy on this side (knew this going in - thanks TA!) Good location for pier and shopping area.  Parking lot a bit tight.  Staff friendly - gave recommendation for lunch on arrival as room was not ready - made sure it was ready when we got back.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks Capt-Zip for such a nice review. I also appreciate the great comments about our friendly staff and location. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The hotel was pristine . Johnson is the general manager and he went out of his way to make sure our stay was pleasant . Everybody was kind and helpful . I do not have one negative thing to say about this hotel .
Manager Response: Thanks Laura M for the great shout outs about our customer service. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Nice Property Run by Great People
Summary: I stayed here one night for business and will return again.  They were very friendly and polite.  Check in was easy, they were expecting me and treated me as a valued customer.  My room was clean.  The hotel was easy to find and is located very close to the beach without being directly on it, which is great for someone who wants a little peace and quite also.  I ran to the beach one afternoon and it was 0.7 miles away, about 6 minutes running and probably about 15 walking.  The area is safe and the beach here is beautiful.  Much more friendly (for individuals traveling alone and for families) than some of the beaches further north.  Good restaurants within walking distance.  It is definitely worthy mentioning again that the staff is great.  Breakfast is as expected - the same as
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Kim D. I'm so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Yes you've read it right, it was 5 stars service, super outstanding care from "Magic Johnson" and his team. I was traveling on business with my team, and Johnson & his team made us feel like home. He went far and beyond to accommodate all our needs. He even dedicated a special evening reception with all kind of drinks and appetizers, we were very touched. The hotel its self is clean and is one of the old models where you have a reception/living area separate from the sleeping area, which is now missing in the new Hampton Inn & Suites. Breakfast was very good, and plenty with everyday a new style of omelette. The location is great, close to  restaurants, the beach, and close the I-5. You might be bothered by the noise from highway, but it was not a big deal since the balcony door
Manager Response: Thanks JayD2006, I'm happy you and your team had such a great stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites. Thanks for the fantastic comments about our team, the hotel and our wine hour. I hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: If your visiting camp Pendleton this a must hotel! The staff is outstanding and the location to the base is great!  The breakfast in the mornings are outstanding and better than most restraunts. The pool is clean and well taken care of. The parking for the most part is u dear the hotel with the beach across of HWY 5. The rooms are clean and updated with plenty of pillows for your comfort. The balcony are on each room as well. A must visit
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review Larkn5. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel. I also appreciate the great comments about our friendly staff, location and food. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Very friendly, helpful....courteous.   One of the nicest groups of people we've encountered.  And we travel a lot.  We had some mechanicals but the staff rose to the challenge.  Breakfast was quite good as well and the coffee actually quite good!
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review Peter A. A. I sincerely apologize for the technical glitch, but glad to hear that our team rose to the challenge Thanks for the great shout outs for our team and customer service. We look forward to seeing you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Excellent value, Conveniently located near I-5 and local beaches. Very people freindly helpful staff, including the GM, Front desk personnel as well as the Houskeeping attendants. I have spent the better part of 11 months at this Hotel (from June 2014 'til present), receiving the best guest service and people skills anyone could wish for. This Hotel treats me like family and this helps make the long stays away from home and family more palatable,
Manager Response: Wow Shawn L. Thanks so much for such a great review. We are so happy that you are back and we cannot thank you enough for your support and loyalty. Enjoy your stay!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I had a pleasant stay here. I was traveling for business and the service was great, breakfast was great and location was key and pricing is amazing for the area. I checked in on my phone and I just randomly chose a room and I was surprised for a Hampton inn that it had a separate two room with a living room. The bathroom was sub-par but nothing to complain about. Nice view of the Pacific too.
Manager Response: Thanks Savannah L for such a great review. I really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn for your business trip. The comments about the hotel, our location and our great team are very much appreciated. Yes, the views of the ocean are incredible! We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while visiting Pendleton
Summary: Cameron at the front desk is the best!   She suggested great places to eat and visit,and printed out maps to make it easier to find our way to different venues.  She made our visit so memorable.   A couple offramps away from the base.   Quiet location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review John E. It is always good to hear that we met guest’s expectations and delivered great service! As well, I am pleased to hear that Cameron was of great service. Hope to see you soon.   Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Solid, Solid Choice in San Clemente
Summary: Really can't go wrong with this Hampton in San Clemente.  Great service and access make this a great choice.  Have stayed here several times, and each time has been consistent in terms of courtesy, excellent customer service, and quality of stay.  That kind of consistency takes effort, and will stay here again.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review TonyH. I'm so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. I hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The rooms were clean and the staff was extremely friendly. We had a room that though a distance from the ocean had a great view of the sunset. We were about a mile from a very fun beach with a nice restaurant on the pier. We were also across the street from a golf course for those interested in those things. I recommend this hotel to anyone looking at it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review Patrick T. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel. I also appreciate the great comments about our friendly staff and location. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: My husband and I went out of town for a lil get away to relax and stayed at the Hampton Inn. We loved Johnson! He has such great customer service and made us feel very welcomed. First time staying here and he knew us by our names every time we saw him. Keep up the great work and thank you for being good to us. We will be back
Manager Response: Thanks DavidMelody for the great shout outs about our customer service. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Everyone was very helpful. Johnson did everything he could to make our many family members comfortable. We had many rooms for a nearby wedding. The complimentary breakfast was very nice ans there was something for everyone.
Manager Response: Thanks Cindy N for the great shout outs about our team and customer service. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Room was clean and nice, confortable beds with cable TV. Breakfast was ok, considering that in USA almost hotels isn't including in the price, is an excelent choice. Free parking for guests is available too. Swimming pool is quite small.
Manager Response: Thanks ric_fer for the great review. We really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites for your vacation. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: All staff at this location will go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable.  Hats off to the management at this Hampton Inn, truly outgoing, friendly and accommodating staff. Special check in and housekeeping requests all handled with a smile.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Margie S. I'm so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Very impressed with the staff.  Cameron and Kersti at the front desk are so friendly and welcoming.  Rosa at the breakfast area is so good at her job.  Fast and really keeps things in great shape and always wecoming.  I will stay again.  Hope they can speed up the Internet connection and make the wifi easier to log into.
Manager Response: Thanks Kevin K for the great shout outs about our team. I'm very happy they made you feel welcomed and we look forward to making you feel special again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Come on, when you stay at Hampton Inn you know exactly what you're getting. A solid drive right down the middle of the fairway. This Hampton delivers on all of those expectations, with a great view of the Pacific Ocean to boot. The staff was exceptionally nice, the breakfast was good, etc. One major caveat: This hotel is right next to the freeway, so the road noise on the freeway side was relentless. Even though you give up the ocean view from your room, I would recommend taking a room on the back side. You can walk to the beach from the hotel, but it's a long walk, beyond what most people would probably want to do. But I walked to the beach on Calafia, then down the beach to the pier, then up to downtown San Clemente and back to the hotel on El Camino Real. A long walk but a
Manager Response: Thanks WGL3, I'm really happy we were the "Solid choice in San Clemente" for you. We really appreciate sharing your expereince with the Tripadvisor community and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: From the Gen. Manager on down the staff here will help you anyway possible. You will never hear "not my job".We were part of a large family wedding party and everyone was happy. Nice breakfast and small but nice pool. Loads of food & drink in walking distance.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review 643kathleeny. I'm so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Excellent staff, hotel clean in good order but a little tired, great location to access I-5 north to LA, south to San Diego and very accessible to San Clemente shops and beach.  Sofa bed is unusable for a teenager or older.  Breakafast was varied so a very nice amenity.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Victor D. I am pleased to hear that the staff was excellent, but disappointed to hear that you had challenges with the sofa bed. I will certainly take your words into account  and see where we can improve in this matter. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We stayed one night here. Please note that though the rooms at the front have an ocean view, the hotel is not within walking distance of the water, but is in fact overlooking the highway. We were pleasantly surprised to learn that in spite of the proximity to busy Highway 5, our room on the 3rd floor was quiet. It was also very clean, the bed was comfortable.  Parking was a bit awkward, with small spaces and some very tight angles to maneuver. Breakfast was excellent: fresh fruit, cereal, yogurt, waffle machine, and all the makings for tasty breakfast burritos. If you are in San Clemente for a vacation you might want to choose a hotel that is closer to the beach and the shops, but if you just want a stopover it's absolutely fine.
Manager Response: etalius, thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel and found our suite clean and comfortable. We are happy that you enjoyed our breakfast and your kind words are greatly appreciated. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I have so many nice things to say about my recent stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites San Clemente. I traveled with some girlfriends to celebrate spring break and my birthday, and his clean, lovely hotel made us feel more than welcome. They delivered a birthday cupcake up to our room after our first night and champagne on our second to last night, since my birthday was at the beginning of the week and my friend's was toward the end. They completely went above and beyond to make sure we had a pleasant stay, and we couldn't have been happier! They were so accommodating and always asked us how our night was and if we needed anything at all. We were provided with fresh towels and amenities daily and always greeted by a friendly staff member. Free breakfast was always a plus, and even
Manager Response: Thanks Jacqui D for such a great review. I really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites for your vacation. The comments about the hotel, our location and our great team, especially Kirsten are very much appreciated. We hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I can't top the many good reviews of this excellent Hilton property, so I'll just pass along a couple of tips. The front of the hotel faces the very busy State Highway 5. Unless you prefer the "white noise" of a room facing this 24-7 highway, ask for a room on the back side of the hotel. My room faced the golf course next door and came with a small balcony. The suites are larger than most Hiltons. The entrance to the hotel lobby for check-in is via the basement, where you can check in and unload your gear close to the elevator. Staff is as friendly and helpful as advertised. Oh, about that free daily paper...it's only available on Monday and Friday. Come on guys, the news happens daily!
Manager Response: JudgePeters, thanks for the great shout outs for our team and customer service. We sincerely apologize that you were misinformed about our complimentary newspaper being available only  Mondays and Fridays, as it is available Monday through Friday. We hope this minor hiccup will not deter you from returning to our hotel. We look forward to seeing you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Clean, spacious rooms, view of the ocean from the room. The staff is wonderful, they are very friendly and helpful and make the stay extra special. The breakfast buffet is included and changes daily. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review Martin R. We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel. I also appreciate the great comments about our friendly staff, location and food. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: A friend & I desperately needed a getaway close to home & I had some Hilton Honors points to use. I am a hotel snob & usually stay at higher end properties, but this was in an area we wanted to stay, and the reviews were all positive, so I decided to give it a try. From the first phone call throughout our entire stay, the staff was incredibly helpful & friendly. Kellie went above & beyond to make our stay especially wonderful. I was blown away by all she did for us! I will definitely be back in the future & cannot recommend this property enough if you are in Southern OC.
Manager Response: Thanks naraca for the great shout outs about our customer service. I am happy to hear that Kellie was outstanding and provided great service. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: My family & I drove up from San Diego for the weekend. It was a great in between spot from SD to Anaheim. We spent part of the day at the beach & drove into San Clemente for dinner. The hotel isnt totally conducive to walking into "town". We picked up a few items from the grocery store which we were able to store in our refrigerator in the room. That was a nice plus with a 5 year old. We enjoyed the hot tub & pool for an evening swim. The 2nd day we drove up to Knotts Berry Farm for the day & back into San Clemente for the evening. Over all we would stay again. It provides adequate space & clean Accomodations. No problems parking & the free breakfast is always a plus.
Manager Response: Thanks Babycakesk for such a great review. I really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites for your staycation. The comments about the accomodations, parking and our complimentary breakfast are very much appreciated. We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: This was a quick overnight stay. The hotel is clean and the staff awesome. I had driven 3 hours to get to the hotel and needed a pick me up upon arrival and they had comp coffee right in the lobby waiting for me. In the afternoon they put out cookies as well, nice touch.  Johnson was helpful with a 3rd room we did not need at the last minute due to an illness, he graciously cancelled the room. Nila checked me in at the front desk and another kind person whose name I did not catch was, well, very sweet.   For a reasonably priced chain hotel in a good location in the city they get 5 stars from me. I stayed in a room at the back of the hotel overlooking the golf course. As some have stated the front faces the highway and is noisier (although you do see some ocean).
Manager Response: Thanks Summit4321 for such a nice review. I am happy to hear that Nila was very helpful and sweet. We, at the Hampton Inn, strive to provide an atmosphere of warmth and welcome.  I appreciate you taking the time to give your positive comments about our staff and hotel.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: This hotel is clean, with a view of the ocean in the distance, ample parking, and provides a good value overall with the included breakfast.  However, the internet was embarrassingly slow.  Please upgrade it Hampton!
Manager Response: Brandon S, Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us at our hotel; your comments are appreciated. I apologize that the internet access was of concern. We have contacted our internet provider to troubleshoot any problems, in order to offer better service in the future.   We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: What an amazing stay. Can't wait to go back and visit. Great staff and amazing amenities. Close to everything and was a great location for all of our travel needs. Hope all the great staff is there when i visit again they really made me feel right at home. Thank you again to each and every one of them.
Manager Response: Thanks Gail S for the great shout outs about our staff, location and amenities. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I was relocating to US this year and I needed some temporary housing. I chosen that hotel. It was one of the best decision I did in that relocation process. The hotel is great for such relocators who look for friendly place to stay little bit longer than just one night. The staff is super friendly, very kind and I really felt there like in home. We stayed there 70+ nights and every single day we felt there good. I highly recommend that hotel for all longer stays when you need some sort of privacy and some extra level of friendliness of the people that are surrounding you. All my friends that will visit Southern Orange County will be sent by me there as #1 location.
Manager Response: Wow maciej2015PL.  I'm glad you and your family had such a great stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites. Thanks for the fantastic comments on our staff and the hotel. We are happy to have made your stay memorable and be your #1 Choice in San Clemente! We hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The hotel was very clean, the staff was very friendly.  The free breakfast was good, and free WiFi and parking are always a good thing.  Good location, not walking distance to any beaches, so you will have to drive, but easy on and off access the the freeway.  The only issue I had was the noise level.  The walls seemed very thin, and it was kind of loud in the room from noise in other rooms, and outside noise from the pool.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review adam g. Thank you for recognizing that we are a clean hotel.  We take great pride in our efforts to make a guest feel at home.  Like you, we truly value cleanliness. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I was looking for a hotel close to the beach in San Clemente. I read the reviews for Hampton Inn and Suites and booked a room with my daughter and another for my parents who were visiting from out of state. I am so so happy we booked rooms here! We love this hotel. It was very easy to find off the 5. Parking was located under the hotel with many spots available. The front desk was right near the parking garage with very quick and personable service. I had mentioned my parents were celebrating their 48 wedding anniversary at booking  and their room was upgraded to an ocean view and they were given a bottle of wine to enjoy. Johnson and Nylia could not have been more friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean and large. My daughter loved the pool and we all liked the touch of
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review crita28. I am happy that we were able to give you, your daughter and parents a wonderful stay and a personal touch from Nylia.  We look forward to your visit in the future and promise to do everything we can to make your next stay just as special.  Sincerely!  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I tried to find something wrong with this place.  It is fairly small and simple but everything was just right.  The guy checking us in was friendly and greeted us warmly.  The suite we were given had an ocean view and the bed was comfortable.  The breakfast room was a little small, but the property isn't big so most times it is probably very adequate.  I think they had a full house the night we were there so it was a little crowded the  next morning.  It was fine, however, and the food was good.  Would definitely stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review judatt “A Nice Place” is what we like to hear from our guests.  Also, I will pass along your compliments about our food to my breakfast team. They work hard to make your morning a good start to a great day!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The rooms are spacious with a separate living and bedroom, but they are dark, dreary and look very dated.  The air conditioner sounds like an airplane taking off, so is very annoying.  There is a "balcony", but there is not room for a chair or table to sit out and enjoy the traffic going by on I-5.  We had reservations for 3 nights.  The second day, I do not think housekeeping intended to clean our room.  I had to hunt them down and I asked if our room was next. She looked at schedule and looked puzzled.  But they finally came at 1:45 pm.  The worse irritation was the electricity.  Some areas kept going on and off.  While I was trying to do laundry in the coin op washer the electric went off in the laundry area, so had to make extra trips up and down an extremely slow elevator
Manager Response: Thank you for your review timesharetraveler11. I sincerely apologize that your stay with us did not live up to your expectations. Please feel free to contact me at johnson.menezes@hilton.com so that perhaps we can make it up to you and your family the next time you are in town.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The nicest Hampton Inn I have stayed at. Staff are super friendly and thoughtful. It was our 20th wedding anniversary, they brought a bottle of champagne to our room! Room was clean and spacious. Our room did face freeway, was noisy when the sliding door was open, the fresh air was great though. When door was closed freeway noise was barely noticeable.
Manager Response: Thanks Jacrussel for such a nice review. It is always good to hear that we met guest’s expectations and delivered great service! It was our pleasure to have helped make this special day a success for you and your wife. We look forward to your return.  Happy Anniversary!  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Great location, friendly desk staff, desk staff should be a little more knowledgeable about the local area - barber shops and restaurants, breakfast OK, breakfast staff below average, rooms clean and nice, a little expensive, close exit & entrance to the 5 FWY.
Manager Response: Thanks Jeremiah D, I'm really happy we were the perfect location for you. I sincerely apologize for some of the challenges you experienced and I hope this will not deter you from returning to our beautiful hotel. We appreciate your positive review.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: If you are staying for a night its fine. The staff is the true standout here. Polite, and pleasant they are a delight. The rooms are fine with comfortable beds. The biggest con here is the noise.   We had a suite that faced the highway. You could still hear the sounds of the cars passing by on the freeway. Thankfully I always travel with earplugs which helped to muffle the sounds further.   I would go with a room that faces away from the hwy despite losing out on the view of the ocean if you are sensitive to noise.  Since we decided to check out early we grabbed a breakfast to go which contained a piece of fruit, muffin, bottled water and a cereal bar.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Fula97. I am sorry to hear that you had a difficult time with the noise from the freeway, but I am pleased that you were met with a "Top Notch Staff". I hope we were able to provide you and your family with a great stay in San Clemente.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We drove to CA from IA with the intention of camping at Doheny State Park.  The day we arrived it was 91 and we decided to spend the night at a hotel instead.  When we arrived at the Hampton we were so impressed by how friendly the staff was, how comfortable the room was, and how great the breakfast was that we ditched our camping plans and just stayed at the Hampton.  We would HIGHLY recommend it!
Manager Response: Heather F, We are glad you and your family had such a great stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites. Thanks for the fantastic comments on our staff, the hotel and our breakfast. We hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I stopped here on my way back from L.A. to break up a long work day and driving. The room they had for me was a corner king room suite on the 3rd floor. But unfortunately it looked right onto the Interstate 5. And I mean right onto it.  I'm not a fan of roadside inns at all, because I never sleep well with the constant highway noise. So it was either that or a middle floor queen room on the other side. I actually ended up throwing the mattress of the couch sleeper on the floor (more comfortable), grabbed the blanket off the bed, closed the door to the bedroom (to block out traffic noise), and slept pretty well.  Anyway, the room was decent, clean and there was a little sink, fridge and microwave in the front room with couch and TV. I didn't care for the auto-sensor for the
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review forzuto13. I am pleased to hear that the Kersti was helpful and accommodating, but disappointed to hear that you did not sleep in our comfortable beds due to the freeway noise. I will certainly take your review into account  and see where we can improve in this matter. Please feel free to contact me at  johnson.menezes@hilton.com so that perhaps we can make it up to you the next time you are in town.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The manager was very helpful, front office staff  efficient and helpful. Lobby clean and attractive. Beds very clean and comfortable. Loved the breakfast, a lot of variety. All staff very helpful, friendly.
Manager Response: Wow Christine H. Thanks so much for such a great review and recognizing that we are a clean and comfortable  hotel.  We take great pride in our efforts to make a guest feel at home.  Like you, we truly value cleanliness and comfortability.  We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: This hotel is in a great location in San Clemente minutes from downtown. Definitely get a room on the ocean side the sun set view is spectacular . The front desk staff are the best . The comp breakfast was better than most. It is right off Highway 5. Many restaurants in the area  within walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you for such a nice review Bridgetpianos. We cannot thank you enough for recognizing our staff inyour review. Yes, the views of the ocean are incredible! Please come back soon for more!   Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Convenient for events, older structure in typical run-down area of town, amazing hotel breakfast, outstanding hotel staff, and the banquet room accommodations are good but became magical due to the bride's decor!
Manager Response: Thanks NewCarOwner for such a great review. I really appreciate you staying with us. The comments about the hotel breakfast and our great team are very much appreciated. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Without a doubt, our best hotel stay.
Summary: We chose the Hampton based on the reviews, and completely agree with all of the positives. Our stay was 6 days long and throughout that time we were impressed by the management and staff... so courteous, helpful, and kind. My husband travels extensively for work and made the comment that this was the best hotel staff he'd ever met. Makes for a good overall vibe. I noticed that the manager, Johnson, went out of his way to serve and connect with every guest, even our 2 yr old. His leadership is reflected in his staff's ethic and attitude. As for the accommodations, super clean and comfortable. Beds and pillows were amazing. Blackout drapes were helpful. Plenty of space for 5 in the double room. Shower had good water pressure. Great, great complimentary breakfast. Plenty of towels
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review TravellinPacks. I'm so happy you and your family had an amazing stay with us. It was truly an honor to receive the gentle high fives from your kids, especially your two year old. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: AWESOME breakfast. great location. walking distance to multiple bars. right next to the Wedgewood wedding venue. Pillows were so comfy! king size bed was also comfy. large suite room - plenty of space to relax and get ready for the wedding.
Manager Response: Thanks Janel S for the great shout outs about our suite and location. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: This is one of the best managed & operated hotels we have stayed in during our travels.  Everyone provided very professional and courteous service throughout our stay and the rooms were very clean.  Norm & Carolyn
Manager Response: Wow Norm & Carolyn. Thanks so much for such a great review. I'm so happy that you found the Hampton Inn & Suites luxurious with a smile. That is exactly what we strive for, freindly, authentic, caring and thoughtful. We hope to see you soon!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: great hotel and friendly staff in San Clemente
Summary: We had water damage to our house and had to move out.  The insurance company chose Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente, which is close to our house.  It was a very nice hotel and our room had a better ocean view than our house does!  The best part, however, was the obviously friendly and helpful staff.  We stayed 11 days there and after a few days I was greeted by name by several of the front desk employees.  Breakfast was very good and I especially want to mention that friendly smile and helpful nature of Rosa, who worked in the breakfast room.  All in all, a good choice for anyone visiting South Orange County!
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Wayne S. It is always good to hear that we met  a guest’s expectations and delivered great service! Thank you for your positive review and for recognizing our stellar team, especially Rosa. We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: stayed at this hotel for a friends wedding. the rooms were very clean. I like the fact that the suite was separated by a door that separates the bedroom from the bathroom and sitting area. Location was great!
Manager Response: Thanks Carmen J for the great review. We are glad you loved the hotel, and our location. We hope you're able to return soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: One of the friendliest and most professional staff's I've encountered in my travels. Great smiles and they went the extra mile to ensure we had a great visit to San Clemente. Good location and a nice stay.
Manager Response: Thanks Jr 1 B for such a great review. I too am delighted that you were met with a “friendly and professional staff.” We are happy to have made your stay memorable and be your #1 Choice in San Clemente! We look forward for your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Stayed here for a wedding weekend. Like other reviews have said, the hotel is right on a main street, but I had a room facing the back so it wasn't too loud. The breakfast area was a bit small and can get very busy especially on a weekend stay. The parking lot is a little too tight if you have a truck or SUV. Great place for a weekend stay.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review sixoclocksaint. We are so happy you had a great stay with us. with us and hopefully the challenges that you encountered during your stay will not deter you from returning to our beautiful hotel. We look forward for your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel. The hotel itself is exceptional and the staff was amazing. We had a view of the ocean from our rooms. The breakfast was very good and the staff there very helpful. My sister-in-law and me were there for a wedding in San Clemente and the location was absolutely perfect for us.
Manager Response: Thanks Virginia T, I'm really happy we were the perfect location for you. The comments about the hotel, our location and our great team are very much appreciated. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: If noise is an issue don't stay in this hotel, especially in one of the front facing rooms. Sounds and feels like I-5 runs directly through your room, which is about what it does given its close proximity.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Danny W. I sincerely apologize that your stay with us did not live up to your expectations.   Please feel free to contact me at johnson.menezes@hilton.com so that perhaps we can accomodate you on the golf course side for your future stays.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The hotel manager, Johnson Menezes, was extraordinary. His personal attention to our family was superlative. He made us feel as if we were being welcomed into his own home. His supportive staff, especially Nila, went out of their way as well, to shower us with friendly attention.
Manager Response: Thanks Jeffrey A for such a great review. “ Extra-Ordinary" is what we like to hear from our guests.  Also, I will pass along your compliments to Nila for being so attentive and helpful to all of you. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Always a good stay in San Clemente
Summary: Great for visiting families or a local couples getaway.  We've been staying at the Hampton San Clemente for years and have never had a complaint.  Rooms are super clean and the linen is fresh and soft.  Walking distance to OC Tavern for good food and drinks before turning in to a soft mattress and a movie in bed.
Manager Response: Thanks Matthew W, We are so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. I hope you get to come back and dine in OC Tavern and we thank you for your support and loyalty!   Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes  .

Summary Heading: Great Spot to Stay for Work, Beach and Golf !
Summary: I am the Golf Pro at the San Clemente Municipal Golf Course, located behind the Hampton Inn. My FootJoy Sales Rep/Friend ~ stays there, when he is in town from Palm Desert. His last stay was December 2014. My wife and I walked over to make the reservation for him.  We were immediately greeted by Johnson, the Manager and made to feel very welcome ! He introduced us to the friendly staff and showed us around.  My wife commented on how bright and clean the hotel was. She even noticed that the parking garage was spotless. We later asked our friend, how his stay was.  He said that he'd stay at the Hampton again in a heartbeat. In thanking us, he mentioned that the room was comfortable, breakfast was excellent and the location was perfect for work or play. And, he'll be back to stay
Manager Response: Wow Kitty C and Dave Cook. Thanks so much for such a great review. We are so happy that you found the Hampton Inn & Suites clean and welcoming. That is exactly what we strive for, friendly, authentic, caring and thoughtful. We welcome you, your family and friends anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The staff was very nice and helpful. They recommended a great local restaurant that was just a couple minutes’ walk from the hotel. The room was clean and well stocked. Even on the first floor I could barely hear the freeway. The breakfast offered a variety of choices of food and drink.
Manager Response: Thanks Jennifer R for the great shout outs about our hotel. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We were in town for a wedding, and the room was perfect.  It had a separate bedroom for me (I like to sleep in) and a living room for my early rising hubby. He also enjoyed the complementary breakfast. The hotel is located right next to a busy freeway, but as long as the windows were closed it was quiet enough. It was clean and the staff was very attentive. I would return.
Manager Response: Thank you Mary C for such a great review. I'm so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel.  We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We  stayed just one night here, but loved it! The rooms are fantastic, large and comfortable. The beds were cozy and just perfect. The best part of this stay was the front desk hostess, Cameron. She took time to handle our questions, offer suggestions and give directions to where we needed to go. Breakfast was great too! This is close to Camp Pendleton, School of Infantry gate. Wonderful hotel!!
Manager Response: Thanks tjk90 for such a great review. I am happy that we were able to give you a wonderful stay and a personal touch from Cameron. We look forward to your visit in the future and promise to do everything we can to make your next stay just as special.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I stay at this hotel twice and both times we're  excellent front desk was very polite  I had a ocean view  Was gorgeous  well set up in the rooms very clean felt very comfortable .I can redeem  for any  one to stay there with family  or just to get away  I would difficult  stay again .
Manager Response: Thanks Julie S for the great review. It is lovely to know that we provided you with a lovely stay here in beautiful San Clemente!  We take great pride in our efforts to make a guest feel at home.  Like you, we truly value cleanliness and comfortability. We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Thank you to Johnson, the manager and Kersti the front desk hostess.  What a lovely staff, so accommodating and friendly! The room was spacious, comfortable & clean. We were a large wedding party & everything we needed was right there! The bed was surprisingly comfy & there was plenty of space in the room to host our impromptu get-together's.  I would recommend this hotel highly.  The price is very reasonable and even includes a buffet breakfast. I'd recommend asking for a room facing the golf course.  It stays pretty quiet on this side of the hotel.  All in all, a great hotel run by a very professional staff.
Manager Response: Wow sasloane. Thanks so much for such a great review. We, at the Hampton Inn, strive to provide an atmosphere of warmth and welcome.  I appreciate you taking the time to give your positive comments about Kersti, our team and hotel. It was our pleasure to have helped make this special day a success for your family and friends.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Best hotel and can't wait to go back
Summary: Loved our stay. The hotel was clean, breakfast was great, the beds were comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. We had no complaints while we were there and there is no question that when we are in the area again, this is the place we will stay. It was a short drive to the pier which we loved. The lady who ran the breakfast room was awesome. We just can't say enough...loved it!!!
Manager Response: We really appreciate your five star review Robert V . I'm glad you and your family had such a great stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites. Thanks for the fantastic comments on our team,  the hotel and our breakfast. I hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary Heading: I felt like the most important person in the hotel.
Summary: They really understand service. They are newly remodeled and have a great feel. Nila at the front desk was particularly helpful, whether I needed a password or to extend my stay she knew before I asked. Johnson, the manager, met my in the morning during breakfast just to say good morning. What a great experience during a difficult time.
Manager Response: Thanks Robert M for the great shout outs about our customer service. I am glad that Nila was very helpful and that we were very caring and comforting during your stay. We hope you're able to come back and see us soon.   Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We had an ocean view room, and that means our room looked over the freeway to the ocean. Our room had 2 queen beds and a sofa bed, and was very comfortable, but a white cloth rubbed over the carpeting turned black: yuck! Shockingly Filthy!!!  The staff were really friendly and Nadra at the breakfast was super helpful and highly attentive!  The hotel is in a great location, just a short distance from Trestles Beach for surfing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback AW1008. We are glad you chose our hotel during your recent stay in the area and we apologize for your experience. Unclean rooms are not typical at our hotel and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. The comments about our location and our great team especially Nadra are very much appreciated.  We look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Epi at the front desk was professional, helpful, and caring with a genuinely cheerful attitude. Nadra, the kitchen attendant went above and beyond to make sure our breakfast was special. All staff members that we encountered seemed dedicated to customer satisfaction.
Manager Response: Thanks Michael C for such a great review. I really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites for your birthday. The comments about Nadra, Epi and our great team are very much appreciated. We hope to see you soon before your next birthday.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: They make you feel right at home. Very helpful with restaurants in the area, as well as where to go to take in the sites. If you're lucky enough you will be helped by Kersti.
