Great smile, great attitude and very personable. We'll be back again look forward to staying at the Hampton Inn again. A very wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Thanks La Shawn R for such a nice review. We are happy that you had a wonderful home away from home experience. As well, I am delighted to hear that Kersti was of great service. We look forward to your visit in the future and promise to do everything we can to make your next stay just as special.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: Nice hotel and a good value for the money.  Beautiful view of the ocean.  Very spacious suite. Yummy breakfast.  Extremely clean too.  Staff was very helpful.  Easy access to freeway or coast highway. We were able to get a last minute reservation on New Year's Eve and yet the price was affordable. Wanted to take advantage of the Jacuzzi, but ran out of time.
Manager Response: Dear Debra B,  It is always good to hear that we met  a guest’s expectations and delivered great service! Thank you for your positive review. Yes, the views of the ocean are incredible! Please come back soon for more!  Happy New Year!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: This hotel is very good.  The rooms are all suites and are clean and comfortable.  The location is good especially if  you spend time at San Onofre.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  They even called me once to tell me that I left the headlights on while the car was parked in the garage!  Free breakfast was good and the afternoon cookies too!  I will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks eddiesNYC for such a nice review. I am glad that you found our suite to be clean, comfortable and that our team was helpful. Your kind words are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you soon.  Happy New Year!  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: Came to San Clemente for Christmas with family. Upon arriving Johnson Menezes the General Manager greeted our family and welcomed us like we were family. Our stay was comfortable and they were very helpful and very courteous. The complimentary breakfast was delicious and filling. Coffee was always available and fresh. Definitely going to stay there again.
Manager Response: Wow Stephanie D. Thanks so much for such a great review. We are so happy that you found the Hampton Inn & Suites comfortable and clean. That is exactly what we strive for, fun, authentic, caring and thoughtful. Hamptonality at its best. We welcome you back anytime!  Happy New Year!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Hampton Inn San Clemente is Fabulous
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Hampton Inn San Clemente on December 20, 2014. We are Hilton Honors members, and we have come to expect great things from Hilton; the Hampton Inn did not disappoint. The suite set up was great! My husband likes to watch TV at night after I turn in, so we were both happy there was a separate living area. The breakfast was exceptional and the staff very friendly. Would highly recommend
Manager Response: Thanks T4926IBsusanr for such a great review. We are happy you and your husband had such a great stay at the " Fabulous Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente". Thanks for the fantastic comments on our staff, the hotel and our complimentary breakfast. We hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Happy Holidays!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: As  usual whenever we stay at a Hampton Inn we leave satisfied with the accommodations and service.  We keep coming back to their hotels in various cities. Recommend it to all who want a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thanks Magnolia V, I'm really happy we were the perfect location for you. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Happy Holidays!  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Mike B......Clean and Convienent Location to enjoy Southern California
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the hotel from 12-11-14 thru 12-16-14. We were in the area for a wedding at Camp Pendelton. We commuted daily to the Oceanside area and to the Anaheim area twice. The location is perfect, 30 minutes either direction. Two room suites I think is what the hotel offers exclusively, ours had an Ocean view. The room was large with a sitting area, 2 flat screen T.V.'s. Very quiet even though the 5 freeway is right there. Easy to find and get to from the north or south. The General Manager and his staff are accommodating, friendly and more than willing to help you enjoy Southern California with great advise on dinning and attractions. The very kind and friendly breakfast staff meet you with a smile and a great breakfast. She will even make the waffle for you! The
Manager Response: Michael B,  I cannot thank you enough for your fabulous review of not only The Hampton Inn at San Clemente, but Southern California as well! The comments about the hotel, our location and our great team are very much appreciated. We welcome you back anytime!  Happy Holidays!  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The check in and check out staff were friendly and helpful.  The room was as clean as it could be.  Furnishings were very old and a handwritten note on a yellow sticky note were placed on each headboard that fresh linens were on the bed.  I think the sticky notes were probably placed there to deter a phone call because if not you couldn't tell the linens were fresh because they were beyond needing replaced.  There was a very musty smell and the furniture was very dated.  However, I did go to get breakfast determined I'd only get pre-packaged food - yogurt or a banana but surprisingly when I went to the breakfast buffet it was extremely clean, organized and well prepared.  I ate from the buffet and it was very good.
Manager Response: Elizabeth S,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues with your room during your stay. As per the brand standards, we are required to display the pre-printed yellow sticky notes on every headboard. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Happy Holidays!  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Great Staff and Services, but noisy from traffic
Summary: We were driving through the area and just needed a place to sleep. We stay at Hampton Inns a lot. We were very pleased with our room and the staff. However, be sure to ask for a room on the side of the building away from the freeway (I-5). The traffic goes all night!
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Edward A. I am sorry to hear that you had a room facing the freeway, but I am happy that you liked our staff and amenities in the room. We hope to see you soon and we assure you a room with golf course view.  Happy Holidays!  Johnson Menezes

Summary: A very pleasant experience from beginning to end.  Any problem was resolved super quick! The breakfast staff made me a waffle and even delivered it to the table. Carts for luggage were always easily available.  Room access from the lobby was fast and easy.  The two rooms were a help in organizing things.  Overall, the best hotel experience I have had in a long time.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Terry H. I'm so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel.   We look forward to your return.  Happy Holidays!  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised that the staff was able to provide a lovely suite even though we arrived a couple of hours earlier than normal check in. Our room was clean, quiet  and spacious, and there was even an extra luggage rack!  We appreciated the door between the living room and bedroom which provided privacy, and the lovely balcony overlooking the golf course. Location was nice; there are a few restaurants within walking distance, and the town and pier were just a short drive away. Would definitely stay here again, it is well worth the price.
Manager Response: Thanks luciNY for such a great review. We are happy that we met up to your standards. We, at the Hampton Inn & Suites, strive to provide an atmosphere of warmth and welcome.  I appreciate you taking the time to give your positive comments about our staff and hotel.  Happy Holidays!  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Let's be clear - this hotel is no where near the beach. It is near I-5 on the old U.S. 101. Not fancy, not a resort, not a great place for a long-term stay. But, nice enough and easy on/off the freeway. Lots of parking under the hotel or in back. Walk to a few restaurants. Most of the hotels in San Clemente are also on this street and their names imply they are near the shore - they are not. You will need to drive the shore. Also beware of anything that says ocean view - the ocean is more than a mile away and you would be looking over the freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you AZRanger for your honest review. We are happy to hear that you were pleased with the easy access to our property and the amenities and services provided, I do however regret to read that our location did not meet your expectations. We will be sure to review all online channels and communications to be sure we paint the correct picture of our location as a hotel that is within walking distance of the beach, but indeed not immediately on the beach. We sincerely apologize if that was the impression you got when making your reservation. We hope to be able to welcome you again the next time you are in the area, and wish you and your family a Happy Holidays.   Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: My family stayed for 5 nights in early October. Working in the hospitality industry, and having recently stayed in many above average hotels on our cross-country road trip, I was, at first, a bit disappointed with this hotel. Soon, however, I was won over! If you stay here, prepare yourself for a strange underground entrance and a pool that sits in the very cramped parking lot. But if you judge this hotel by those features, you'll be missing the quiet location, the freeway convenience, the lovely outdoor space with a pool that is just the perfect temperature and a staff that is helpful, friendly and a pleasure to spend time with. Our room was at the back of the hotel, so while we over-looked a parking lot/alleyway, we also had a view of the golf course. One evening, we were
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Traycee W. We are so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. We hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Happy Holidays!  Team Hampton

Summary: This is a wonderful spot for any occasion.  It is close to the beach and San Clemente Pier. Also close to great shops and restaurants. It was a wonderful central location for vacation and business travel.
Manager Response: Thanks J2500EEelizabethp, We are really happy that Hampton Inn & Suites was the perfect location for you. It sounds like you got to experience the best of San Clemente.   We hope to see you soon.  Happy Holidays!  Team Hampton

Summary Heading: Love this Hotel Great for families
Summary: I have three kids and sharing a bed with them is difficult, yet here they have a pull out bed that can fit 2 kids! Love the space and that each room has 2 T.V's as well! Have been staying at this hotel since 2007!
Manager Response: Thanks so much Bernard B for such a great review. We are so happy that you found the Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente spacious and luxurious. We greatly appreciate your continued support and we welcome you back anytime.  Happy Holidays!  Sincerely,  Team Hampton

Summary: The front desk lady (sorry, don't remember the name. Short hair, from Eastern Europe) was so helpful. In fact, every staff person I encountered was friendly and accommodating. The breakfast was what you'd expect from a hotel (waffles, eggs, etc.) The rooms were just as expected. If we ever go to San Clemente again, we will stay in this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks cyn2425 for the great review. So glad to hear you will be coming back to our hotel. As well, I am pleased to hear that Kersti and our team were helpful, friendly and accomodating.   Hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I have been frequenting this hotel monthly since June 2014, staying anywhere between 10 to 30 days at a time, and no matter the duration, I have always been treated like family.The staff attitude and demeanor is always the same... pleasant, positive, welcoming and attentive. Customer service showed a genuine friendliness, care and level of compassion that is rare in customer service these days.The rooms (mini suites) are clean and spacious with a separate sleeping and  living areas. The hot breakfast is good and the mid-week happy hour (complimentary beer, wine and light snacks) is a great bonus. I highly recommend this Hotel to anyone who visits the San Clemente area whether for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Wow Shawn L. Thanks so much for such a great review. It is truly an honor to recognize our hotel as "Home away from Home" from a seasoned traveler and a loyal Hilton Honors member like you. It is great that you value our consistent performance and thank you for sharing with the Tripadvisor community.   We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: My husband and I planned a very last-minute trip to the beach for my mom's 80th birthday; keeping our fingers crossed for a room with an ocean view. Not only did they come through with an ocean view, but Johnson Menezes the general manager went out of his way to make my mom feel special. Complimentary champagne, chocolates and a hand-written birthday card were waiting for her in the room. At every opportunity, he extended birthday well wishes and checked to make sure everything was to her satisfaction. And it didn't stop with Johnson--all the staff seems to have customer service as their top priority.  My husband and I were concerned about the noise from the road that might accompany the ocean view, but were pleasantly surprised to find that we did not hear the traffic at all
Manager Response: Thanks Maria L for such a great review. We really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente for your mom's birthday. We are all very honored that you gave us the opportunity to make it a very memorable stay for all of you. The comments about the hotel, our location and our great team are very much appreciated.  We look forward to your return.  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Good location, close to all ,rooms are well appointed and  comfortable. If you are a light sleeper request an even  numbered room they are east facing away from the freeway odd numbered facing the freeway(a little noisy but not bad). Overall this hotel represents the quality and service one would expect from the Hampton brand.
Manager Response: We really appreicate your review George P. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a business trip.  The location is pleasant.  The rooms are clean and spacious with a separate living room. The hot breakfast was good and the mid-week happy hour (complimentary beer, wine and light snacks) was a great bonus.  The thing that blew us away was the staff customer service and particularly the general manager, Johnson.  We had the pleasure of meeting him during the mid-week happy hour.  He took the time to speak to all the guests, served the guests and showed a genuine care and level of compassion that is rare in customer service nowadays.  In our conversation with Johnson, he found out that my husband and I were married earlier in the month and though this was a business trip for us, Johnson went over and beyond to congratulate us
Manager Response: Thanks Aisha A for the great shout outs about our customer service. We are so happy you had a A+ stay and we hope to see you again soon.  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I am a Hampton fan and this property was the best I have ever stayed at. The manager and staff are all top notch and very concerned that your stay is the best it can be. Great rooms and a great location. World class!
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review jamesaZ4374NI. We are so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel.  We hope to see you soon.  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: My experience at The Hampton Inn
Summary: Very surprised with the amount of food that was offered for breakfast and it was all very delicious. The staff were friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family. The front desk also called me by name which was nice that they remembered me.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Angela F. We are so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel.   We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Everything about my stay was positive, from the staff to the amentities, to the cleanliness.  Everyone was polite, more than happy to help.  There was a power outage during my stay, it affected the motel, but it did not originate at the motel.  The food was excellent, room service was very prompt.  The location couldn't have been better.  Right across the street from John Wayne airport, and a shuttle to take you back and forth.  It was well appreciated.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family of 7 recently stayed here and never had we had an experience like this.  We met an employee during breakfast.  He was kind, genuine, cleaning tables and clearing dishes.  He was genuinely interested in us and our stay.  Come to find out, he was the general manager.  He was so attentive to us and the rest of the staff as well.  They were all so amazing. The breakfast food was awesome.  Way better than any free breakfast we have had.  By far one of the favorites for the kids. Johnson, the manager, heard it was our sons birthday during our stay and on the day of his birthday we got a knock on the door and there he was with many of the staff with a cake singing happy birthday.  Who does that?  It made our sons day, we were all so impressed.   Johnson met us every morning
Manager Response: Thanks Ben B for such a great review. I am so happy you had a great stay and our staff made it extra special for your family.  We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Location is not ideal but its pretty good for what you pay.  You could stay on the beach but prepare to pay much more.  This offers a spacious room with everything you need, a seperate living room area and a hot breakfast that was great.  Request golf side for a quieter experience.  We would stay there again in a heartbeat.  Friendly staff and fresh baked cookies were a great treat.
Manager Response: Thanks Sean K for the nice review. I'm sorry our location disappointed you but very happy you enjoyed your stay. We really appreciate the nice comments. We welcome you back anytime.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: I visited the hotel on 9/17/14 and received great customer service from the front desk person, Nila.  I called the day before to let her know that I would be in very late and wanted to change the room from two double beds to one king size, which she accommodated without hesitation.  When I arrived at the hotel at midnight the room that was given to me was a king suite without costing extra.    I received prompt front desk service at check in and the room was very spacious with a balcony; and from the balcony there was a view of the nice gold course.    The room was clean and all the amenities were well stocked.    Even though the room was very close to the elevator there was no noise, and it was very quiet.   The room was well insulated, which helped with a good night’s rest.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Eureka92014. We are so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about Nila's helpfulness and customer service.   We look forward for your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: I was very happy with the room size, cleanliness and comfort of our room.  The lobby is welcoming and staff was helpful.  Very close proximity to the ocean.  Coffee and breakfast was included and had good variety of food.
Manager Response: Thanks Ernest B for such a great review. I'm so happy you loved our location, our amazing staff and the hotel. I hope you get to come back soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Located close to the beach.  Had excellent complimentary breakfast.  We attended a wedding at the municipal golf course which was in walking distance.  The pool and spa were small but the water temperatures were perfect.  They were also handicap accessible.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, but watch the cancellation fee
Summary: The room was a suite with a great view looking toward ocean, however, you also looked and heard interstate 5 which was right in front of you. The rooms were good, the staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast was very good. The only negative's was the freeway noise late at night, the hotel is about a mile from the San Clemente village area, and the cancelation fee. They require a 48 hour cancelation notice. In my case I reserved 2 rooms because my son was going to join us at the hotel. My son was ill the morning of our check in day. I called the hotel and tried to cancel one room. They told me about the cancellation charge. After I arrived at the hotel I talked to the manager and negotiated paying half of the first days charge. It cost me $96 dollars for the cancelation even
Manager Response: none

Summary: As a diamond hilton honors member I decided to stay here for a business trip last week. The hotel was dated. I'm not one who likes a suite and doesn't need the suite room. The bedroom was very small and cramped. The internet did not work in my room which was highly inconvenient. The breakfast was what you would expect from a hampton. The front desk team was very helpful and friendly
Manager Response: Dera Leah G,  I am sorry to hear that you had a difficult time with internet connectivity, but I am pleased that you were met with a helpful staff. We look forward to your visit in the future and promise to do everything we can to make your next stay special.    We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: On a week long trip of the Grand Canyon/West Coast, we stayed at 3 Hampton Inns. This was the best of the three. It had a great combination of location,cleanliness, and service.  At first we were wary of the set up of the suites but they quickly grew on us and became a bonus. In the suites, the door enters into a small living room(with a TV, small fridge and microwave) and then the bathroom and sinks and then another doorway enters the 2 double bed area. This allowed one of us to either go to bed later or get up earlier than the others.  We stayed on the side of the hotel facing the golf course which was very quiet. The ocean view side may experience road noise from the highway if you are a light sleeper. Parking was adequate.   The only thing that could improve the experience
Manager Response: Dear stosh h,  Thank you very much for the positive feedback. When ever you are back in San Clemente we look forward to serving you again. Your kind words are greatly appreciated.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: Johnson the general Manager might be the nicest guy I've ever met. If we needed anything it was done within 5 minutes with a smile.  The Hampton is not a 4 seasons but a great budget hotel with great service. Room was super clean and large.  Kids had a great time making waffles, etc withe complimentary breakfast.  Pool is small but kids didn't mind. Would go again if need be
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice area.  Just minutes from main street and Del Mar Pier. Also just minutes from beach. Beds were comfortable.  In area for a Senior softball tournament.  Really enjoyed staying in this motel. Lots of restaurants near by.  Rooms very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Will be back.....Great Location in SoCal.
Summary: Great beds. Love the washable duvet covers and abundance of pillows.  Outgoing, friendly, helpful staff, especially Johnson, the general manager.  Easy freeway access. 5 minutes from "Main Street" downtown... Del Mar. This hotel is great for extended stays. Laundry on site, heated pool, coffee 24/7, blow dryer, large closets, wet bar, microwave, etc.  Rosa sets out a different complimentary breakfast each morning... Eggs, or omelets, bacon or  sausage, daily fresh fruit and waffles, yogurt, oatmeal, bagels, etc.... Great way to start one's day! The beaches are minutes away. Will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a beautiful area!!  We were visiting this area for vacation and to visit a relative at Camp Pendleton. The location was perfect, just minutes from the base, the downtown area and the beach.  The rooms were very clean and since they are suites you have room to spread out.  There was a nice breakfast Buffett each morning.  The staff was very friendly and helpful!  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear donyo2014,  Thank you for recognizing that we are a clean and comfortable hotel.  We take great pride in our efforts to make a guest feel at home.  Like you, we truly value cleanliness and comfortability. We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Quiet, near the beach and good restaurants
Summary: I felt like this was a great hotel for the value. It was very quiet and the free breakfast was great too! Restaurants were just down the street as well. We stayed here on our way to Legoland. It was super convenient to take the 26 mile journey southbound in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear 305margueritek,  It is lovely to know that we provided you with a lovely stay here in beautiful San Clemente! Your kind words are greatly appreciated.  We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Clean rooms, friendly staff.  Indoor parking certainly welcomed on hot days.  Great convenient location in San Clemente.  Breakfast items a little thin on the 2 days we stayed.  Very tasty cookies in the afternoon.
Manager Response: Dear Johnson H,  We cannot thank you enough for your fabulous review of our hotel. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: My family and I stayed two nights at this hotel and loved it.  We had lots of room for the six of us, the beds were very comfortable, the pool is heated.  They have a wonderful complimentary breakfast buffet AND freshly baked chocolate chip cookies in the late afternoon/evening that they give out to their guests.  The staff is very friendly and helpful too.  We will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review Cowgirl_Norco. We are so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel.  We look forward for your return.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: It's a small inn at a quiet, little town. To borrow someone at the breakfast table while I was there to describe this hotel, "you know what you'll get".  It's a very nice hotel where you can get just what you expect you will get. Just that. But you can't complain. Because it's just Hampton Inn. If I need to visit that area again, I would still choose Hampton Inn, just because I know what I'll get :)
Manager Response: Dear yoony916,  The Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente was recently presented the Hampton Mover and Shaker Award by Hilton, an award recognizing the hotels with the greatest improvement in overall service. Out of 1,964 hotels, we came in 13th! The award is not only a reflection of how much guests loved their stay at our hotel, it is also a reflection of the hard work, dedication, and passion each team member puts into their work. And to see this team effort recognized by happy guests is the best award any hotel can possibly get. But be assured that we won’t rest on our laurels, we will continue to provide exceptional guest service to ensure that your stay at the Hampton Inn &Suites in San Clemente is a great one, each and every day.   We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Just stayed for one night and it did the job. While checking in, the lobby was just cleaned but smelled a bit like old wet rags. Room was standard with a comfortable bed and sofa in the mini living room. The front desk staff was cordial and provided extras like shampoo and sewing kits. The large sliding window is appreciated, but you can't keep it open for long as the noise from the highway is pretty loud. The breakfast was nothing special, but again can't complain since it saves having to go out and spending more money. You don't really get a plentiful choice of hotels in San Clemente, but if you're staying overnight, you can't go wrong here.
Manager Response: Dear Go H,  We sincerely apologize that your stay with us was satisfactory. Please feel free to contact me at johnson.menezes@hilton.com so that perhaps we can make it up to you the next time you are in town.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: Super comfy beds and a great location!
Summary: Our family of four stayed one night 8/18/2014 for a mini vacation. We chose it based on the great online reviews and the very reasonable price. We originally looked for a hotel in Laguna Beach, but the nice ones were very expensive. We got a AAA discount. The hotel was very easy to find right off of the I-5. It was conveniently located between Carlsbad and Laguna Beach, where we had activities. It was awesome to have a suite, because we had room to spread out. The beds were super comfy! I especially like that they had freshly laundered duvet covers on the comforters so we didn't have to use unwashed bedspreads!  After reading the reviews, we requested a third floor room on the ocean/fwy side. We kept the windows closed, as the freeway would have been very noisy. The AC kept
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review NKorb. We are so happy you had an amazing stay with us. Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Loved our stay. large clean rooms, view of ocean, polite helpful staff, adequate parking, free breakfast  and 5 minutes to beach! It also has a wheelchair accessible pool. I cannot wait to go back. We go to San Clemente a lot and this is my favorite place to stay, Big thank you to the helpful staff! See you soon.  P.S. Warm Chocolate Chip cookies in the evening.
Manager Response: Thanks Kittie T for such a great review. We really appreciate you choosing the Hampton Inn & Suites for your vacation. The comments about the hotel, our location and our great team are very much appreciated.  We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We visited this hotel in Aug 2014 as an overnight stop after a late night flight. The hotel is conveniently located right off of route 5 - the disadvantage though is that it overlooks the highway.  We had a 2-queen bed room which was large enough to accommodate 4 of us (2 adults, 2 kids). The room was clean and well furnished though the bathroom was tiny. The hotel is near several beaches as well. As is common in Hampton Inns, breakfast was simple but good - I has the oatmeal while my kids had waffles and fruit - everyone was happy. I was disappointed with the quality of the coffee though.  All in all, a good experience for a quick overnight transition stay,
Manager Response: Dear VSSUBR,  Thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel and found our suite "Clean and comfortable." We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon. Your kind words are greatly appreciated.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: A typical Hampton with a nice breakfast in the morning and a well appointed room.  We had some issues with some garbage being left in one of the cabinets from a previous tenant.  The elevator was slow.  The location was nice....not a far drive to the beach!!!  The manager was especially accommodating after we complained about our few issues with the hotel  We really appreciate him and the Hilton honors system.  Thanks !!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear tnsna,  I appreciate you letting me help with your issues. We hope you're able to return soon and thank you for your loyalty.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: So glad I reviewed and chose this Hampton Inn; Kellie welcomed us with a smile and started what was a pleasure for our 4-night stay.  Staff is awesome; Louisa manages the awesome breakfast area, she does it with a smile even though it is a big job; she is a great staff member. Hampton Inn offers different hot entrees that rival any I've seen, the breakfast area is large and well appreciated by hotel guests. I traveled with 2 grown children and 2 grand-children, this hotel is kid friendly.  Our room was super clean, pillows and duvet 'awesome clean' as described by daughter.  Pool area well maintained, while small, was a bright spot for 8 and 10 yr. old grandsons; nice lounge area by pool as well.    Our room had a microwave small fridge, extra sink, 2 nice flat screens (we had a
Manager Response: Thanks FayW467 for such a nice review. I am happy that we were able to give you and your family a wonderful stay and a personal touch from Kellie and Louisa. We look forward to your visit in the future and promise to do everything we can to make your next stay just as special.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: This personnel at this hotel make you feel that they really care.  We were welcomed at the front desk with a welcome letter and smile.  We were encouraged to  ask for any directions we may have needed in addition to anything we needed.  There was a fresh tray of hot chocolate chip cookies put out just as we arrived.  They were delicious and a nice touch.
Manager Response: Thanks Roberta B for the great shout outs about our caring customer service. We are so happy you had a great stay and hope to see you again soon. Go CCC! (Chocolate Chip Cookies)  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We loved our stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites in San Clemente!!  The staff was incredible and they went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable.  My granddaughter turned 5 the day after we checked in and I mentioned it to John the general manager when we went down to breakfast that it was her birthday.  We enjoyed a leisurely Sunday breakfast and by the time we were done, John and several staff members came to the pool to present Hannah with a birthday cake (candles included) to sing "Happy Birthday" to her!  It was awesome and made her feel so special.  We had two different rooms and both were very nice and I like the set up to have the sink outside the bathroom area so someone could be in the shower and someone else could be getting ready at the sink.  The breakfast was
Manager Response: We really appreciate your review 621 lovemyfamily. We are happy that Hannah was treated like a Princess on her birthday. We are glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.Thanks for the great comments about our team and the hotel.   Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Hampton Inn is the best franchise in the US. This location needs to be in a lower class than the solid three star that Hampton normally represents. The furniture is tired. The breakfast area is too small for the weekend crowds, the sundry shop is not stocked and the deal killer was that the AC unit makes a sound like the relay is about to go out with a loud buzz the whole time the compressor is engaged. After maintenance came to check it our the only response given was that 'they all sound like that'.  The hotel has two double beds while all Hamptons I know of have double queens. And the internet had the slowest download speed I  have seen since there was dial up internet access. I did a speed test several times and never got above .67 Mbps while the minimum speed should be more
Manager Response: Dear jbmacq,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us at our hotel; your comments are appreciated. I apologize that the internet access was of concern. We have contacted our internet provider to troubleshoot any problems, in order to offer better service in the future. We are sorry that noise from the A/C unit disturbed your comfort and if you plan to travel to the area again in the future, please consider staying with us.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hampton Inn.  The room was large and provided enough space for the two of us plus our son -- he had some privacy in the closed off living room area.  The hotel is very conveniently located to stores, the beach and a golf course.   The rooms are a bit dated and the pool is nice but a little small but it's a nice hotel and a good value.  We enjoyed our full balcony.  The complimentary breakfast was very good, the service and staff were very helpful -- especially Johnson the General Manager who is always around and makes sure everything runs smoothly.   The breakfast and parking are free and the value is good for this hotel.  I would recommend this hotel for a stay in the area.
Manager Response: Dear debrad391,  We are glad you and your son had such a great stay at Hampton Inn & Suites. Thanks for the fantastic comments on our staff and our hotel . We hope you're able to come back and see us soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: The staff is wonderful, going out of their way to help you. They remember you when they see you and offer little amenities that just make you feel like you are really welcome there. I felt very safe and secure and the room was clean and comfortable. I'll definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Patricia Y D,  It is always good to hear that we met a guest’s expectations, but also our hotel was safe and secure. Thank you for your positive review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: My family of 4 shared a suite on our recent trip to San Clemente.  There was more than enough room for all of us to stretch out and not feel like we were living on top of each other.  The teenager had no complaints with the foldout couch, enjoying her privacy behind a door which closed between the front room and the bedroom.  The rooms were spotless and the staff was always friendly and attentive.  It was nice to stay at a hotel free of incidents and undue noise.
Manager Response: Dear Timothy H,  Thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel and found our suite spacious for your family. Also, I will pass along your compliments to my staff.  They work hard to make each guest stay a memorable one.Your kind words are greatly appreciated. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn and Suites, San Clemente last week.  When we arrived they had champagne and some candy for our Anniversary!  What a nice surprise. They were very appreciative for our being Hilton Diamond Honor members.  We stay there frequently every summer. The manager is excellent, its apparent they have made some positive changes there.  A great place to stay in San Clemente,  the rooms are very clean and have been updated.  The pool and spa area is very nice,overlooking the golf course
Manager Response: Dear Jan B,  We are so glad that you had a memorable stay with us and that we met up to your standards. We, at the Hampton Inn, strive to provide an atmosphere of warmth and welcome.I appreciate you taking the time to give your positive comments about our staff and hotel.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: I chose San Clemente because we had just come from San Diego and I thought it would be a good jumping off point for our daily activities. Not only was it a good jumping off point but it was a great place in itself.  we were only minutes away from Dana Point, San Juan Capistrano, Calafia Beach, amongst others. The San Clemente Pier also was a very good place to eat, shop and enjoy the town.
Manager Response: Dear Louis C,  I cannot thank you enough for your fabulous review of not only The Hampton Inn & Suites at San Clemente, but Southern California as well! We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: The hotel staff was excellent.  Clean rooms with all that you need.  We loved the clean beds and bedding!!! We would definitely recommend this hotel if one is visiting San Clemente.  Close to everything. If needing a hotel with quick access to Camp Pendelton this is a great place.
Manager Response: Dear Jill V,  I too am delighted that ou hotel staff was excellent and you loved our beds and bedding. We are happy to have made your stay memorable and be your #1 Choice in San Clemente! See you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: Here's my list.  #1. if you want ocean view, you actually get a highway view and it's LOUD! #2. The breakfast. Fruit had flies, the waffle batter was oily/separated and OLD. The lady managing the breakfast area took out the trash, replaced the bags, then brought out new food including cereal and while pouring the cereal in, pushed it all in with her bare hands.  ALL of that without washing her hands ONCE! NO GLOVES! #3. The last thing I wanted to see when I went to be after a long, hard day working was a short and curly in the sheets.  But there it was. I should have taken pics!!!!  #4. The AC in the room under us was so loud it rattled the floor and woke me up all night long.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you chose our hotel during your recent stay in the area and we apologize for your experience. Unclean rooms are not typical at our hotel and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We are sorry you were disappointed with the view outside your room and the noise level of the A/C. We will make every effort to ensure our rooms meet the highest housekeeping standards and that our guests are 100% satisfied with their stay. Please contact me directly to discuss your stay. We hope you will give us another chance if you visit this area in the future.  Johnson Johnson.menezes@hilton.com

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel.  From the moment I walked in, I felt at home.  The staff did everything they could to make sure everything was in order.  I stayed for a two-week period in June and another two-week period in July.  And I will definitely be back. The room was serviced every day and a maintenance issue was fixed before I even made it back to the room.  The General Manager, Johnson, recognized me out in a local restaurant (even though I had not actually met him yet) and introduced himself.  He greeted me by name every time I saw him after that and I would often see him in the lobby talking with other guests.  Check- in and check-out were a breeze.  And I have never seen a complimentary breakfast this nice.  Easy access to the interstate and to the
Manager Response: Wow Kent W. Thanks so much for such a great review. We are so happy that you had a fantastic experience at our hotel. We, at the Hampton Inn & Suites, strive to provide an atmosphere of warmth and welcome. We appreciate you taking the time to give your positive comments about our staff and hotel.  We hope to see you soon.  Cheers,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: We loved this hotel, the handicap facilities for my husband were beyond compare.  The free cooked to order breakfast was across the hall, so I could run over and bring breakfast back to the room(109) I could see the ocean from our balcony. Covered handicap parking was right at the door of the lobby, the elevator door was in the entrance to the lobby, there were plenty of luggage dollies so I did not have to make 3 trips as I did in another hotel we stayed at. There was a refrigerator and micro wave in room...oh and coffeemaker.  One of the most comfortable and convenient hotels I have ever stayed in.  I am a travel agent and have traveled the world, most recently with a disabled husband.
Manager Response: Dear FQT Cruiser,  Thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel and found our facility comfortable and convenient. Yes, the views of the ocean are incredible! Please come back soon for more!Your kind words are greatly appreciated.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: The General Manager Johnson was Amazing! He actually took the time to come visit his guests in the breakfast area and we saw him throughout our three day stay helping in housekeeping, front desk and the breakfast area! That's rare these days! Keep it up! You won us over.
Manager Response: Dear Scunnin,  We are all very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you soon and thank you for your kind words.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: Broken AC, Some staff was very caring and friendly. However, Athene was so rude and nasty that she over road the good. Room wasn't serviced one day. No fresh towels or beds. Felt as though they just didn't care about us.
Manager Response: Dear David Q,  Thank you for your feedback in regards to the A/C not working in your room. I've worked with our maintenance team to fix the issue, however I apologize that it wasn't resolved sooner. I’m sorry for the service you received from our staff and I want to thank you again for your review.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes
none

Summary: Hotel accommodations were very user friendly with a split bathroom and separate bedroom and sitting room.  Staff very competent.  Interesting that the lobby is in the basement off of the covered parking.  However, once discovered, no problems.
Manager Response: Dear 37jeffe,  Thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel and found our hotel accomodations very user friendly and praising our staff. Your kind words are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Started off with Happy Hour hosted by the General Manager. The room was deluxe. The Breakfast was great. and the staff very friendly. San Clemente is a very pretty town with a lot to do and in an area where there are other interesting small towns.
Manager Response: Dear Conrad S,  We cannot thank you enough for your fabulous review of not only The Hampton Inn, but of San Clemente as well! We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: We had an extremely enjoyable and comfortable stay at this hotel over the July 4th week. The staff were great, the GM Johnson Menezes incredibly helpful and professional and our overall experience was positive.
Manager Response: Dear Timothy G,  We are so happy that your stay was enjoyable and comfortable. We look forward to your visit in the future and promise to do everything we can to make your next stay just as special. Thank you for the amazing review.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: We spent 2 nights at this hotel and it was terrific! The rooms/suites were roomy, clean, and comfortable. The manager of the hotel went out of his way to be helpful to us in many ways- changing a room, helping secure shuttle service to the airports,and providing extra time for checkout. The breakfast offerings were ample and tasty. We were there for a wedding, and everyone was very cooperative and the rooms were very satisfactory.
Manager Response: Dear Fran B,  We thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel and found our suites roomy, clean, and comfortable. Your kind words are greatly appreciated. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary Heading: I'm Convinced! Hampton is the Best!
Summary: Room was immaculate! Bedding was stark white and very inviting.  Room was so comfortable we didn't want to leave.  Very refreshing! We stay in hotels several times a year.. Nothing we've stayed in previously is comparable to Hampton.  AND, the breakfast at Hampton ROCKS!
Manager Response: Dear Tresa R,  "Hampton is the Best' is what we like to hear from our guests. It is always good to hear that we met guest’s expectations and delivered great service! I agree, breakfast at Hampton ROCKS! We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Johnson Menezes

Summary: Great value that even included fresh chocolate chip cookies. I read other peoples comments before I booked this location. This is my first review. I am doing it because it helped me to make my choice. I now am a believer in completing surveys and helping others make a good choice. Thank you, Dean.
Manager Response: Dear Dean,  We are so glad that you chose our hotel after reading the amazing reviews posted by our guests. We hope to see you soon and provide you with top notch service that we are proud of. Thank you for the positive review.  Sincerley,  Johnson

Summary: I've traveled to San Clemente many times for business and pleasure and have stayed in many of the various hotels available in San Clemente.  The only one I'll stay in now is the Hampton Inn.  The location is good, rooms spacious, always clean, and the staff are all friendly.  For the price it's well worth it.
Manager Response: Walter W,  So glad to hear you will be coming back to our hotel. We, at the Hampton Inn, strive to provide an atmosphere of warmth and welcome.  I appreciate you taking the time to give your positive comments about our staff and hotel.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: While I was doing business in Laguna Niguel and North San Diego County, this location was great for a family of five.  I worked and they enjoyed the 10-12 minute walk to a beautiful and clean beach.  The return walk uphill guaranteed hungry appetites.  Two of the best restaurants are located in San Clemente, Sonnys, Italian, and Mariachis, Mexican, are the best. I have stayed here numerous times and have never had an issue with the complimentary parking or the local clientele.
Manager Response: Daniel N,  I cannot thank you enough for your fabulous review of not only The Hampton Inn at San Clemente, but of our local restaurants as well! We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: I can't say enough about how nice everyone who worked at this hotel was. We were greeted with smiles and friendly faces from all the staff. The GM Johnson was so nice and always helpful. Breakfast was fresh each morning and the kitchen area was so clean, a nice plus! Our room was spacious and clean. We will definitely be back to this hotel in the future and will recommend it to anyone staying in the San Clemente area!
Manager Response: tlr2,  So glad to hear you will be coming back to our hotel. I too am delighted that you were met with  “friendly and helpful staff.” We are happy to have made your stay memorable and be your #1 Choice in San Clemente!  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for his birthday a week ago, and we had the best time. Costumer Service was amazing (Nila and the GM Johnson). The Rooms were Large and clean and had great amenities. It was in the perfect Location if you want to see downtown San Clemente, walk to some bars near by, or check out san juan capistrano. I will certainly be back!
Manager Response: Carlyj714,  We cannot thank you enough for your fabulous review. It is our pleasure to have had you and your boyfriend here with us for his birthday. We are pleased to hear that Nila was of great service to you during your stay. Come back to see us when you’re in town.   Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: Hotel was very clean, the General Manager was very helpfull, very nice gentleman and great customer service. the morning breakfast was nice in the morning. the lady at the front desk was very  nice and professional.
Manager Response: Holman C,  It is such a delight to hear that our team members were able to impress you during your stay at our hotel. Your kind words are greatly appreciated and we welcome you back any time!  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: Great Hotel in general. Very nice rooms, Pool, fitness center, Breakfast and excellent staff; friendly and helpful. I would Recommend this Hotel to anyone staying in the San Clemente area. I personally made a mistake on my reservation through a Third party booking company that was suppose to be non-refundable. The staff talked with manager and they ate the cost and let me end my reservation 3 days early. It saved my vacation! These guys are awesome.
Manager Response: Chad C,  We too are delighted that you were met with a “friendly and helpful staff.” We are happy to have made your stay memorable. See you again soon.   Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: We travel to SoCal almost monthly and my wife rates this hotel as the best in the area so far. I was little skeptical after seeing the pictures on TA, but the hotel turned out to be very nice. This was a great choice for our trip with a little kid sleeping in another room, because other places in San Clemente offer just one room. The breakfast was good and it had more variety than most hotels in this category and it did not feel like eating some frozen products cooked centrally. I prefer modern rooms, so I did not like the furniture, but the reality is nicer than the pictures displayed on this site and the beds were pretty comfortable.
Manager Response: Jan K,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at our hotel. We are glad that we could exceed your expectations and were able to accommodate your child with a comfortable, separate place to sleep. Hope to see you again.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary Heading: What a fantastic experience the best hotel in San Clemente.
Summary: Our experience at this hotel was pleasant from our arrival to our departure.Room was excellent service was fantastic.The management and staff treated us like VIP customers!Lots of variety for our free complimentary breakfast everything was fresh and delicious.We highly recommend this hotel and give it 5 stars.Thank You,Hampton Inn management and staff.
Manager Response: Michael R,  Thank you for your 5 star review of your experience with our hotel. It is always good to hear that we met your expectations and delivered great service. See you on your next trip.  Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: We stayed here for three nights in late May. Our two room "suite" overlooked the pool and accommodated us very well with small refrigerator, microwave, two TV's, comfortable beds with good quality bedding and even the duvet freshly cleaned. All the amenities were there as well, even a docking station. Since our last stay the breakfast room has been redone and the decor is well above average, as is the breakfast. Both hot and cold foods, even oatmeal with assorted toppings. Service was excellent, and the manager helped out at breakfast by greeting and assisting each customer. The refreshments at happy hour were welcome. For golfers, the hotel is a short walk to the golf course and a park in one direction, and a short drive to the beach and pier in the other direction. We were
Manager Response: Smitty70,  Thank you for taking the time to write such an amazing review on our hotel and about your trip to California.   We hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,  Johnson

Summary: My husband and I got married at a nearby location, so decided to block off 25+ rooms in this hotel for our guests. Everyone was incredibly friendly and we all enjoyed our stay. The only downfall was that they did not give us a free room for booking SO MANY rooms and after speaking to other people who have booked a block of rooms that large, no one could believe that we had to pay for our room. But in terms of staff, cleanliness, and location, this place was great.
Manager Response: Whitney E,  Congratulations on you and your now husband tying the knot! We are so grateful that you chose our hotel for your guests’ room accommodations.  If you’re ever in the area again or just need a small get away you know where we are at and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Another wonderful hampton...had a great night sleep. Room was clean, staff was friendly. Bed was comfy and sheets were clean...Kid enjoyed the pool. Breakfast was good as always. Always love staying at a hampton inn!!!!
Manager Response: Wendy W,  Thank you for your sweet review. We appreciate that you took the time to write us a review on the cleanliness of the hotel and helpfulness of our staff. We welcome you back anytime!

Summary: My husband, 4 month old son and I stayed just one night as we were in the area for my cousin's wedding.  I was pleased that there was a separate seating area that was perfect for setting up our son's pack 'n' play.  I also liked that the rooms were separated by a door so that we didn't wake him up while we were watching TV or talking.  The breakfast was great and the staff were especially friendly.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Heather S,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay with us. We are pleased to know that you found our accommodation suitable for your needs. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: I frequently stay at this hotel when I'm in town for business.  The last time I was there I mistakingly left some of my clothing in the dresser and I didn't realize I had done so until several days later.  I called the hotel, and they not only had kept my clothing but they offered to ship it back to me in NC.  Awesome!
Manager Response: Buck R,  We were most obliged to send back your clothing and we're happy that we were able to do so for you. Thank you for your amazing review and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The daughter was married in San Clemente. The wedding co-ordinator suggested we stay here because it was walking distance to venue and beach. The group took about 20 rooms. No complaints from anyone. Breakfast in the morning. Waffles and oatmeal a treat. Cookies in the pm. Rooms fresh and clean. Always great to have separation between bedroom and living area. Microwave and refrigerator.  The staff was outstanding trying to arranging our rooms in small groups and all our other requests. Great rate for room. Would stay again.   One downside the rooms facing the ocean are also facing the freeway.
Manager Response: Athomeinlv,  Congratulations, on your daughter’s wedding.  It was our pleasure to make this special stay a success for you and all your family and friends. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: OK, this was better than I thought it would be--actually a pretty good place to stay over night.  I needed to be between Orange and San Diego Counties, so location was the primary driver for choosing this hotel.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The room was large with separate sitting and sleeping areas.  It was well appointed and clean.  Quite a bit of refurbishment has been done, excepting the shower/bath area.  I'm not usually a big fan of hotels adjacent to the freeway, but even though my room was on the front of the hotel, the sound was muted to a background hum.  I would usually also say that you get what you pay for, but this was a pretty good value for the area.  I don't think I'd stay here for more than overnight, but the location is convenient and the rooms comfortable.
Manager Response: D01234,  Thank you for your complimentary review of our hotel and we are happy to hear that the location worked out for your stay.   We welcome you back for your next stay.

Summary Heading: Another wonderful stay at a new place in San Clemente
Summary: My wife and I frequent the San Clemente area as much as we can.  In fact, we were married on the beach right next to the pier in 2010.  This trip out included our infant son, and was our first experience with him in a hotel.  I did not know that there was a Hampton in San Clemente until I started planning this trip.  However, having been a very frequent Hampton customer for business travel to other areas of the country, I knew that having the two room suite and very decent breakfast available would be a great advantage for our family.  Upon check in the manager, Rosalind, was very friendly and paid special attention to our infant son.  Upon mentioning that he might stare due to his fondness of blondes she mentioned that she might wear her hair down for him the next day (her hair
Manager Response: Nicholas S.,   What a delight that Rosalind was able to make that memorable experience for your son with such a simple attribute. We appreciate that you chose our hotel for your family's vacation to the San Clemente area. We will keep in mind for your next trip to have more blondes working to make your son smile.

Summary: Very clean and rooms have excellent set up with bedroom and living room. Housekeeping went above and beyond my expectations.  Free breakfast was great. Location convenient. I highly recommend  the gem when in Sa Clemente.
Manager Response: Mybeach101f - "Delightful Hotel" is what we like to hear from our guests. Also, I will pass along your compliments to our housekeeping team for exceeding your expectations. Thank you for your positive review.

Summary: Our stay at the Hamptons was great.  Good Coffee! That is important to us.  Breakfast was good as well.  Little noisy when on the balcony, hotel next to freeway.  When inside noise is not a bother. The staff is so very helpful. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Kerry N,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. We are happy to hear that we were able to meet your expectations. Your kind words are greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Just far enough north of San Diego and far enough south of Los Angeles ... but so darn close to the beach! Nestled in San Clemente, I was impressed with the amenities, price, staff ... as well as the location!
Manager Response: Michael C.,   Thank you for your time in writing this review. We are happy that we could be in your prime location for you recent stay with us. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: When forced out of my apartment for 6 six weeks due to water damage/mold issues, I took up residence at the Hampton Inn. I was honestly sad to leave after 6 weeks (and not just because I came home to fresh towels daily).    The attentiveness and overall class of the staff at this hotel beats any 5 star resort I have ever been to.  By the end of the first week I believe that everyone working knew me by name and was always cheerful and eager to see what they could do for me.  The I feel the focal point behind the strong customer service at this hotel was the lead manager Rosalind.  Rosalind made me feel very "at home" and truly went out of her way on numerous occasions to make a phenomenal experience out of a less than ideal situation for me.  Especially when it came to handing
Manager Response: Dennis D,  Thank you for your wonderful words about your experience. We strive to go above and beyond for our guests and we are happy that you were able to experience the home away from home in these hard times for yourself. Our front desk manager Rosalind encourages the front desk team to ensure great customer service and we are happy to have her as a part of the team.  Hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here in April for our son's SOI graduation at Camp Pendleton.   Couldn't be nicer!   Super close to the base,  clean,  great beds (and I am SUPER picky about beds! )  We got in late and were hungry,  so the manager suggested OC Tavern,  just a short walk from the hotel.   Great place!  The nicer touches at the hotel were appreciated, cookies in the afternoon,  wine in the lobby.  The best part was breakfast,  a different egg dish every day and it was fresh and still being refilled at 9:45, which was great if we slept in.   Our son is stationed at Pendleton,  we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Smurfgnap,  We are so happy to hear that you had a chance to enjoy yourself while you were visiting San Clemente. Can't thank you enough for your amazing review on the Hampton Inn and OC Tavern. Hope that you are able to make it out here again to visit your son soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect stay, friendly attentive staff, large clean rooms
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights during Memorial day weekend. There was 5 of us in a suite. The price of the room was very reasonable and the rooms were clean and large. 2 room suite with 2 double beds and a very comfortable pull out couch in the sitting area. Our room was facing Hwy 5 but was very quiet. Breakfast was tasty, fitness room was well maintained as was the pool. Staff was friendly and very attentive. If I am ever in the area again I would stay with them again.
Manager Response: Roh K,  I am also delighted that you had a great experiance at our hotel and that we were able to meet all your family's needs. Your kind words are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you and your family again.

Summary: The facilities were lovely, staff was incredibly nice and helpful with any questions we had regarding suggestion for were to eat and visit.  The price was reasonable. The breakfast was wonderful, as well. after the experience we are Hampton customers for life!
Manager Response: Michelle W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel, we greatly appreciate it. Our team is pleased that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a visit at Camp Pendleton.  Great location, nice staff and wonderful accommodations.  Breakfast area clean and had a good selection.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.  The room was very clean and I enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Dear dmskee,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with our hotel and we truely hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Comfortable night with a lazy day
Summary: We met out of town family half way from LA and San Diego. We checked in to find fresh baked cookies. Yummy! The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. The suite was nice so we could sit and enjoy our visit. The Jacuzzi was hot, but no bubbles. They tried to fix it but were able to, so we took the opportunity to request a late check out. We were granted the late check out and we were satisfied.  The breakfast was served hot and the gal running the kitchen was warm and welcoming. The patio pool furniture was comfortable and we enjoyed the day outside visiting.  Great location and value!  See you next time!
Manager Response: Deirdre,  Thank you for your kind words. We are pleased to see that you had a splendid time with your family. Our hotel staff are pleased that you enjoyed breakfast as well. Louisa is such a pleasure to have on our team.   Thank you again for your time and appreciation in writing a review.

Summary: As a Silver Member, I frequently stay at Hampton Inns on travel. This may be the best run, most professional Hampton where I have stayed. Please complement the General Manager of the Hotel, most excellent attention to detail and customer satisfaction!!!
Manager Response: Donald,  Our team strives to have exceptional customer service. We greatly appreciate that you have taken your time to write a review. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you again from the Hampton Team.

Summary: Each and every staff member, including the breakfast staff, and the Manager were very polite and attentive to customer needs.  The freshness and quality of the breakfast buffet was very good.  The Hotel Manager went out of his way to make sure we were 100% satisfied.    I think the accommodations are well priced considering the location.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.   5 Stars *****
Manager Response: Daniel,  We appreciate your all around 5 ***** review. Hope to see you again soon.   Thank you from the Hampton Team for your time and appreciation.

Summary: The hotel isn't boutique but takes into consideration all the necessities.  It is surprising what the hotel has to offer beyond clean sheets and nice pillows.  They have very helpful staff, snack and essentials corner with stocked shelves of anything you may have forgotten, and free wi-fi.  The location is very convenient.
Manager Response: Barrie,  We are delighted to hear that we were able to live up to the boutique hotel status, live up to the boutique hotel standards, and exceed your expectations.   Our hotel staff strives to excel in customer service and we are glad to hear that they have done so.   Thank you for your time in writing a review on our hotel.   See you again soon.

Summary: I have stayed here many times and the rooms are always clean and comfortable.  The staff super friendly and go out of their way to make sure you have what you need.  This last time I was alone and came back to the hotel late and there was no parking except in the alley. A little scary for a 62 yr old woman with bad knees! There's no way I could out run anyone at this point. :-)  Won't stay here alone again unless there is a guaranteed parking space near the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The friendliness and warmth of the staff cannot be overstated.  The atmosphere is one of cheerful helpfulness and people seem to genuinely enjoy their jobs.  I have never experienced a better breakfast buffet anywhere - the food, all of it, was well-prepared, well-attended to and very tasty.  Johnson was outstanding, easy to talk to and professional.  He told me the key to the great food: the "love" the staff puts in it.  Sounds silly, but I believe it!
Manager Response: PJE777,  We sincerely thank you for taking the time to write a review. Thank you for being so appreciative to our hotel staff and their warmth during your stay.   We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I cannot begin to say how friendly and warm the staff is at this hotel. I met a good friend of mine for a "girls weekend" and they helped us have a relaxing and fun experience. The room faced the golf course, which was fine with us because it was quieter. The room was so very comfortable. Nice and roomy, clean as a whistle.  There are no restaurants or shopping right near the hotel, but if you have a car, they are only a minute away. Had a wonderful dinner at Fisherman's Pier and walked around the shops downtown.  The Hampton Inn was small and cozy, which is the way I prefer it. Oh, and try the afternoon chocolate chip cookies. Yum! The breakfast was delicious and had a very good selection. A real bargain for the price.
Manager Response: Rosemary,   Happy to hear you enjoyed your "girl’s weekend”. Our hotel staff understands that a night or two away makes all the difference.   We hope that during your next stay with us you try OC Tavern or Molly Blooms which is within walking distance from our hotel.   Your time and appreciation is sincerely appreciated. Thank you!

Summary: Spent three nights at this property for a wedding.  The GM, Johnson Menezes, was present the entire weekend helping any way possible.  When I asked him if he ever goes home, he replied, "after all the guests are sleeping".  I would strongly recommend this Hampton Inn and gladly stay there if I ever return to SoCal.  The rooms were also very clean and decorated with nice taste.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Johnson Menezes,was so helpful, when we found our original booked hotel was being remodeled.  Very polite, kind, attentive and spoke with us every time he saw us.  Asking how our stay was going and about our Marine at CP that we came to see.    I just can not say enough about the staff, they were all very friendly and helpful.  We will suggest your hotel to other Marine families.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Staff wonderful, everything else was not quite what we expected
Summary: First off, there were some circumstances that we experienced that may not apply to everyone else. As I said in the title, the staff was wonderful, friendly and helpful. However, when we checked in, I was notified that our room was a 2 double bed room, not a 2 queen bed room, as I had booked online. As a Hilton Gold member, this was frustrating (even more frustrating? Emailing Hilton HHonors and getting NO response).  The front desk manager told me that we would be able to move to a 2 queen bedroom the following day, for the rest of our stay. They volunteered to move all of our luggage for us while we were gone, if we'd just pack it up and have it ready. We left for the day and when we returned, we picked up new room keys at the front desk.  When we walked into our new room, we
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was great.  I had a beautiful view of the ocean which I loved!  As always, the room was clean and neat.  The breakfast was really good.  The staff was friendly.  After we had checked out and left the hotel I realized I had left my earrings in the room.  Called the hotel and told them.  They retrieved my earrings and held them at the front desk until I could return to get them.  The internet connection was a little slow, but overall a great experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Johnson, Kellie, and Rosalind went out of their way to make our stay a wonderful one. They made sure we had 2 pack n' plays as we have twin infants, made sure we got some fresh cookies before we left, and had a healthy, delicious breakfast every morning. We will definitely stay at a Hampton Inn again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here for business during a week night.  The front desk staff were very friendly and accommodating.  My room smelled somewhat, especially in the toilet room and the overall decor in the room and lobby seemed tired.  I felt like I paid a little bit more than the value I received.
Manager Response: Carl N- I am pleased to hear that the staff was helpful and accommodating, but disappointed to hear that you had issues with your suite.  I will certainly take your words into account and see where we can improve in this matter.

Summary: Before we decided to spent a week at this property I visited all of the tripadvisor sites for options.  This property kept coming up for friendliness, cleanliness and location location location.  They were right, very helpful staff, amazing clean for a 3 star hotel, and location location location as we bounced back and forth between Disneyland and the San Diego Zoo both in 40 minute easy drives north and south.  The hotel is soooo easy to get on and off the freeway it is amazing.  Around the hotel, and not why we chose this property, as we wanted the flexibility to go to any park in the LA Basin or San Diego, was a surprise with Pedro's "the worlds best fish tacos" (very old drive thru) which was well worth the 6 bucks a plate for #3. Also, other than a small earthquake that
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Clean, Welcoming! Best Choice in San Clemente
Summary: Staff provided excellent customer service, person tour of room before booking was appreciated. You will not be disappointed with this hotel. It is right off the freeway, but very quiet and peaceful.  The room was perfect! Breakfast was a great start to the day. Front desk man provided directions and recommendations that were much appreciated.  I would stay here again and again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of the nicest Hampton hotels I have ever visited.  We stayed here for two nights and were delighted by the friendly, helpful staff and extremely neat and tidy accommodations.  The hotel is in a great location for exploring the beaches and sights in the San Clemente area. Covered parking, breakfast included, tastefully decorated, and did I mention the staff?  It all adds up to a memorable stay!
Manager Response: none

The hotel was clean and it is in a good location off I5. We will definitely return!

If you are looking for a mellow beach vacation, San Clemente is a great destination and the Hampton Inn is an excellent place to stay. My partner has stayed there in the past, and we will definitely stay there in the future.
